K03psp_6-8u:1: evam ukte āyuṣman subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhāvasvabhāvaiḥ sarvadharmaiḥ pañcabhir abhijñābhir anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3: tat kathaṃ bhagavann abhāvasvabhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānupūrvakriyā
K03psp_6-8u:6: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:7: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamam evaivaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati. buddhānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:8: bhagavatām antike bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ buddhadharmaparyupāsitānāṃ pratyekabuddhānām
K03psp_6-8u:9: vārhatāṃ vānāgāmināṃ vā sakṛdāgāmināṃ vā srotaāpannānāṃ vābhāvatvād buddhānāṃ bhagavatām
K03psp_6-8u:10: abhāvatvāt pratyekabuddhānām abhāvatvād arhatām abhāvatvād anāgāminām abhāvatvāt
K03psp_6-8u:11: sakṛdāgāminām abhāvatvāt srotaāpannānām abhāvatvāt sarvāryāṇāṃ nasti sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:12: antaśo vālāgrakoṭīsthānamātrakam apīti tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati:
K03psp_6-8u:13: abhāvā eva buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvāḥ pratyekabuddhā arhanto 'nāgāminaḥ
K03psp_6-8u:14: sakṛdāgāminaḥ srotaāpannāḥ sarvāryā yady ahaṃ bodhim abhisaṃbhotsye yadi vā nābhisaṃbhotsye
K03psp_6-8u:15: 'bhāvā eva sarvadharmāḥ yan nūnam aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:16: yām abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvān bhāvasaṃjñāyāṃ carato 'bhāve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K03psp_6-8u:17: pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi. sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K03psp_6-8u:19: anupūrvapratipadam ārabheta. atra śikṣitvā pūrvakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhum,
K03psp_6-8u:20: prathamam eva ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣante yad uta dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām.
K03psp_6-8u:22: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ carann ātmanā ca dānaṃ dadāti parāṃś ca dānapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:24: ye cānye dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:25: sa tena dānena mahāntaṃ bhogaskandhaṃ pratilabhya dānaṃ dadāti vigatamatsareṇa cittena,
K03psp_6-8u:26: annam annārthikānāṃ pānaṃ pānārthikānāṃ vastraṃ vastrārthikānāṃ vilepanaṃ vilepanārthikānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:27: śayanaṃ śayanārthikānām upāśrayam upāśrayārthikānāṃ pradīpaṃ pradīpārthikānām anyataram
K03psp_6-8u:28: api mānuṣyakaṃ pariṣkāropakaraṇaṃ dadāti sa tena dānena sattvān śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:29: samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane ca pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:30: sa tenaiva śīlaskandhena samādhiskandhena prajñāskandhena vimuktiskandhena vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhena
K03psp_6-8u:32: atikramya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhakṣetraṃ
K03psp_6-8u:33: pariśodhayati buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya sattvān paripācayati sattvān paripācya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti,
K03psp_6-8u:34: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayati dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:35: sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpya saṃsārāt parimocayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānenānupūrvakriyā prajñāyate 'nupūrvaśikṣānupūrvapratipat
K03psp_6-8u:36: tac ca sarvaṃ nopalabhate. tat kasya (PSP_6-8:3)
K03psp_6-8u:37: hetoḥ? tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti.
K03psp_6-8u:39: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāyātmanā ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti,
K03psp_6-8u:40: parāṃś ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati dāne pratiṣṭhāpayati śīlapāramitāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate ye cānye śīlapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:41: sa tena śīlena sattvāñ śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:42: samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane ca pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:43: sa tenaiva śīlaskandhena samādhiskandhena prajñāskandhena vimuktiskandhena ca vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhena
K03psp_6-8u:45: atikramya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhakṣetraṃ
K03psp_6-8u:46: pariśodhayati buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya sattvān paripācayati sattvān paripācya sarvākārajñatām
K03psp_6-8u:47: anuprāpnoti sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayati dharmacakraṃ pravartya
K03psp_6-8u:48: sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpya saṃsārāt
K03psp_6-8u:49: parimocayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlenānupūrvakriyā
K03psp_6-8u:51: tac ca sarvaṃ nopalabhate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:54: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāyātmanā ca kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti,
K03psp_6-8u:55: śīlaṃ ca rakṣati parāṃś ca kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati dāne śīle ca pratiṣṭhāpayati
K03psp_6-8u:56: kṣāntipāramitāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate. ye cānye kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca
K03psp_6-8u:58: sa tayā kṣāntyā sattvāñ śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane ca pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:59: sa tena ca śīlaskandhena samādhiskandhena prajñāskandhena vimuktiskandhena vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhena (PSP_6-8:4)
K03psp_6-8u:62: avakrāmati bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati buddhakṣetraṃ
K03psp_6-8u:63: ca pariśodhya sattvān paripācayati sattvān paripācya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti
K03psp_6-8u:65: dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:66: sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpya saṃsārāt parimocayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntyānupūrvakriyā prajñāyate 'nupūrvaśikṣānupūrvapratipat
K03psp_6-8u:67: tac ca sarvaṃ nopalabhate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:70: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāyātmanā ca vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati kṣāntyā saṃpādayati,
K03psp_6-8u:74: ye cānye vīryapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñah. sa tena vīryeṇa sattvāñ śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:75: samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane ca pratiṣṭhāpayati. sa tenaiva śīlaskandhena
K03psp_6-8u:78: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikramya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati,
K03psp_6-8u:79: buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya sattvān paripācayati sattvān paripācya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti,
K03psp_6-8u:80: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayati dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:81: sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpya saṃsārāt parimocayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryeṇānupūrvakriyā prajñāyate 'nupūrvaśikṣānupūrvapratipat
K03psp_6-8u:82: tac ca sarvaṃ nopalabhate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:85: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāyātmanā ca dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati kṣāntyā saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate,
K03psp_6-8u:87: dāne śīle kṣāntau vīrye ca pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:89: ye cānye dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. sa tena dhyānena sattvāñ śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:90: samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane ca pratiṣṭhāpayati. sa tenaiva śīlaskandhena
K03psp_6-8u:93: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikramya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati,
K03psp_6-8u:96: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayati dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:97: sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpya saṃsārāt parimocayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānenānupūrvakriyā prajñāyate 'nupūrvaśikṣānupūrvapratipat
K03psp_6-8u:98: tac ca sarvaṃ nopalabhate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:101: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāyātmanā ca
K03psp_6-8u:102: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati kṣāntyā saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate
K03psp_6-8u:105: dāne śīle kṣāntau vīrye dhyāne ca pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:107: ye cānye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. sa tayā prajñayā sattvāñ śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:108: samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane ca pratiṣṭhāpayati. sa tenaiva śīlaskandhena samādhiskandhena (PSP_6-8:6)
K03psp_6-8u:109: prajñāskandhena vimuktiskandhena vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhena ca samanvāgataḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikrāmati,
K03psp_6-8u:115: dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:116: sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpya saṃsārāt parimocayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya
K03psp_6-8u:118: tac ca sarvaṃ nopalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:121: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupūrvakriyāyāṃ śikṣate 'nupūrvaśikṣāyām anupūrvapratipadi sa prathamacittotpādam upādāya,
K03psp_6-8u:122: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair abhāvasvabhāvān sarvadharmān adhimucya buddhānusmṛtiṃ bhāvayati,
K03psp_6-8u:126: devatānusmṛtiṃ bhāvayati. kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhānusmṛtiṃ bhāvayati?
K03psp_6-8u:127: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ na rūpato manasikaroti,
K03psp_6-8u:128: na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārato na vijñānato manasikaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:130: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya svabhāvo nāsti,
K03psp_6-8u:131: yasya svabhāvo nāsti so 'bhāvaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:133: punar aparaṃ subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇair manasikartavyo na suvarṇakāyo manasikartavyo (PSP_6-8:7)
K03psp_6-8u:134: na vyāmamātrayā prabhayā manasikartavyo nāśītyanuvyañjanair manasikartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:136: yasya svabhāvo nāsti so 'bhāvaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:138: punar aparaṃ subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na śīlaskandhato manasikartavyo
K03psp_6-8u:139: na samādhiskandhato na prajñāskandhato na vimuktiskandhato na vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhato
K03psp_6-8u:142: yasya svabhāvo nāsti so 'bhāvaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:144: punar aparaṃ subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na daśabhis tathāgatabalair
K03psp_6-8u:145: manasikartavyo na caturbhir vaiśāradyair na catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir manasikartavyo
K03psp_6-8u:146: na mahākaruṇayā na mahāmaitryā nāṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair manasikartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:148: yasya svabhāvo nāsti so 'bhāvaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:150: punar aparaṃ subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na pratītyasamutpādato manasikartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:152: yasya svabhāvo nāsti so 'bhāvaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:154: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā buddhānusmṛtir
K03psp_6-8u:156: prajñāyate. sa ihānupūrvakriyāyām anupūrvaśikṣāyām anupūrvapratipadi śikṣamāṇo 'nupūrvaprasthānaiś
K03psp_6-8u:158: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catura ṛddhipādān pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ śūnyatāsamādhim ānimittasamādhim (PSP_6-8:8)
K03psp_6-8u:165: abhāvasvabhāvayogena so 'bhāvasvabhāvāṃś caiva sarvadharmān abhisaṃbhotsyate yatra svabhāvasaṃjñāpi nāsti.
K03psp_6-8u:167: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharmānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā. iha subhūte
K03psp_6-8u:168: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na kuśalā dharmā manasikartavyā
K03psp_6-8u:169: nākuśalā dharmā manasikartavyā na vyākṛtā dharmā manasikartavyā nāvyākṛtā dharmā
K03psp_6-8u:170: manasikartavyā na laukikā na lokottarā na sāmiṣā na nirāmiṣā nāryā nānāryā na sāsravā
K03psp_6-8u:171: nānāsravā na kāmadhātuparyāpannā na rūpadhātuparyāpannā nārūpyadhātuparyāpannā na
K03psp_6-8u:172: saṃskṛtā nāsaṃskṛtā dharmā manasikartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:173: tathā hi teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo nāsti yeṣāṃ svabhāvo nāsti te 'bhāvāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:174: asmṛtir amanasikārā dharmānusmṛtiḥ. sa iha dharmānusmṛtyāṃ śikṣitvābhāvasvabhāvayogena
K03psp_6-8u:175: yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. so 'bhāvasvabhāvāṃś caiva sarvadharmān abhisaṃbhotsyate
K03psp_6-8u:176: yatra svabhāvasaṃjñāpi nāsti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharmānusmṛtir
K03psp_6-8u:180: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saṃghānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā. iha subhūte
K03psp_6-8u:182: yo so bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃghaś catvāraḥ puruṣayugāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:184: tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo nāsti yeṣāṃ svabhāvo nāsti te 'bhāvā abhāvasvabhāvapratibhāvitāś caivocyante catvāraḥ puruṣayugā aṣṭau mahāpuruṣapudgalāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:185: asmṛtir amanasikārā saṃghānusmṛtiḥ. sa iha saṃghānusmṛtyāṃ śikṣitvābhāvasvabhāvayogena yāvat (PSP_6-8:9)
K03psp_6-8u:186: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. so 'bhāvasvabhāvāṃś caiva sarvadharmān abhisaṃbhotsyate
K03psp_6-8u:187: yatra svabhāvasaṃjñāpi nāsti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saṃghānusmṛtir
K03psp_6-8u:191: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śīlānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā. iha subhūte
K03psp_6-8u:194: nābhāvasvabhāvato manasikartavyam tac chīlaṃ yatrāṇv api smṛtikarma nāsti,
K03psp_6-8u:195: kaḥ punar vādaḥ smṛtivigamaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:196: tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo nāsti yasya svabhāvo nāsti so 'bhāvaḥ. evaṃ manasikurvāṇo 'nupūrveṇa yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:197: asmṛtir amanasikārā śīlānusmṛtiḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śīlānusmṛtir manasikartavyā,
K03psp_6-8u:201: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā tyāgānusmṛtir
K03psp_6-8u:202: bhāvayitavyā. iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenābhāvasvabhāvayogena tyāgo 'nusmartavyo
K03psp_6-8u:203: yadi vāmiṣatyāgo yadi vā dharmatyāgaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:204: cittam evaṃ notpadyate dadāmi vā na dadāmi vā parityajāmi vā na parityajāmi vāṅgapratyaṅgāni
K03psp_6-8u:205: tyajatā naivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ yatrāṇv api smṛtikarma nāsti kaḥ punar vādaḥ
K03psp_6-8u:207: tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo nāsti yeṣāṃ svabhāvo nāsti te 'bhāvāḥ. evaṃ manasikurvāṇo 'nupūrveṇa yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:208: asmṛtir amanasikārā tyāgānusmṛtiḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā tyāgānusmṛtir manasikartavyā yatra svabhāvasaṃjñāpi nāsti,
K03psp_6-8u:211: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā devatānusmṛtir
K03psp_6-8u:212: manasikartavyāḥ. iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ye devāḥ srotaāpannāś cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu
K03psp_6-8u:213: deveṣūpapannās traystriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tusiteṣu nirmānaratiṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu
K03psp_6-8u:214: deveṣūpapannās te 'bhāvasvabhāvato manasikartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:215: tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo nāsti yeṣāṃ svabhāvo nāsti te 'bhāvā evaṃ manasikurvāṇo 'nupūrveṇa yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:216: asmṛtir amanasikārā devatānusmṛtiḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena devatānusmṛtir manasikartavyā yatra svabhāvasaṃjñāpi nāsti,
K03psp_6-8u:219: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaḍanusmṛtīr manasikurvato 'nupūrvakriyā prajñāyate 'nupūrvaśikṣānupūrvapratipat prajñāyate.
K03psp_6-8u:221: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratānupūrvakriyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:227: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu śikṣitavyam abhāvasvabhāvayogena. daśasu pāramitāsu daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu
K03psp_6-8u:229: sa evaṃ bodhimārge śikṣamāṇo 'bhāvasvabhāvān sarvadharmān abhisaṃbhotsyate,
K03psp_6-8u:230: yatrāṇv api smṛtikarma nāsti kutaḥ punā rūpaṃ vā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ vā, evaṃ (PSP_6-8:11)
K03psp_6-8u:231: skandhadhatvāyatanapratītyasamutpāda vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā pāramitā vā śūnyatā vā,
K03psp_6-8u:233: vā sarvākārajñatā vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K03psp_6-8u:234: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā anupūrvakriyā prajñāyate 'nupūrvaśikṣā prajñāyate 'nupūrvapratipat prajñāyate,
K03psp_6-8u:235: yatra kriyāyaṃ cittaṃ caryā pratipac chikṣā ca pravartate.
K03psp_6-8u:236: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:237: yadi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tan nāsti rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:238: nāsti vijñānaṃ nāsti skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā nāsti pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni
K03psp_6-8u:242: buddho nāsti dharmo nāsti saṃgho nāsti mārgo nāsti phalaṃ nāsti saṃkleśo nāsti vyavadānaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:243: nāsti prāptir nāsty abhisamayo yāvan nāsti sarvadharmāḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:244: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:245: api nu subhūte 'bhāvasvabhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣv astitā vā nāstitā vopalabhate.
K03psp_6-8u:247: no bhagavann abhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣv astitā vā nāstitā vopalabhate.
K03psp_6-8u:249: tat katham idaṃ subhūte evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:250: yady abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tan nāsti rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā,
K03psp_6-8u:256: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:257: nāhaṃ bhagavann atra dharmeṣu kāṅkṣāmi na vicikitsāmi,
K03psp_6-8u:258: api tu khalu bhagavan bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani bhikṣavaḥ śrāvakayānikāś ca pratyekabuddhayānikāś ca bodhisattvayānikāś ca ta evaṃ vakṣyanti,
K03psp_6-8u:259: abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ ko 'tra saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ te jānantaḥ śīlavipannāś ca bhaviṣyanti dṛṣṭivipannāś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_6-8u:260: ācāravipannāś ca teṣāṃ śīlavipannānāṃ dṛṣṭivipannānām ācāravipannānāṃ trayāṇām gatīnām anyatarā gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
K03psp_6-8u:261: narakagatir vā tiryagyonigatir vā yamalokagatir vā,
K03psp_6-8u:262: idam apy ahaṃ bhagavann anāgataṃ bhayaṃ saṃpaśyamānas tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham
K03psp_6-8u:263: etad arthaṃ prcchāmi. api tu khalu punar bhagavann aham eteṣu dharmeṣu na kāṅkṣāmi na vicikitsāmi.
K03psp_6-8u:265: sādhu sādhu subhūte evam etad yathā vadasy evam etat.
K03psp_6-8u:266: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:267: yadi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ kam arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyamānā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvānām arthāyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ
K03psp_6-8u:269: yata eva subhūte 'bhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tata eva bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ. tat kasya
K03psp_6-8u:270: tathā hi duḥkhākṣayaś ca subhūte upalaṃbho nopalaṃbhasaṃjñinaḥ prāptir nābhisamayo nānuttarā ca samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:272: kiṃ punar bhagavann anupalaṃbhasya prāptir vābhisamayo vānuttarā vā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:274: anupalaṃbha eva subhūte prāptir anupalaṃbha evābhisamayaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:276: dharmadhātor avikopitatām upādāya dharmadhātuṃ sa icched vikopayituṃ yo 'nupalaṃbhaprāptiṃ (PSP_6-8:13)
K03psp_6-8u:279: yadi bhagavann anupalaṃbhasya na prāptir nābhisamayo nānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:280: anupalaṃbha eva prāptir anupalaṃbha evābhisamayo 'nupalaṃbha evānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:281: tat kutaḥ punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamā bhūmiḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:282: kuto dvitīyā kutas tṛtīyā yāvat kuto daśamī bhūmiḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:290: kuto vipākajā prajñā yatra vipāke sthitvā vipākajair dharmaiḥ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
K03psp_6-8u:293: annena ca pānena ca yānaiś ca vastravastugandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākābhiḥ
K03psp_6-8u:294: śayanāsanopāśrayeṇa pradīpenānyatarānyatarābhir vā mānuṣyakībhiḥ saṃpattibhis tāś
K03psp_6-8u:295: cāsya nocchedyante yāvat parinirvṛtasya śarīre śrāvakeṣu ca vipacyate tac ca na kṣīyate.
K03psp_6-8u:296: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:297: yata eva subhūte 'nupalaṃbhas tata eva prathamā bhūmir dvitīyā bhūmis tṛtīyā bhūmir
K03psp_6-8u:298: yāvad daśamī bhūmis tasyaiva vipākajāḥ pañcābhijñās tataś caivaiṃ vipākajaṃ dānaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:299: śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā ca tataś caiva kuśalamūlāni vipākajāni yaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ
K03psp_6-8u:300: sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti buddhakṣetrañ ca parigṛhṇāti,
K03psp_6-8u:302: prādīpenānyatarānyatarābhir vā mānuṣyopakaraṇasaṃpattibhis tāś cāsya nopacchidyante,
K03psp_6-8u:303: yāvat parinirvṛtasya caiva pūjāḥ pravartante śarīre śrāvakeṣu ca vipacyante.
K03psp_6-8u:304: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:305: anupalaṃbhasya ca bhagavan dānasya ca śīlasya ca kṣānteś ca vīryasya ca dhyānasya ca prajñāyāś cābhijñānāṃ ca ko viśeṣaḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:307: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:308: anupalaṃbhasya ca subhūte dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñābhijñānāṃ ca na kiñcin nānākaraṇaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:309: yeṣāṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte 'nupaliptaṃ dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñābhijñā
K03psp_6-8u:312: kathaṃ punar bhagavann anupaliptānāṃ dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñānām abhijñānāñ ca na kiñcin nānākaraṇaṃ nirdiśyate?
K03psp_6-8u:314: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupalabhya dānam anupalabhya pratigrāhakaṃ dānaṃ dadāti,
K03psp_6-8u:329: anupalabhya buddhadharmān bodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_6-8u:330: mahāsattvo 'nupalaṃbhayogena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_6-8u:335: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyām anupūrvābhisamayādhikāro
K03psp_6-8u:338: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:339: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ekacittena ṣaṭprajñāḥ parigṛhṇāti,
K03psp_6-8u:340: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni
K03psp_6-8u:341: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catura ṛddhipādān pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāny
K03psp_6-8u:342: āryāṣṭāṅgamārgān trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣān navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ
K03psp_6-8u:343: pañcābhijñā adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ daśabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni
K03psp_6-8u:344: catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahākaruṇām aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān aśītyanuvyañjanāni
K03psp_6-8u:348: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yad dānaṃ dadāti tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:360: yān daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikān buddhadharmān yāṃ mahākaruṇāṃ bhāvayati,
K03psp_6-8u:363: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:364: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattva ekacittena ṣaṭpāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_6-8u:368: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhīto yad dānaṃ dadāti tatra na dvayasaṃjñī bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:373: yāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati tatra na dvayasaṃjñī bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:382: kathaṃ ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti na dvayasaṃjñī bhavati?
K03psp_6-8u:383: evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati,
K03psp_6-8u:392: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:393: sa tatra dānapāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭpāramitā antargatāḥ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadāti,
K03psp_6-8u:394: yāvat sarvabodhipakṣyān dharmān antargatāṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadāti. sa khalu punaḥ subhūte
K03psp_6-8u:395: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasmin samaye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti sa tatrānāsrave
K03psp_6-8u:396: citte sthitvā dānaṃ dadāti sa tatrānāsrave citte sthito nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati. kasmai vā dadāmi?
K03psp_6-8u:405: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittopagatena cittena śīlaṃ rakṣati,
K03psp_6-8u:409: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittopagatena cittena kṣāntyā saṃpādayati,
K03psp_6-8u:413: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittopagatena cittena vīryam ārabhate,
K03psp_6-8u:417: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena cittena dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
K03psp_6-8u:421: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena cittena prajñāṃ bhāvayati,
K03psp_6-8u:422: sa tāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayan na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:425: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena
K03psp_6-8u:430: sa tān dharmān na samanupaśyati, tac (PSP_6-8:18)
K03psp_6-8u:434: kathaṃ bhagavann animittān abhisaṃskārāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dānapāramitāparipūritā bhavati?
K03psp_6-8u:436: caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ pañcānāṃ balānāṃ saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya paripūrir bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:439: pañcānām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ paripūrir
K03psp_6-8u:440: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:441: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena cittena dānaṃ dadāti,
K03psp_6-8u:443: yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyopakaraṇapariṣkārān ādhyātmikāṃ bāhyāṃ vā bhāryāputraduhitṛrājyaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:444: vālaṃkṛtya dānaṃ dadāti yācanakānān tasya kaścid evāgatyaivaṃ vadet:
K03psp_6-8u:445: kin te 'nena īdṛśena dānena dattenaivaṃ nirūpakāreṇa tasya khalu punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:447: kin te 'nena vā dānena vā dattenaivam āsphārikena dattenārthasya ca dātavyam evaṃ mayā dānaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:448: na ca mayā na dātavyam. sa dānaṃ sarvasattveṣu sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_6-8u:449: sa tathā pariṇāmayati yathā pariṇāmayan nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:453: kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati kva vā parināmayati,
K03psp_6-8u:457: adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:458: sa evaṃ paśyati ko vā pariṇāmayiṣyati kutra vā pariṇāmayiṣyati kiṃ vā pariṇāmayiṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:459: tasyaivaṃ pariṇāmayataḥ pariṇāmo bhavati nirviṣaḥ pariṇāmo dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ sarvasattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
K03psp_6-8u:471: yathā caiva vipākañ ca na parigṛhṇāti,
K03psp_6-8u:472: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ manasaiva sarvopakaraṇāni bhavanti,
K03psp_6-8u:473: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya manasaiva sarvopakaraṇaṃ paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:474: sa tena dānena buddhāṃś ca bhagavata upatiṣṭhati,
K03psp_6-8u:475: sadevamānuṣāsurañ ca lokaṃ saṃtarpayati sa tān sattvāṃs tayā dānapāramitayā parigṛhyopāyakauśalyena
K03psp_6-8u:476: triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:479: kathaṃ ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
K03psp_6-8u:481: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tac chīlam āryam anāsravaṃ mārgaparyāpannaṃ dharmatāprātilaṃbhikaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:483: sa cāsya śīlaskandho 'khaṇḍo bhavaty acchidro 'śavalo 'kalmāṣo 'parāmṛṣṭo 'bhujiṣyaḥ susamātto vijñapraśastaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:484: tena ca śīlena kaṃcid dharmaṃ na parāmṛśati,
K03psp_6-8u:485: rūpaṃ vā vedanāṃ vā saṃjñāṃ vā saṃskārāṃ vā vijñānaṃ vā dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni (PSP_6-8:20)
K03psp_6-8u:486: vāśītyanuvyañjanāni vā kṣatriyamahāśālakulaṃ vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakulaṃ vā gṛhapatimahāśālakulaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:487: vā cāturmahārājakāyikān vā devāṃs trayastriṃśān vā yāmān vā tuṣitān vā nirmāṇaratīn
K03psp_6-8u:488: vā paranirmitavaśavartino vā brahmapāriṣadyān vā brahmapurohitān vā mahābrahmāṇo
K03psp_6-8u:489: vā parīttābhān vā apramāṇābhān vā ābhāsvarābhān vā parīttaśubhān vā apramāṇaśubhān
K03psp_6-8u:490: vā śubhakṛtsṇān vā anabhrakān vā puṇyaprasavān vā bṛhatphalān vā asaṃjñisattvān vā
K03psp_6-8u:491: śuddhāvāsān vā aspṛhān vā atapān vā sudṛśān vā sudarśanān vā akaniṣṭhān vā ākāśānantyāyatanān
K03psp_6-8u:492: vā vijñānānantyāyatanān vā ākiñcanyāyatanān vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanān vā srotaāpattiphalaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:493: vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddhatvaṃ vā cakravartirājyādhipatyaṃ vā na parāmṛśati,
K03psp_6-8u:494: anyatra sarvasattveṣu sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_6-8u:497: tayā ca śīlapāramitayā paripūrṇayopāyakauśalyena catvāri dhyānāny utpādayaty anāsvādayogena divyaṃ cakṣur abhinirharati,
K03psp_6-8u:498: yena divyacakṣuṣā vipākajena ye pūrvasyān diśi lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:499: tān paśyati tac cāsya darśanaṃ ca na naśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:501: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyān diśy uttarasyān diśy ūrdhvam adho vidikṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:502: tān paśyati tasya darśanaṃ na naśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:503: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. sa divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇoti,
K03psp_6-8u:504: tac cāsya śrutaṃ tāvan na naśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:505: yāvan na tena śrutenātmanaḥ parasya cārthaṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:506: sa cetaḥparyāyajñānena teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ prajānāti tena cetaḥparyāyajñānena sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti, sa (PSP_6-8:21)
K03psp_6-8u:507: pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānenātītaṃ karma nirdiśati yena karmaṇākṛtena tat karma na vipraṇasyati,
K03psp_6-8u:515: evaṃ yatra yatra pratibalāḥ sattvāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tatra tatra pratiṣṭhāpayati.
K03psp_6-8u:516: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena
K03psp_6-8u:519: katham animittānām anābhogānām anupalaṃbhamānānām apratibhānām anabhisaṃskārāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
K03psp_6-8u:521: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍe
K03psp_6-8u:522: niṣaṇṇasya sarvasattvā āgatya loṣṭadaṇḍaprahārān dahyus tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaikacittasyāpi
K03psp_6-8u:523: kṣobhasahagatasyāvakāśo na dātavyas tatra ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dve kṣāntī
K03psp_6-8u:524: bhāvayitavye. katame dve yac ca sarvasattvānāṃ kṣāntavyam ākrośadaṇḍaloṣṭaprahārādiyā
K03psp_6-8u:525: cāsyānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntir utpādayitavyā tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenākruśyamānena
K03psp_6-8u:526: paribhāṣyamāṇena loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān dadatām evaṃ pratyavekṣitavyaṃ ko me ākrośati
K03psp_6-8u:527: vā paribhāṣate vā loṣṭadaṇḍaśastrair vā prahārān dadāti tena dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ
K03psp_6-8u:528: pratyavekṣitavyo dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo dharmāṃś caiva nopalabhate kutaḥ
K03psp_6-8u:529: punar dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvam. tasyaivaṃ dharmasvabhāvaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇasyaivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:530: ko me cchinatti vā bhinatti vā sa evaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo dharmāṇāṃ dharmasvabhāvam anutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate,
K03psp_6-8u:531: tatrānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ kim iti kleśānutpattijñānānācchedyatā ca sa iha dvābhyāṃ kṣāntibhyāṃ yuktaś catvāri dhyānāni paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:532: catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni caturarddhipādāni pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni
K03psp_6-8u:533: āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:534: sa iha dharmeṣu sthitvāryeṣv anāsraveṣu lokottareṣu sādhāraṇeṣu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair
K03psp_6-8u:535: abhijñāḥ paripūrayati yābhir abhijñābhiḥ paripūritābhiḥ ṣaḍbhiś ca pāramitābhiḥ samudāgacchati,
K03psp_6-8u:536: sa ihābhijñāsu sthitvā divyena cakṣuṣā pūrvasyāṃ diśi yān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati tān dṛṣṭvā buddhānusmṛtiṃ pratilabhate,
K03psp_6-8u:537: tasya sā buddhānusmṛtir nocchetsyati yāvan nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
K03psp_6-8u:538: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adho vidikṣu yān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati tān dṛṣṭvā buddhānusmṛtiṃ pratilabhate,
K03psp_6-8u:541: sa divyena śrotradhātunā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa yat te buddhā bhagavanto bhāṣiṣyante
K03psp_6-8u:542: tat sarvam udgrahīṣyaty udgṛhṇaṃ tathatvāya sattvānāṃ dharman deśayiṣyati teṣāṃ ca
K03psp_6-8u:543: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥ parivitarkam ājñāsyaty evaṃ sarvāryāṇāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:544: yāvat sarvasattvānāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥ parivitarkam ājñāsyati,
K03psp_6-8u:545: sa tena cetaḥ paryāyajñānena sattvānāṃ cetasaiva caittam ājñāya tathatvāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:546: sa pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlam ājñāya tena pūrveṇa kuśalamūlena sattvān saṃdarśayiṣyati samuttejayiṣyati samādāpayiṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:547: sa āsravakṣayajñānena ca tān sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu niveśayiṣyati pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:548: sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvāṃś
K03psp_6-8u:549: ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:550: paripūrayaty anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati.
K03psp_6-8u:551: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
K03psp_6-8u:554: carann ānimitteṣv anāsraveṣv anābhogeṣv anupalaṃbheṣv apratibhāseṣu vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
K03psp_6-8u:556: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kāyikena vīryeṇa samanvāgataḥ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_6-8u:557: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_6-8u:559: yāvac candrasūryau pāṇinā parāmṛśati parimārṣṭi sa tena kāyikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato yena daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavanto viharanti sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:560: anekaśatasahasreṣu lokadhātuṣv ṛddhyā gatvā tān buddhān bhagavata upatiṣṭhati cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārais
K03psp_6-8u:561: tasya te cīvarapiṇḍapātrās tāvan na kṣīyante yāvan nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate
K03psp_6-8u:563: cīvarapiṇḍapātreṇa parinirvṛtasya ca śarīre pūjā pravartate,
K03psp_6-8u:564: tenaiva carddhyabhisaṃskāreṇa gatvā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇoti,
K03psp_6-8u:567: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
K03psp_6-8u:568: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāṃ paripūrayaty anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_6-8u:569: abhisaṃbuddhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K03psp_6-8u:570: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kāyikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
K03psp_6-8u:571: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgata āryeṇānāsraveṇa
K03psp_6-8u:572: mārgāṅgena mārgaparyāpannena vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayatīha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K03psp_6-8u:573: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃś caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato 'kuśalasya kāyikakarmaṇo
K03psp_6-8u:574: 'vakāśaṃ na dadāty akuśalasya vākkarmaṇo 'kuśalasya manaskarmaṇo 'vakāśaṃ na dadāti
K03psp_6-8u:575: na parāmṛśati nityam iti vā anityam iti vā sukham iti vā duḥkham iti vātmeti vānātmeti
K03psp_6-8u:576: vā saṃskṛtam iti vāsaṃskṛtam iti vā kāmadhātum iti vā rūpadhātum iti vārūpyadhātuṃ
K03psp_6-8u:578: prathamaṃ vā dhyānaṃ dvitīyaṃ vā dhyānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vā dhyānaṃ caturthaṃ vā dhyānaṃ maitrīṃ vā karuṇāṃ vā muditāṃ vopekṣāṃ vākāśānantyāyatanaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:579: va vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ vākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ vā,
K03psp_6-8u:580: smṛtyupasthānāni vā samyakprahāṇāni varddhipādāṃ vā indriyāṇi vā balāni vā bodhyaṅgāni vāryāṣṭāṅgikaṃ vā mārgaṃ śūnyatāṃ vānimittaṃ vāpraṇihitaṃ vāryasatyāni vābhijñā vā vimokṣān
K03psp_6-8u:581: vā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr vā samādhīn vā dhāraṇīmukhāni vā tathāgatabalāni vā
K03psp_6-8u:582: vaiśāradyāni vā pratisaṃvido vāveṇikān vā buddhadharmān na parāmṛśati nityānityasukhaduḥkhātmānātmaśāntāśānta iti vā,
K03psp_6-8u:583: srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekāṃ vā bodhim
K03psp_6-8u:584: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ srotaāpannaṃ vā sakṛdāgāminaṃ vānāgāminaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā
K03psp_6-8u:585: pratyekabuddhaṃ vā bodhisattvaṃ vā buddhaṃ vā bhagavantaṃ na parāmṛśatīme sattvā
K03psp_6-8u:588: ime ūrddhabhāgikaprabhāvitā ime sarvajñatāprabhāvitā ime mārgajñatāprabhāvitā ime sarvākārajñatāprabhāvitā ity evam api na parāmṛśati. tat kasya
K03psp_6-8u:589: tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate,
K03psp_6-8u:591: sa tena caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato maraṇasukhe 'pi vartamānaḥ sattvānām arthaṃ karoti tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhate vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:597: sa tena kāyikena caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgatas tān kuśalān dharmān parigṛhṇāti,
K03psp_6-8u:600: lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ saṃkrāmati sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:601: sattvānām arthaṃ kurvan yena yenarddhiprātihāryeṇecchati vikurvituṃ tena tenarddhiprātihāryeṇa vikurvati,
K03psp_6-8u:602: yadi vā puṣpavarṣeṇa yadi vā gandhapramuñcanena yadi vā gītābharaṇena yadi vā bhūcalanena
K03psp_6-8u:603: yadi vā saptaratnamayair lokadhātusaṃdarśanena yadi vā jyotiratnānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśa
K03psp_6-8u:604: ātmānam avasṛjati yadi vā gandham avasṛjati yadi vā mahāyajñam avasṛjati,
K03psp_6-8u:608: adattādānāt kāmamithyācārān mṛṣāvādāt piśunavacanāt paruṣavacanād avaddhapralāpād abhidhyāyā vyāpādāt mithyādṛṣṭeḥ parimocayati,
K03psp_6-8u:613: evaṃ yena yenopāyena sattvānām arthaḥ kartavyaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:615: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ānimitteṣu dharmeṣu caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
K03psp_6-8u:617: kathañ ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ānimitteṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
K03psp_6-8u:619: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sthāpayitvā tathāgatasamādhiṃ sarvasamādhīn paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:620: sa viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ sa vitarkaṃ sa vicāraṃ vivekajaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:621: prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:623: maitrīsahagatena cittena karuṇāsahagatena muditāsahagatenopekṣāsahagatena cittena yāvat sarvāvantam lokadhātum upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_6-8u:624: ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanam ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_6-8u:625: sa tatra dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvāṣṭavimokṣān anulomapratilomān upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_6-8u:631: samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vajropamaṃ ca samādhim upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_6-8u:635: kṛtvā śuklavidarśanā bhūmim atikramya gotrabhūmim aṣṭamakabhūmiṃ tanubhūmiṃ darśanabhūmiṃ
K03psp_6-8u:636: vītarāgabhūmiṃ kṛtāvibhūmiṃ śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmim atikramya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
K03psp_6-8u:641: so 'tra dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati,
K03psp_6-8u:642: buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsamānaḥ sa tān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike kuśalamūlam avaropayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
K03psp_6-8u:646: sattvān dānena saṃgṛhṇāti kāṃścic chīlena saṃgṛhṇāti kāṃścit kṣāntyā saṃgṛhṇāti kāṃścid vīryeṇa saṃgṛhṇāti,
K03psp_6-8u:649: kāṃścid vimuktyā kāṃścid vimuktijñānadarśanena kāṃścit srotāapattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:650: kāṃścit sakṛdāgāmiphale kāṃścid anāgāmiphale kāṃścid arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:651: kāṃścit pratyekabodhau kāṃścid anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:652: yair yaiḥ kuśalair dharmaiḥ sattvā udgacchanti tatra tān sattvān niyojayati sa iha dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasamādhimukhāny abhinirharati catasraś ca pratisaṃvidaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:653: pratilabhate vipākajānāñ cābhijñānām lābhī bhavati sa na jātu mātuḥ kukṣāv upapadyate,
K03psp_6-8u:654: na jātu kāmān pratisevate na sā kācid upapattir yāṃ na gṛhṇāti na cotpattir doṣair lipyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:655: tathā hi tena māyopamā sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ supratibuddhā bhavanti sa māyopamaṃ sarvasaṃskāragataṃ viditvā mahākaruṇā pratigṛhītaḥ sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:656: na ca tatra sattvān sattvaprajñaptim upalabhate,
K03psp_6-8u:657: sa sattvān sattvaprajñaptim anupalaṃbhamānaḥ sarvadharmāṇām anupalaṃbha eva sattvān
K03psp_6-8u:658: pratiṣṭhāpayati lokavyavahāram upādāya na ca punaḥ paramārthena iha dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:659: sthitvā sarvadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattiṣu carati na jātu dhyānapāramitayā virahito bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:661: sa iha sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatām abhinirharati,
K03psp_6-8u:664: sa ātmanaḥ parasya cārthaṃ kurvan sadevamānuṣāsuralokasya dakṣiṇīyo bhavāti. evaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:665: khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ānimitteṣu dharmeṣu
K03psp_6-8u:667: iti dānādīnām anyatamena sarvānāsravaikalakṣaṇasaṃgrahalakṣaṇo 'yam ekacittakṣaṇābhisamayaḥ prathamaḥ
K03psp_6-8u:669: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata ānimitteṣu dharmeṣu prajñāpāramitā bhāvanāpripūrim gacchati?
K03psp_6-8u:671: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kañcid dharmaṃ sadbhūtaṃ vā pariniṣpannaṃ vā samanupaśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:673: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāsadbhūtatām apariniṣpannatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:675: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyotpādaṃ na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:676: sa rūpasyotpādam asamanupaśyan vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyotpādaṃ na samanupaśyan rūpasyāyadvāraṃ na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:678: evaṃ yāvat sarvasāsravānāṃ dharmāṇām anāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āyadvāraṃ na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:680: evaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo rūpasya svabhāvan nopalabhate yāvat sarvasāsravāṇām anāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvan nopalabhate,
K03psp_6-8u:681: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhāvasvabhāvān sarvadharmān adhimucate,
K03psp_6-8u:682: sa evam adhimucyādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran na keṣu kācid dharmeṣv abhiniviśate,
K03psp_6-8u:683: rūpe vā vedanāyāṃ vā saṃjñāyāṃ vā saṃskāreṣu vā vijñāne vā skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu
K03psp_6-8u:684: vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu vā pāramitāsu vā śūnyatāsu vā bodhipakṣyeṣu vā dharmeṣv
K03psp_6-8u:688: yad uta ṣaṭpāramitā yāvat saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmān
K03psp_6-8u:689: adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny aśītyanuvyañjanāni paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:690: sa vipākajadharme bodhisattvamārge sthitvā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu paripūrṇāsu yāvat saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu
K03psp_6-8u:691: dharmeṣu paripūrṇesu yāvad vipākajāsu pañcasv abhijñāsu sthitvā ye sattvā dānenānugrahītavyās
K03psp_6-8u:693: ye śīlena ye samādhinā ye prajñayā ye vimuktyā ye vimuktijñānadarśanenānugrahītavyās tāṃs tair anugṛhṇāti,
K03psp_6-8u:694: ye srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā ye sakṛdāgāmiphale ye 'nāgāmiphale ye 'rhattve
K03psp_6-8u:695: ye pratyekabodhau ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyās tān anuttarāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:697: evaṃ vistareṇa kartavyaṃ so 'nekavidhām ṛddhiṃ kurvāṇo gaṅgānadīvālukopamām lokadhātūn na gacchati,
K03psp_6-8u:698: sa ākāṅkṣaṃs tāṃ lokadhātūn yādṛśai ratnair
K03psp_6-8u:699: ākāṃkṣati tādṛśai ratnair abhinirmiṇoti sa sattvābhiprāyaṃ paripūrayaṃ lokadhātūn saṃkrāmati,
K03psp_6-8u:700: sa tāṃ lokadhātūn dṛṣṭvā buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti,
K03psp_6-8u:702: ye 'py anye lokadhātavo 'pagatapāpiṣṭhā evaṃ vidhās tenopabhogaparibhogāḥ syur iti,
K03psp_6-8u:703: sa tayā vipākajayā dānapāramitayā śīlapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā vīryapāramitayā
K03psp_6-8u:704: dhyānapāramitayā prajñāpāramitayā vipākajābhir abhijñābhir vipākajena bodhisattvamārgeṇa
K03psp_6-8u:705: mārgajñatāyāṃ caran sarvapāramitāḥ prāptaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati,
K03psp_6-8u:706: yāvat sarvañ caiva rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam apagṛhītaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:707: yāvat sarvadharmāḥ kuśalā vākuśalā vā laukikā vā lokottarā vā sāsravā vānāsravā vā saṃskṛtā vāsaṃskṛtā vā sāvadyā vānavadyā vā (PSP_6-8:29)
K03psp_6-8u:709: tasmāt tarhi subhūte tasyānuttaraṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre 'parigṛhītaḥ sarvopabhogo bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:710: tathā hi sarvadharmā aparigṛhltā anupalaṃbhayogena. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ānimittayogena prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:712: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:713: kathaṃ bhagavann evam asaṃbhinneṣu dharmeṣv ānimitteṣu lakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu ṣaṭpāramitābhāvanāparipūrir bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:714: dānapāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ katham eṣāṃ sāsravāṇām anāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñaptaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:717: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāyām antargatā bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:718: kathaṃ bhagavann evam alakṣaṇeṣu dharmeṣv ekalakṣaṇeṣu yad utālakṣaṇeṣu nānākaraṇaṃ prabhāvyate.
K03psp_6-8u:719: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:720: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopameṣu ca pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu
K03psp_6-8u:721: pratiśrutkopameṣu pratibhāsopameṣu pratibiṃbhopameṣu marīcyupameṣu māyopameṣu nirmitakopameṣu
K03psp_6-8u:722: gandharvanagaropameṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvālakṣaṇeṣu dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:723: rakṣati kṣāntyā saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate dhyānāni samāpadyate prajñāṃ bhāvayati
K03psp_6-8u:724: svapnopamāṃś ca pañcaskandhān alakṣaṇān jānāti pratiśrutkopamān pratibhāsopamān pratibiṃbopamān
K03psp_6-8u:725: marīcyupamān māyopamān nirmitakopamān gandharvanagaropamāṃś ca pañcaskandhān alakṣaṇān
K03psp_6-8u:727: na hi svapnaṃ tasya kaścit svabhāvo na hi pratiśrutkāyā na hi pratibhāsasya na hi pratibiṃbasya na hi marīcyā na hi māyāyāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:728: na hi nirmitakasya na hi gandharvanagarasya kaścit svabhāvo (PSP_6-8:30)
K03psp_6-8u:729: yasya svabhāvo nāsti tasya nāsti lakṣaṇaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:730: yasya ca nāsti lakṣaṇaṃ sa ekalakṣaṇo yad utālakṣaṇaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:731: tad anena subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam alakṣaṇaṃ dānam alakṣaṇo dāyako 'lakṣaṇaḥ pratigrāhako 'lakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmāḥ. evaṃ jñātvā dānaṃ dadāti sa dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:732: sa dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayan śīlapāramitāyāṃ na vivartate,
K03psp_6-8u:737: sa āsu ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā catvāri dhyānāni paripūrayati catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:747: iha vipākajeṣv āryeṣv anāsraveṣu sthitvā daśasu dikṣu ye lokadhātavas tān ṛddhyā
K03psp_6-8u:748: gatvā buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ paryupāste tāṃś copatiṣṭhati cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyasarvopakaraṇapariṣkārair
K03psp_6-8u:750: ye dānena saṃgrahītavyās tān dānena saṃgṛhṇāti ye śīleṇa saṃgrahītavyā ye kṣāntyā
K03psp_6-8u:751: saṃgrahītavyā ye vīryeṇa saṃgrahītavyā ye dhyānena saṃgrahītavyā ye prajñayā saṃgrahītavyās
K03psp_6-8u:753: yāvad ye sarvaiḥ kuśalair dharmaiḥ saṃgrahītavyās tān sarvān kuśalair dharmaiḥ saṃgṛhṇāti
K03psp_6-8u:754: kuśalair dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ saṃsāraṃ copādadāti na ca saṃsārāvacarair duṣkhair
K03psp_6-8u:755: lipyate sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo devamānuṣikīñ ca saṃpattim utpādayati,
K03psp_6-8u:757: so 'lakṣaṇān sarvasattvāṃ jñātvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ ca jānāti na ca tatra tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_6-8u:758: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ ca jānāti na ca tatra (PSP_6-8:31)
K03psp_6-8u:759: tiṣṭhati, anāgāmiphalaṃ ca jānāti na ca tatra tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_6-8u:760: arhattvañ ca jānāti na ca tatra tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_6-8u:761: pratyekabodhiṃ ca jānāti na ca tatra tiṣṭhati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:762: tathā hi tena sarvākārajñatānuprāptavyā yo 'sādhāraṇā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:763: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lakṣaṇān sarvadharmān jñātvā ṣaṭpāramitā alakṣaṇā jānāti,
K03psp_6-8u:765: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ svapnopameṣu
K03psp_6-8u:767: māyopameṣu nirmitakopameṣu gandharvanagaropameṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:768: sa khalu punaḥ svapnopamān pañcopādānaskandhān jñātvā pratiśrutkopamān pratibhāsopamān
K03psp_6-8u:769: pratibiṃbopamān marīcyupamān māyopamān nirmitakopamān gandharvanagaropamāṃś ca pañcopādānaskandhān
K03psp_6-8u:771: akhaṇḍām acchidrām aśabalām akalmāṣām aparāmṛṣṭām abhujiṣyāṃ vijñapraśastāṃ susamāttām
K03psp_6-8u:772: āryām anāsravāṃ mārgāṅgaparyāpannāṃ yatra sthitvā samatābhisaṃskārikaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣati
K03psp_6-8u:773: dharmatāpratilaṃbhikaṃ ca vijñaptiśīlaṃ ca samudācāraśīlaṃ ca so 'nenaivaṃrūpeṇa
K03psp_6-8u:776: vā sahavratāyopapadyeyāhaṃ rājā vā bhaveyaṃ cakravartī koṭṭarājā vā cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:777: vā devānāṃ sahavratāyopapadyeyāhaṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ vā yāmānāṃ vā tuṣitānāṃ vā nirmānaratīnāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:778: vā paranirmitavaśavartināṃ vā devānāṃ sahavratāyopapadyeyāhaṃ brahmapārṣadyānāṃ vā
K03psp_6-8u:779: brahmaprohitānāṃ vā mahābrahmāṇāṃ vā parīttābhānāṃ vāpramāṇābhānāṃ vābhāsvarāṇāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:780: vā parīttaśubhānāṃ vāpramāṇaśubhānāṃ vā śubhakṛtsnānāṃ vānabhrakānāṃ vā puṇyaprasavānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:781: vā bṛhatphalānāṃ vāsaṃjñisattvānāṃ vā śuddhāvāsānāṃ vā (PSP_6-8:32)
K03psp_6-8u:782: aspṛhāṇāṃ vā aptapānāṃ vā sudṛśānāṃ vā sudarśanānāṃ vā akaniṣṭhānāṃ vā devānāṃ sahavratāyopapadyeyāham
K03psp_6-8u:783: ākāśānantyāyatanānāṃ vā vijñānānantyāyatanānāṃ vākiñcanyāyatanānāṃ vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:784: vā sahavratyāyopapadyeyāhaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vānuprāpnuyāṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:785: vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhiṃ vānuprāpnuyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:786: tathā hi subhūte 'lakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmā ekalakṣaṇāṃ yad utābhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:787: na hy alakṣaṇo dharmo 'lakṣaṇaṃ dharmaṃ paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:788: nāpi vilakṣaṇo dharmo vilakṣaṇaṃ dharmaṃ paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:789: nāpy avilakṣaṇo dharmo 'vilakṣaṇaṃ dharmaṃ prāpayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann alakṣaṇāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:790: śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrānto
K03psp_6-8u:791: 'nutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate 'nutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhya
K03psp_6-8u:793: pañcasu dhāraṇīmukhaśateṣu sthitvā catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pratilabhate,
K03psp_6-8u:794: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pratilabhya buddhakṣetreṇa budhhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ paryupāste sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
K03psp_6-8u:795: sa pañcagatike saṃsāre saṃsarati na ca saṃsārāvacareṇa karmaṇā vipākajena lipyate,
K03psp_6-8u:796: tadyathāpi nāma nirmitaś caṃkramati ca tiṣṭhati ca niṣīdati ca śayyāṃ ca parikalpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:798: na gamanaṃ na sthānaṃ na niṣadyāṃ na śayyāṃ nāsanaṃ na caṃkramaḥ sa sattvānāṃ cārthaṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:799: na ca sattvam upalabhate na sattvaprajñaptiṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:800: tadyathāpi nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayati,
K03psp_6-8u:801: aparimāṇān sattvān vinīya tribhir yānair na kaścit sattvam upalabhate,
K03psp_6-8u:802: yam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākuryāt sa āyuḥ saṃskārān avasṛjya nirmitam abhinirmāyānupadhiśeṣe
K03psp_6-8u:803: nirvāṇadhātau pariniryāyāt. sa khalu punaḥ subhūte nirmitaḥ kalpasyātyayena bodhisattvaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:804: mahāsattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpya parinirvṛtas tasya ca parinirvṛtasya
K03psp_6-8u:807: rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā,
K03psp_6-8u:808: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:810: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopameṣu
K03psp_6-8u:812: māyopameṣu nirmitakopameṣu gandharvanagaropameṣu ca pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvālakṣaṇeṣu
K03psp_6-8u:815: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lakṣaṇeṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
K03psp_6-8u:817: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś catasṛbhiḥ kṣāntibhiḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:819: yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasyātrāntare sarvasattvā ākrośeyur vā paribhāṣeran vāsatyayā
K03psp_6-8u:820: vācā paruṣayā vā samudācareyur loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān vā dadyus tatra bodhisattvena
K03psp_6-8u:822: ko me ākrośati vā paribhāṣate vāsatyayā vācā paruṣayā vā samudācarati loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān vā dadāti,
K03psp_6-8u:825: sarvadharmāḥ kṣamanti tat kiṃ asyaivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:826: ko me ākrośati vā paribhāṣate vāsatyayā vācā paruṣayā vā samudācarati loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān vā dadāti sa evam upaparīkṣamāṇaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:827: so 'nayā kṣāntipāramitayā paripūrṇayānutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate.
K03psp_6-8u:828: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:829: kaiṣā bhagavann anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ kiṃ vā etasyāḥ pramāṇaṃ kiṃ vā jñānam?
K03psp_6-8u:830: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:831: aṇavo 'pi subhūte 'kuśalā dharmā notpadyante tenocyante 'nutpattikā iti,
K03psp_6-8u:832: tatra yā kṣāntis tad ucyate jñānaṃ yena jñānenānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ (PSP_6-8:34)
K03psp_6-8u:834: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:835: yā ca bhagavan śrāvakānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhānāṃ vānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntir yā ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir āsāṃ kṣāntīnāṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:837: yac ca subhūte srotaāpannasya jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:838: yac ca sakṛdāgāmino jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:839: yac cānāgāmināṃ jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:840: yac cārhato jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:841: yac ca pratyekabuddhasya jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ. idaṃ subhūte nānākaraṇaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ kṣānter bodhisattvakṣānteś ca,
K03psp_6-8u:842: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ihaivaṃ rūpayā kṣāntyā samanvāgataḥ
K03psp_6-8u:843: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhān abhibhavati vipākajāyām anutpattikāyāṃ kṣāntyāṃ sthitvā
K03psp_6-8u:845: yayā paripūrṇayāvirahito bhavati saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaiś ca samādhibhiḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:846: sa iha pañcabhir abhijñābhir avirahito bhavati so 'virahitatvād ābhiḥ pañcabhir abhijñābhiḥ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
K03psp_6-8u:847: sattvāṃś ca paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lakṣaṇāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:848: punar aparaṃ subhūtr bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopameṣu
K03psp_6-8u:850: māyopameṣu nirmitakopameṣu gandharvanagaropameṣu ca pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvālakṣaṇeṣu
K03psp_6-8u:853: kathañ ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lakṣaṇeṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
K03psp_6-8u:855: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāyikaṃ ca caitasikaṃ ca vīryam ārabhate sa kāyikena vīryeṇa ṛddhim abhinirharati, (PSP_6-8:35)
K03psp_6-8u:856: daśadiglokadhātuṃ gatvā buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste sattvānāṃ cārthaṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:857: sa tena kāyikena vīryeṇa sattvān pāripācayati triṣu yāneṣu niveśayati vinayati pratiṣṭhāpayati
K03psp_6-8u:858: śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne 'nuttare buddhayāne. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_6-8u:859: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann alakṣaṇāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:860: sa caitasikena vīryeṇānāsraveṇa mārgaparyāpannena vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:861: yatra paryāpannāḥ sarvakuśalā dharmās tadyathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni
K03psp_6-8u:862: catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāni pañcabalāni sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ trīṇi
K03psp_6-8u:863: vimokṣamukhāni catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo 'ṣṭavimokṣā
K03psp_6-8u:864: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaś catvāri satyāni pañcābhijñāḥ samādhiḥ dhāraṇīmukhāni
K03psp_6-8u:865: daśa bodhisattvabhūmayo daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
K03psp_6-8u:867: yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena caratā sarvākārajñatā paripūrayitavyā yasyāṃ paripūrṇāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:868: sarvavāsanānusaṃdhiṃ prahāsyati sarvavāsanānusaṃdhiṃ prahāya lakṣaṇapariniṣpattiṃ paripūrayiṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:869: lakṣaṇapariniṣpattiṃ paripūrya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran samantaprabhatām ārāgayiṣyati
K03psp_6-8u:870: samantaprabhatām ārāgya dharmacakraṃ ca pravartayiṣyati dvādaśākāran triparivartasya
K03psp_6-8u:871: pravartatena trisāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampiṣyate saṃprakampiṣyate pravedhiṣyate saṃpravedhiṣyate,
K03psp_6-8u:873: sarve ca trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum avabhāsena sphāriṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:874: tasya punas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śabdo niścariṣyati tatra ye trisāhasre
K03psp_6-8u:875: mahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās taṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyanti te sarve niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttareṣu triṣu yāneṣu,
K03psp_6-8u:876: evaṃ bahuprakārā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā yasyāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:877: sthitvā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvabuddhadharmān paripūrya sarvākārajñatām anuprāptavyāḥ. evaṃ khalu
K03psp_6-8u:879: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopameṣu
K03psp_6-8u:882: nirmitakopameṣu gandharvanagaropameṣu ca pañcasūpadānaskandheṣu sthitvālakṣaṇeṣu dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
K03psp_6-8u:884: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lakṣaṇeṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
K03psp_6-8u:886: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya
K03psp_6-8u:887: viharati dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati maitrīkaruṇāṃ muditām
K03psp_6-8u:889: upasaṃpadya viharati śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhīṃ bhāvayati vidyutopamañ ca samādhiṃ
K03psp_6-8u:890: bhāvayati vajropamañ ca samādhiṃ bhāvayati yatra samādhau sthitvā ye kecit samādhayaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:891: śrāvakasamādhir vā pratyekabuddhasamādhir vā ye 'py anye samādhigaṇās tān sarvān kāyena saṃspṛśyopasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_6-8u:893: na ca samāpattiphalam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:894: tathā hi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tān samādhīn alakṣaṇān jānāty abhāvasvabhāvatvāt tat kim alakṣaṇo dharmo 'lakṣaṇaṃ dharmam āsvādayiṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:896: so 'nāsvādayan na kasyacit samāpatter vaśenopapatsyate kāmadhātau vā rūpadhātau vārūpyadhātau vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:897: tathā hi sa tān dhātūn nopalabhate yo 'pi samāpadyeta yena vā samāpadyate,
K03psp_6-8u:898: tam api nopalabhate 'nupalaṃbhamāno 'lakṣaṇāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati sa tayā dhyānapāramitayā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikrāmati.
K03psp_6-8u:899: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:900: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitayā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikrāmati.
K03psp_6-8u:902: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ suśikṣito bahirdhāśūnyatāyām
K03psp_6-8u:903: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ suśikṣito na ceha śūnyatāsu
K03psp_6-8u:905: srotaāpattiphale vā sakṛdāgāmiphale vānāgāmiphale vārhattve vā pratyekabuddhatve vā yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vā sāpi śūnyā śūnyatayā,
K03psp_6-8u:912: sarvaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopalaṃbha ātmaḥ sarvānupalaṃbho niyāmaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:919: cakṣur upalaṃbhaḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mana upalaṃbho,
K03psp_6-8u:923: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātur upalaṃbhaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:925: avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhāvo jātir jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā upalaṃbhaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:926: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāny
K03psp_6-8u:931: niyāmaḥ punaḥ subhūte yatraiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravyāhāro nopalabhate,
K03psp_6-8u:932: rūpasya vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya
K03psp_6-8u:933: pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ vā sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvabodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām
K03psp_6-8u:936: tathā hi subhūte rūpasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāro vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāraḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:937: skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ vā yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāraḥ (PSP_6-8:38)
K03psp_6-8u:938: sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvabodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāraḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:940: so 'pravyāhāraḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñānāṃ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāro daśānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:945: niyāmam akrānto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ samādhiparipūrṇo na samāpattivaśenopapadyate,
K03psp_6-8u:946: prāg eva rāgaṃ vā doṣaṃ vā mohaṃ votpādayed yatra sthitvā tat karmābhisaṃskuryād
K03psp_6-8u:947: yena karmābhisaṃskāreṇa caturṇāṃ dhyānānām anyatamenopapadyeta nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate
K03psp_6-8u:948: 'nyatra māyopameṣu sthitvā sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti na ca sattvānupalabhamānaḥ
K03psp_6-8u:949: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_6-8u:950: mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrya yāvad dharmacakraṃ pravartayati,
K03psp_6-8u:952: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopamān
K03psp_6-8u:953: dharmān parijānāti pratiśrutkopamān pratibhāsopamān pratibiṃbopamān marīcyupamān
K03psp_6-8u:956: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:957: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnopamān sarvadharmān parijānāti?
K03psp_6-8u:958: pratiśrutkopamān pratibhāsopamān pratibiṃbopamān marīcyupamān māyopamān nirmitakopamān gandharvanagaropamāṃś ca sarvadharmān parijānāti?
K03psp_6-8u:960: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na svapnaṃ na svapnadarśinaṃ paśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:964: na marīciṃ na marīcidarśinaṃ, na māyāṃ na (PSP_6-8:39)
K03psp_6-8u:967: na gandharvanagaraṃ na gandharvanagaradarśinaṃ ca paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:969: pratiśrutkā viparyāsaḥ pratibhāso viparyāsaḥ pratibiṃbaṃ viparyāso marīcir viparyāso
K03psp_6-8u:970: māyā viparyāso nirmitako viparyāso gandharvanagaraṃ viparyāsa eṣa bālapṛthagjanānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:971: punar nāpi svapnadarśanaṃ nāpi svapnadarśī na pratiśrutkādarśanaṃ nāpi pratiśrutkādarśī
K03psp_6-8u:978: evaṃ yāvan nārhan na pratyekabuddho na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:979: tathā hy abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā anutpannā asadbhūtā ye 'bhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās
K03psp_6-8u:980: te pariniṣpannās tatra kiṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bhāvasaṃjñī
K03psp_6-8u:981: bhaviṣyati pariniṣpannasaṃjñī vāsadbhūtasaṃjñī vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:982: na sā prajñāpāramitā syād yadi kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvo bhavet pariniṣpattir vā sadbhūtatā vā,
K03psp_6-8u:983: evaṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na rūpe sajjati,
K03psp_6-8u:984: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sajjati,
K03psp_6-8u:987: na kāmadhātau na rūpadhātau nārūpyadhātau sajjati,
K03psp_6-8u:994: na sajjati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamāṃ bhūmiṃ paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:995: tatra cchandarāgaṃ notpādayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:997: tat kiṃ tatra cchandarāgaṃ kariṣyaty evaṃ dvitīyāṃ bhūmiṃ tṛtīyāṃ bhūmiñ caturthāṃ bhūmiṃ pañcamīṃ bhūmiṃ (PSP_6-8:40)
K03psp_6-8u:998: ṣaṣṭhīṃ bhūmiṃ saptamīṃ bhūmim aṣṭamīṃ bhūmiṃ navamīṃ bhūmiṃ daśamīṃ bhūmiṃ paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:999: tatra cchandarāgaṃ notpādayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:1000: tathā hi sa tā bhūmīr nopalabhate,
K03psp_6-8u:1002: evaṃ daśamyāṃ bhūmau caran sarvadharmāś ca tatra prajñāpāramitāyām antargatān paśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:1003: tāṃś ca sarvadharmān nopalabhate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:1004: tathā hi te sarvadharmāḥ sā ca prajñāpāramitādvayādvaidhīkārāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:1005: tathā hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ na kaścid bhedo 'sti dharmadhātunirdeśena tathatānirdeśena bhūtakoṭinirdeśenāsaṃbhinnāḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:1006: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:1007: yadi bhagavānn asaṃbhinnatā sarvadharmāṇāṃ tatra kathaṃ kuśaladharmanirdeśo bhavati sāsravāṇām anāsravāṇāñ ca dharmāṇāṃ nirdeśo bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:1008: laukikalokottarāṇāṃ vā saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirdeśo bhavati.
K03psp_6-8u:1011: subhūte yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā kasyacid dharmasya pravyāhāraḥ saṃskṛtasya vāsaṃskṛtasya
K03psp_6-8u:1012: vā srotaāpattiphalasya vā sakṛdāgāmiphalasya vānāgāmiphalasya vārhattvasya vā pratyekabodher
K03psp_6-8u:1018: asaṃbhinnāḥ sarvadharmā alakṣaṇā anutpannā avinirbhogāḥ sarvadharmā na mayā subhūte sarvāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā,
K03psp_6-8u:1019: kaścid dharmopalabdho rūpam iti vā vedaneti vā saṃjñeti vā saṃskārā iti vā vijñānam iti vā skandhadhātvāyatanānīti vā pratītyasamutpannā iti
K03psp_6-8u:1020: pratītyasamutpādāṅgānīti vā kāmadhātur vā rūpadhātur vārūpyadhātur vā,
K03psp_6-8u:1021: kuśalākuśalā vā dharmāḥ sāsravā vānāsravā vā sāvadyā vānavadyā vā saṃskṛtam iti vāsaṃskṛtam
K03psp_6-8u:1022: iti vā yāvac chrotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā
K03psp_6-8u:1023: pratyekabodhir vā bodhisattvatā vā samyaksaṃbodhir vā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_6-8u:1024: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad anuttarāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1027: subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāve kuśalena bhavitavyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:1031: yatra sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvān vinayiṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:1032: ye vinītatvās triṣu bhaveṣu na dṛśyante,
K03psp_6-8u:1033: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam alakṣaṇayogena.
K03psp_6-8u:1036: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyām ekakṣaṇābhisamayādhikāraḥ śikṣāparisamāptiparivartaḥ
K03psp_6-8u:1039: punar aparaṃ subhūte teṣām eva svapnopamānāṃ sarvadharmāṇām avastukānām abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1040: svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ sarvākārapariśuddhānām anāśravāṇāṃ yā prakṛtir ekalakṣaṇā yad
K03psp_6-8u:1041: utālakṣaṇā sa tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho veditavyaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena
K03psp_6-8u:1044: katame punas te bhagavann anāsravāḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:1046: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmāś catvāry apramāṇāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo
K03psp_6-8u:1047: daśa kṛtsnāyatanāni aṣṭāv abhinnāyatanāni araṇasamādhiḥ praṇidhijñānam ṣaḍ abhijñāś
K03psp_6-8u:1048: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ sarvākārāś catasraḥ pariśuddhayo daśa pāramiā daśabalāni catvāri
K03psp_6-8u:1049: vaiśāradyāni trīṇy akṣarāṇi trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni asaṃpramoṣadharmatā vāsanāsamudghāto
K03psp_6-8u:1050: mahākaruṇā sarvākārajñatā mārgākārajñatā sarvajñatā ca ime ucyante subhūte anāsravāḥ
K03psp_6-8u:1051: sarvadharmā iti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāip śikṣitavyam.
K03psp_6-8u:1053: punar aparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā teṣām eva dharmāṇām adhigamād anuttarāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1054: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇair
K03psp_6-8u:1055: aśītyā cānuvyañjanair alaṃkṛtakāyas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1057: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K03psp_6-8u:1059: punar aparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā teṣām eva sarvadharmāṇām avigamenānuttarāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1060: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho daśasu dikṣv anantāparyanteṣu
K03psp_6-8u:1062: sarvakālan nānānirmāṇameghena sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K03psp_6-8u:1064: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:1065: kathaṃ bhagavan svapnopamānāṃ sarvadharmāṇām avastukānām abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:1066: ime kuśalā ime 'kuśalā ime laukikā ime lokottarā ime sāsravā ime 'nāsravā ime saṃskṛtā ime 'saṃskṛtā ime srotraāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai saṃvartante,
K03psp_6-8u:1074: svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ vyavasthānam ime kuśalā ime 'kuśalā ime laukikā ime lokottarā
K03psp_6-8u:1075: ime sāsravā ime 'nāsravā ime saṃskṛtā ime 'saṃskṛtā ime srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai saṃvartante,
K03psp_6-8u:1081: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:1082: iha subhūte bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ svapnam upalabhate svapnadarśinam upalabhate,
K03psp_6-8u:1094: kāyena vācā manasā puṇyāpuṇyāneñjyān abhisaṃskārān abhisaṃskaroti. kāyena vācā manasā
K03psp_6-8u:1095: tān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dvayoḥ śūnyatayoḥ sthitvātyantaśunyatāyām
K03psp_6-8u:1097: śūnyam idaṃ traidhātukaṃ nāsty atra rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1098: vā skandhā vā dhātavo vāyatanāni vā pratiśrutkaiṣā pratibhāsa eṣa marīcir eṣā nirmitaka
K03psp_6-8u:1099: eṣa gandharvanagaram etan nāsty atra rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1100: vā skandhadhātavo vāyatanāni vā nāsty atra svapno na svapnasya draṣṭā,
K03psp_6-8u:1108: 'pi tu sarva ete dharmā avastukā abhāvasvabhāvās tatra bhavanto 'skandhe skandhasaṃjñinaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:1110: api tu khalu punaḥ pratītyasamutpannā ete sarvadharmā viparyāsasamutthitāḥ karmavipākaparigṛhītāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:1111: kiṃ punar yūyam avastukeṣu dharmeṣu vastusaṃjñām utpādayathaivaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran ye matsariṇaḥ sattvās tān mātsaryān
K03psp_6-8u:1113: teṣāñ ca sa dānaparityāgo mahābhogatāyai saṃvartate,
K03psp_6-8u:1116: teṣāṃ sa śīlasamādānajaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ svargopapattaye bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:1117: sa tāṃs tata uccālya samādhau niyojayati sa teṣāṃ samāpattijaḥ puṇyaskandho brahmalokopapāttaye bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:1118: evaṃ prathamād dhyānād dvitīye dhyāne dvitīyād dhyānāt tṛtīye dhyāne tṛtīyād dhyānāc
K03psp_6-8u:1119: caturthe dhyāne caturthād dhyānād ūrdhvam ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattau vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattāv
K03psp_6-8u:1121: sa tasmād api dānād dānaphalāc cānekaparyāyaṃ (PSP_6-8:46)
K03psp_6-8u:1123: sa tasmāc chīlāc chīlaphalāc cānekaparyāyaṃ vivecyānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau niveśayati vinayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:1124: sa tebhyo dhyānebhyo dhyānaphalebhyaś ca samāpattibhyaḥ samāpattiphalebhyaś cānekaparyāyaṃ vivecyānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau niveśayati vinayati
K03psp_6-8u:1125: evaṃ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣu pañcasv
K03psp_6-8u:1126: indriyeṣu pañcasu baleṣu saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu āryāṣṭāṅgikamārge triṣu vimokṣamukheṣv
K03psp_6-8u:1127: aṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu navasv anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu
K03psp_6-8u:1128: vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu niveśayati
K03psp_6-8u:1130: sa ebhir anāsravair dharmair arūpibhir anidarśanair apratighair ye srotraāpattiphale sthāsyanti tān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:1131: ye sakṛdāgāmiphale sthāsyanti tān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:1134: ye pratyekabodhau sthāsyanti tān pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:1136: teṣāṃ satpuruṣāṇāṃ bodhimārgam ākhyāti upadiśati samuttejayati,
K03psp_6-8u:1139: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavanatam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:1140: āścaryam etat bhagavann adbhuto dharmo yatra hi nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:1141: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ dharmāṇām atyantaśūnyatāyām anavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:1142: ime kuśalā dharmā ime 'kuśalā dharmā ime laukikā dharmā ime lokottarā dharmā ime
K03psp_6-8u:1143: sāsravā dharmā ime 'nāsravā dharmā ime sāvadyā dharmā ime 'navadyā dharmā ime saṃskṛtā
K03psp_6-8u:1145: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:1146: evam etat subhūte evam etat āścaryam idaṃ subhūte paramāścaryam idaṃ bodhisattvasya
K03psp_6-8u:1147: mahāsattvasyādbhuto dharmo yad iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dharmāṇāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1149: sacet tvaṃ subhūte jānīyā yo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāścaryādbhuto dharmas (PSP_6-8:47)
K03psp_6-8u:1150: taṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā api ca evam api bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na sukaraḥ
K03psp_6-8u:1151: pratikāraḥ kartuṃ tad yuṣmābhiḥ sarvair bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na śakyaḥ sarvadharmā bhāvayituṃ syāt.
K03psp_6-8u:1152: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:1153: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāścaryādbhūto dharmo yo na śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ saṃvidyate?
K03psp_6-8u:1155: tena hi subhūte śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhuś ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te,
K03psp_6-8u:1156: evaṃ bhagavann ity āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīd,
K03psp_6-8u:1158: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vipākajāsu ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu
K03psp_6-8u:1159: sthitvā pañcasv abhijñāsu saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu dhāraṇīmukheṣu catasṛṣu
K03psp_6-8u:1160: pratisaṃvitsu sthitvā daśadiglokadhātuṣu ye sattvā dānenānugrahītavyās tān dānenānugṛhṇāti,
K03psp_6-8u:1161: ye śīlena ye kṣāntyā ye vīryeṇa ye dhyānena ye prajñayā ye prathamena dhyānena ye dvitīyena dhyānena ye tṛtīyena dhyānena ye caturthena dhyānena,
K03psp_6-8u:1162: ye ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattyā ye vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattyā ye ākiñcanyāyatanasamāpattyā ye naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattyānugrahītavyās tān anugṛhṇāti,
K03psp_6-8u:1163: ye maitryānugrahītavyā ye karuṇayā ye muditayā ye upekṣayā ye caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:1168: ye saptabhir bodhyaṅgair ye āryāṣṭāṅgikena mārgeṇa,
K03psp_6-8u:1169: ye śūnyatayā ye ānimittena ye 'praṇihitena samādhinānugrahītavyās tān śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhibhir anugṛhṇāti.
K03psp_6-8u:1171: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānena sattvān anugṛhṇāti?
K03psp_6-8u:1173: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāty annam annārthikebhyo dadāti,
K03psp_6-8u:1177: sakṛdāgāmibhyaḥ srotaāpannebhyaḥ samyaggatebhyaḥ samyakpratipannebhyas tathāiva tiryagyonigatebhyaḥ
K03psp_6-8u:1178: sarvebhyo 'nānātvena dānan dadāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:1179: tathā hy anānātvaṃ sarvadharmaṃ jñātvā anānātvaṃ dānaṃ dadāti,
K03psp_6-8u:1180: anānātvaṃ dānaṃ datvā anānātvasya dharmasya lābhī bhavati yad uta sarvākārajñatāyāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:1181: sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yācanakaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ cittam utpadyate,
K03psp_6-8u:1182: samyaksaṃbuddhā me dakṣiṇīyā na tiryagyonigatā iti,
K03psp_6-8u:1183: na bodhisattvadharmo bhavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:1184: na hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhāya cittam utpādyaivam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K03psp_6-8u:1185: saṃprasthita ime mayā sattvā dānenānugrahītavyā ime mayā sattvā dānenānugrahītavyā iti cintayati,
K03psp_6-8u:1189: tenaiva ca dānānugraheṇa tribhir yānair anupariśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyanti,
K03psp_6-8u:1190: saced ete bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ janapadabalakāyā avadhyāyeran tena nānyathācittam utpādayitavyaṃ dāsyāmi vā na vā,
K03psp_6-8u:1191: api tu akopitamānasena janapadabalakāyebhyo dānaṃ dātavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:1192: tathā hi tasya janapadabalakāyasyārthāyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:1193: evaṃ ca punar vikalpayed garhyo bhaveyaṃ teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1194: mahāsattvānāṃ pratyekabuddhānām arhatāṃ śaikṣāṇāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurasya ca lokasya
K03psp_6-8u:1195: kenāyam adhīṣṭaḥ sarvasattvānām ahaṃ trāṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmi parāyaṇaṃ layanaṃ śaraṇam iti.
K03psp_6-8u:1196: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā manuṣyabhūtā vāmanuṣyabhūtā vāgatyāṅgapratyaṅgāni yāceran,
K03psp_6-8u:1198: dāsyāmi vā na dāsyāmi vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:1199: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sattvānām arthāya sañcintya āśrayaḥ parigṛhīto 'nena mayātmabhāvena sattvānām arthaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:1200: tenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ yeṣām arthe mayātmabhāva upāttas te 'yācitakam eva gṛhītvā gacchantu. evaṃ khalu (PSP_6-8:49)
K03psp_6-8u:1201: subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā śikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:1202: tathā hy ete dharmā atyantaśūnyatayā śūnyā na hi śūnyatā kasmaicid dadāti vā cchinatti vā,
K03psp_6-8u:1203: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:1204: yad utādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā dānaṃ dātavyaṃ satatasamitam.
K03psp_6-8u:1205: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yācanakaṃ dṛṣṭvā,
K03psp_6-8u:1211: so 'nayā dānapāramitayā paripūryā vā hy adhyātmikeṣu dharmeṣu cchidyamāneṣu evaṃ cittam utpādayiṣyati ko me cchinatti vā bhinatti vā.
K03psp_6-8u:1213: ihāhaṃ subhūte paśyāmi buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayan pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
K03psp_6-8u:1214: lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvān mahāsattvān saṃcintya mahānirayaṃ patitvā tāni mahānirayaduḥkhāny
K03psp_6-8u:1215: upaśāmya tribhiḥ prātihāryais teṣāṃ nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayato yad uta
K03psp_6-8u:1219: anuśāsanīprātihāryeṇa ca te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā mahāmuditayā
K03psp_6-8u:1220: mahopekṣayā ca dharmaṃ deśayanti. tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1221: mahāsattvānām antike cittam atiprasādya tebhyo nirayebhyo vyuttiṣṭhanti,
K03psp_6-8u:1222: tebhyo nirayebhyo vyutthāyānupūrveṇa tribhir yānair duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti,
K03psp_6-8u:1223: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād anuvidikṣu lokadhatuṣu
K03psp_6-8u:1224: buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayan paśyāmi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvān
K03psp_6-8u:1225: mahāsattvān sañcintya mahāniraye patitvā tāni mahānirayaduḥkhāny upaśāmya tribhiḥ
K03psp_6-8u:1226: prātihāryais teṣāṃ nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayato yad uta ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa
K03psp_6-8u:1228: vā ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa ca tāni mahānirayaduḥkhāny upaśāmya ādeśanāprātihāryeṇa dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:1229: anuśāsanīprātihāryeṇa ca te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā mahāmuditayā mahopekṣayā ca dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:1230: tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām antike cittam abhiprasādya
K03psp_6-8u:1231: tebhyo nirayebhyo vyuttiṣṭhanti tebhyo nirayebhyo vyutthāyānupūrveṇa tribhir yānair
K03psp_6-8u:1234: ihāhaṃ subhūte buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayan paśyāmi pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadivālukopameṣu
K03psp_6-8u:1235: lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvān mahāsattvān buddhānāṃ bhagavatām upasthāyakāṃs tat te bodhisattvā
K03psp_6-8u:1236: mahāsattvās tān buddhān bhagavata upatiṣṭhanti manaāpanapriyeṇa nāpriyeṇa gauraveṇa
K03psp_6-8u:1237: nāgauraveṇa yañ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ bhāṣante,
K03psp_6-8u:1238: tat te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā udgṛhṇanty udgṛhya dhārayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:1239: na ca jātu vipraṇāśayati yāvan nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante,
K03psp_6-8u:1240: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād anuvidikṣu paśyāmi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisāttvān mahāsattvān buddhānāṃ bhagavatām upasthāyakāṃs,
K03psp_6-8u:1241: tat te bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tān buddhān bhagavata upatiṣṭhanti manaāpenapriyeṇa nāpriyeṇa gauraveṇa nāgauraveṇa,
K03psp_6-8u:1242: yaṃ ca te budhhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ bhāṣante,
K03psp_6-8u:1243: tat te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā udgṛhṇanty udgṛhya dhārayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:1244: na ca jātu vipraṇāśayanti yāvan nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
K03psp_6-8u:1245: punar aparaṃ subhūte lokaṃ vyavalokayan buddhacakṣuṣā daśasu dikṣu bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
K03psp_6-8u:1246: paśyāmi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu tiryagyonigatānāṃ sattvānām arthāyātmaparityāgaṃ kurvatas,
K03psp_6-8u:1247: tat te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā aṅgapratyaṅgāni cchitvā daśasu dikṣu kṣipanti,
K03psp_6-8u:1248: ye tiryagyonigatāḥ sattvās tesāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māṃsāni bhakṣayanti te teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām antike maitrīṃ pratilabhante,
K03psp_6-8u:1249: te tena maitrīpratilābhena tatas tiryagyoner vyuttiṣṭhanti tiryagyoner vyutthāya buddhāṃ bhagavata (PSP_6-8:51)
K03psp_6-8u:1252: te teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇonti,
K03psp_6-8u:1254: te 'nupūrveṇānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvānti tribhir yānaiḥ śrāvakayānena
K03psp_6-8u:1255: vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā. evaṃ bahukarāḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
K03psp_6-8u:1256: ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayanti cittam utpādya tathatvāya pratipadyante,
K03psp_6-8u:1257: te 'nupūrveṇa tribhir yānair anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvānti,
K03psp_6-8u:1258: śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā buddhayānena vā.
