K03psp_6-8u:1260: ihāhaṃ subhūte lokaṃ vyavalokayan buddhacakṣuṣā paśyāmi,
K03psp_6-8u:1261: daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvān mahāsattvān ye pretaviṣayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ pretaviṣayaṃ duḥkhaṃ tat sarvaṃ pratiprasraṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1262: ye pretaviṣayeṣu sattvās te duḥkhavedanā prasrabdhakāyās teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām
K03psp_6-8u:1263: antike maitrīcittam utpādyate na kuśalamūlena tataḥ pretayāner vyuttiṣṭhanti vyutthitāś
K03psp_6-8u:1264: ca tena kuśalamūlena tataḥ pretayāne buddhair bhagavadbhir na jātu virahitā bhavanti,
K03psp_6-8u:1266: te tān buddhān bhagavata upatiṣṭhanti teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1268: tribhir yānaiḥ śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā buddhayānena vā. evaṃ karuṇā
K03psp_6-8u:1269: vihāriṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvānām arthāya pratyupasthitā yad uta parinirvāṇāya.
K03psp_6-8u:1271: ihāhaṃ subhūte buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayan bodhisattvān mahāsattvān paśyāmi daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:1272: trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ dharmaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1273: deśayanti te ca devaputrās teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām antikād dharmaṃ śrutvānupūrveṇa
K03psp_6-8u:1274: triṣu yāneṣu parinivṛtāś ca parinirvānti ca (PSP_6-8:52)
K03psp_6-8u:1276: tatra subhūte ye devaputrā audārikaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇair mūrchitās teṣāṃ tāni vimānāny
K03psp_6-8u:1277: ādīpya dharmaṃ deśayanty anityāḥ khalu mārṣāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ kaḥ saṃskāreṣu viśvastamānaso viharet?
K03psp_6-8u:1278: ihāhaṃ subhūte 'nāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayan paśyāmi daśasu dikṣv
K03psp_6-8u:1279: ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvān mahāsattvān ye brahmadṛṣṭim
K03psp_6-8u:1281: kathaṃ bho mārṣāḥ śūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu dṛṣṭim utpādayatha,
K03psp_6-8u:1282: evaṃ rikteṣu tuccheṣu sarvadharmeṣu dṛṣṭim utpādayatha. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvā
K03psp_6-8u:1283: mahāsattvā karuṇāyāṃ sthitvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti. āścaryam idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1286: ihāhaṃ subhūte paśyāmi buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayan pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
K03psp_6-8u:1287: lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvān mahāsattvān ye manuṣyāṃś caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ saṃgṛhṇanti,
K03psp_6-8u:1290: kathaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānena sattvān anugṛhṇāti,
K03psp_6-8u:1291: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvābhyāṃ dānābhyāṃ sattvān anugṛhṇāti,
K03psp_6-8u:1293: yad utāmiṣapradānena ca dharmadānena ca. kathaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva āmiṣapradānena sattvān anugṛhṇāti?
K03psp_6-8u:1294: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ suvarṇaṃ vā rūpyaṃ vā maṇiṃ vā muktāṃ vā vaiḍūryaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1295: vā śaṅkhaśilāṃ vā pravāḍaṃ vā rajataṃ vā jātarūpaṃ vānnaṃ vā pānaṃ vā yānaṃ vā vastuṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1296: vā gandhaṃ vā mālyaṃ vā vilepanaṃ vā śayanaṃ vā āsanaṃ vā pratiśrayaṃ vā pradīpaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1297: vā striyaṃ vā puruṣaṃ vā dārakaṃ vā dārikāṃ vāśvaṃ vā gāṃ vā anaḍvāhaṃ vā hastinaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1298: vā ajāvikaṃ vā dhānyādīni vā ātmamāṃsaṃ vā dātuśabdam anuśrāvayati,
K03psp_6-8u:1300: yena yena yuṣmākaṃ kāryaṃ tat tat mamāntikān nirviśaṅkā gṛhītvā gacchata. yena yena kṛtyaṃ (PSP_6-8:53)
K03psp_6-8u:1301: yuṣmadīyam evedaṃ tad dānaṃ datvā buddhaśaraṇaṃ gamayati,
K03psp_6-8u:1366: kāṃścid abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ pratiṣṭāapayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_6-8u:1367: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyeṇa sattvānām āmiṣadānaṃ datvā dāne
K03psp_6-8u:1368: yogakṣeme mārge pratiṣṭhāpayati. ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāścaryādbhuto dharmaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:1369: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān dharmadānenānugṛhṇāti?
K03psp_6-8u:1370: ime subhūte dharmadāne katame dve laukikaṃ ca lokottaraṃ ca?
K03psp_6-8u:1371: katamac ca subhūte laukikaṃ dharmadānaṃ yā laukikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sarve kṣaṇā deśanā prakāśanā vivaraṇottānīkaraṇatā,
K03psp_6-8u:1372: tad yathāśubhaparivartakasya caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇāṃ brahmavihārāṇāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:1373: ye 'py anye kecid laukikādharmāḥ sā dhāraṇā bālapṛthagjanair idam ucyate laukikāṃ dharmadānam. sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:1374: idaṃ laukikaṃ dharmadānaṃ datvā anekaparyāyeṇānekavidhenopāyena tataḥ samādānād vivecayati sa vivecyopāyakauśalyenāryeṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:1378: āryadharmā ucyante subhūte saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:1381: āryadharmāṇāṃ phalaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvam iti.
K03psp_6-8u:1382: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāryadharmā yat srotaāpattiphale jñānaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:1393: yad mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ mahāmuditāyāṃ mahopekṣāyāṃ jñānaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:1397: ye 'pi cānye laukikā vā lokottarā vā dharmāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:1398: sāsravā vā anāsravā vā saṃskṛtā vāsaṃskṛtā vā, anyatra (PSP_6-8:55)
K03psp_6-8u:1400: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsatvasyāryadharmāṇāṃ phalaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:1404: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:1405: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpayati?
K03psp_6-8u:1410: nāsti tarhi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāgatasya ca nānākaraṇam?
K03psp_6-8u:1417: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:1418: na hy anyad bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cittam upalabhate,
K03psp_6-8u:1419: nānyat tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya yatra sthitvā sarvadharmāṇām anānākaraṇatām anuprāptāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:1420: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya laukikaṃ dharmadānaṃ yad upaniśrayo bhavati
K03psp_6-8u:1421: lokottarasya dharmadānasya. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvāl lokottaradharmadāne
K03psp_6-8u:1424: katamac ca subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ lokottaradharmadānam?
K03psp_6-8u:1425: yad asādhāraṇaṃ sarvabālapṛthagjanais tadyathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni,
K03psp_6-8u:1461: ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke abhidhyādaurmanasye samudayānupaśyī ca kāyasya viharati,
K03psp_6-8u:1466: evaṃ vedanāyāṃ citte 'dhyātmadharme dharmānupaśyī viharati bahirdhādharme dharmānupaśyī viharati,
K03psp_6-8u:1468: ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke 'bhidhyādaurmanasye samudayānupaśyī ca dharmāṇāṃ viharati,
K03psp_6-8u:1475: anutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya chandañ janayati,
K03psp_6-8u:1477: anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandañ janayati,
K03psp_6-8u:1478: utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhūyobhāvāya chandañ janayati,
K03psp_6-8u:1491: smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ vīryasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ prītisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ prasrabdhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ samādhisaṃbodhyaṅgam upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgam,
K03psp_6-8u:1494: samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyaksaṃkalpaḥ samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhiḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:1501: katamaś ca śūnyatāsamādhir yā śūnyatākāreṇa viviktākāreṇa tucchākāreṇa riktākāreṇa niḥsvabhāvasaṃskāreṇa ca cittasyaikāgratāyam ucyate śūnyatāsamādhiḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:1502: katamaś cānimittaḥ samādhir yā śāntākāreṇa viviktākāreṇa ca cittasyaikāgratā,
K03psp_6-8u:1504: katamaś cāpraṇihitaḥ samādhir yānityākāreṇa duḥkhākāreṇa viparyāsākāreṇa ca cittasyaikāgratā,
K03psp_6-8u:1508: duṣkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārga imāny ucyante catvāry āryasatyāni.
K03psp_6-8u:1510: rūpī rūpāṇi paśyaty ayaṃ prathamo vimokṣaḥ. adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñāṃ bahirddhārūpāṇi
K03psp_6-8u:1511: paśyaty ayaṃ dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ. śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharaty
K03psp_6-8u:1512: ayaṃ tṛtīyo vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṅgamāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1513: nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati.
K03psp_6-8u:1514: ākāśānantyāyatanasamatikramād anantaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya
K03psp_6-8u:1515: viharati. vijñānānantyāyatanasamatikramān nāsti kiṃ canety ākiñcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya
K03psp_6-8u:1521: ihaikebhyo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1522: vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād
K03psp_6-8u:1523: adhyātmasaṃprasādāc caitasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1524: dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. prīteś ca virāgād upekṣyako viharati,
K03psp_6-8u:1525: smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃ sukhañ ca kāyena prativedayate,
K03psp_6-8u:1527: upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sukhasya ca
K03psp_6-8u:1528: prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvām eva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṅgamād
K03psp_6-8u:1529: aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhañ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sarvaśo
K03psp_6-8u:1530: rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṃgamān nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam iti,
K03psp_6-8u:1531: ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati. ākāśānantyāyatanasamatikramād anantaṃ vijñānam iti,
K03psp_6-8u:1532: vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati. vijñānānantyāyatanasamatikramān nāsti kiṃ canety,
K03psp_6-8u:1538: pṛthivīkṛtsnam apkṛtsnan tejaḥkṛtsnaṃ vāyukṛtsnaṃ nīlakṛtsnaṃ pītakṛtsnaṃ lohitakṛtsnam avadātakṛtsnaṃ vijñānakṛtsnam ākāśakṛtsnam,
K03psp_6-8u:1542: tāni khalu rūpāṇy abhibhūya jānāty abhibhūya paśyati tathā saṃjñī bhavati. adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhārūpāṇi paśyati mahadgatāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni,
K03psp_6-8u:1543: tāni khalu rūpāṇy abhibhūya jānāty abhibhūya paśyati. adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī ca bahirdhārūpāṇi paśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:1551: uṣasi tārakāyā varṇaiḥ saṃpannaṃ vārāṇaseyakaṃ vastram. imāny ucyante aṣṭāv abhibhvāyatanāni.
K03psp_6-8u:1553: dhyānaṃ niśritya parakleśānutpatter anurakṣāvihārasusamṛddho yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tat saṃpramuktāś ca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:1556: dhyānaṃ niśritya idaṃ jānīyām iti praṇidhānasamṛddho yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tat saṃprayuktāś ca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:1568: dhyānaṃ niśritya paryāye dharmalakṣaṇe janapadabhāṣāyāṃ dharmaprabhedeṣv avyāghātasamṛddho yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tat saṃprayuktāś ca cittacaitasikā
K03psp_6-8u:1570: katamāś ca subhūte sarvākārāś catasraḥ pariśuddhayaḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:1571: āśayapariśuddhir ālambanapariśuddhiś cittapariśuddhir jñānapariśuddhiś cemā ucyante sarvākārāś catasraḥ pariśuddhayaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:1585: sthānañ ca sthānato 'sthānañ cāsthānato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
K03psp_6-8u:1589: prajānāti, parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ nānādhimuktikatāṃ yathābhūtāṃ prajānāti,
K03psp_6-8u:1592: divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakena yāvat sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante ye sattvās tān yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
K03psp_6-8u:1594: ekāṃ vā jātiṃ jātiśataṃ vā jātisahasraṃ vā jātiśatasahasraṃ vā jātikoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā yāvat pūrvāntakoṭiśo yāvat sākāraṃ soddeśaṃ sanidānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
K03psp_6-8u:1598: samyaksaṃbuddhasya ca me pratijānata ime dharmā nābhisaṃbuddhā ity atra me kaścit sadevake loke samārake,
K03psp_6-8u:1599: sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ vā dharmā kopayed iti nimittam evaṃ na samanupaśyāmi,
K03psp_6-8u:1600: evaṃ vāhan nimittam asamanupaśyaṃ kṣamaprāpto 'bhayaprāpto viharāmi,
K03psp_6-8u:1602: śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vānyena kenacid vā punar loke 'smin sahadharmeṇa,
K03psp_6-8u:1603: kṣīṇāsravasya ca me pratijānata ime 'nāsravā dharmā aparikṣīṇā ity atra me kaścid
K03psp_6-8u:1604: yāvad dharmacakraṃ pravartayāmi yā mayā śrāvakānāṃ pratipad ākhyātā āryā nairyāṇikī
K03psp_6-8u:1605: samyag duḥkhakṣayāya tāṃ pratiṣedhamāno na niryāyāt,
K03psp_6-8u:1607: sthānam etan na samanupaśyāmi yāvad dharmacakraṃ pravartayāmi,
K03psp_6-8u:1608: ye vā mayā śrāvakebhya āntarāyikā dharmā ākhyātās te pratiṣedhamāṇā nālam anterāyāyeti me kaścid yāvad dharmacakraṃ pravartayāmīmāny ucyante catvāri vaiśāradyāni.
K03psp_6-8u:1610: pariśuddhaṃ kāyakarma pariśuddhaṃ vākkarma pariśuddhaṃ manaskarmetīmāny ucyante trīṇy ārakṣāṇi.

K03psp_6-8u:1894: dhyāneṣu kāṃścid apramāṇeṣu kāṃścid ārūpyasamāpattiṣu kāṃścit saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu
K03psp_6-8u:1897: kāṃścid adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ kāṃścid yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ kāṃścid abhijñāsu kāṃścid daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu
K03psp_6-8u:1899: kāṃścic chrotaāpattiphale kāṃścit sakṛdāgāmiphale kāṃścid anāgāmiphale,
K03psp_6-8u:1901: kāṃścit pratyekabodhau kāṃścid anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau niyojayati. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_6-8u:1902: api nu tena nirmitakena kasyacid dharmasya prabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:1906: tad anena te subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam,
K03psp_6-8u:1907: evam ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
K03psp_6-8u:1908: tāṃś ca bhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayati tāṃś ca sattvān viparyāsāt parimocayati,
K03psp_6-8u:1911: tathā hi subhūte rūpam abaddham amuktaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:1912: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam abaddham amuktaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:1913: yā rūpasyābaddhatāmuktatā na tad rūpaṃ yā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ yā vijñānasyābaddhatāmuktatā na tad vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:1916: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca yāvat sarvadharmā laukikā lokottarāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:1918: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
K03psp_6-8u:1920: anupalaṃbhe sarvadharmāṇāṃ sthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'sthānayogena rūpaṃ śūnyam ity asthānayogena,
K03psp_6-8u:1921: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ śūnyam ity asthānayogena,
K03psp_6-8u:1923: yāvat sarvadharmā laukikā vā lokottarā vā sāsravā vā anāsravā vā saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā
K03psp_6-8u:1925: na hi saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā dharmāḥ kvacit sthitāḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:1927: yatra tiṣṭheran na hy abhāvo 'bhāve tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_6-8u:1931: tathā hi te sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvan nopalabhyante,
K03psp_6-8u:1935: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāñ ca śrāvakānāṃ ca sarvāryāṇāṃ ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:1936: tathā hi buddhair bhagavadbhir bodhisattvaiś ca pratyekabuddhaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca sarvāryaiś ca eṣaiva dharmatānubaddhānubadhya ca sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:1937: tān te dharmāṇāṃ dharmatān na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:1938: tathā hi dharmadhātur na vinivartate na bhūtakoṭir vinivartate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:1939: tathā hi teṣāṃ sa svabhāvo na saṃvidyate yo vinivartate.
K03psp_6-8u:1940: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:1941: yadi bhagavan dharmadhātur na vinivartate na tathatā na bhūtakoṭir vinivartate,
K03psp_6-8u:1942: kiṃ punar bhagavann anyad rūpam anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatānyā bhūtakoṭir anye
K03psp_6-8u:1943: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā anyad vijñānam anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatānyā bhūtakoṭir
K03psp_6-8u:1944: anye skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca anyo dharmadhātur
K03psp_6-8u:1946: evaṃ yāvad anye sarvadharmā laukikā vā lokottarā vā sāsravā vā anāsravā vā,
K03psp_6-8u:1948: anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatā anyā bhūtakoṭiḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:1950: na subhūte 'nyad rūpaṃ anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatānyā bhūtakoṭir anye vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā anyad vijñānam anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatānyā
K03psp_6-8u:1952: ca nānyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatā anyā bhūtakoṭir,
K03psp_6-8u:1953: evaṃ yāvan nānye laukikā lokottarāḥ sāsravā anāsravāḥ saṃskṛtā asaṃskṛtā dharmā anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatā anyā bhūtakoṭiḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:1954: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:1955: yadi bhagavan nānyad rūpaṃ nānyo dharmadhātur nānyā tathatā nānyā bhūtakoṭir nānye
K03psp_6-8u:1956: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā nānyad vijñānaṃ nānyo dharmadhātur nānyā tathatā nānyā bhūtakoṭir
K03psp_6-8u:1957: nānye skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca nānyo dharmadhātur
K03psp_6-8u:1958: nānyā tathatā nānyā bhūtakoṭir yāvan nānye sarvadharmā laukikā lokottarāḥ sāsravā
K03psp_6-8u:1960: saṃskṛtā asaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ nanyo dharmadhātur nānyā tathatā nānyā bhūtakoṭis tat kathaṃ bhagavan phalavyavasthānaṃ bhavati?
K03psp_6-8u:1961: kṛṣṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛṣṇo vipāko narakā vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā,
K03psp_6-8u:1962: śuklānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śuklo vipāko devā manuṣyāś ca,
K03psp_6-8u:1965: srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhir vā yāvat samyaksaṃbodhir vā.
K03psp_6-8u:1966: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:1967: saṃvṛttisatyaṃ subhūte pramāṇīkṛtya phalavyavasthānaṃ nirdiśyate na punaḥ paramārthasatyena phalavyavasthānaṃ śakyan nirdṛṣṭum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:1968: avikalpā hi subhūte sarvadharmā apravyāhārā yad uta anātmasvarūpāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:1969: yeṣām anutpādo 'nirodho 'saṃkleśo 'vyavadānaṃ yad uta svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya.
K03psp_6-8u:1970: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:1971: yadi bhagavan saṃvṛttisatyam upādāya phalavyavasthānaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:1972: na bhagavan paramārthena tadā sarvabālapṛthagjanānāṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:1978: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:1979: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte sarvabālapṛthagjanāḥ saṃvṛttisatyaṃ vā paramārthasatyaṃ vā prajānanti
K03psp_6-8u:1980: yat teṣām api phalavyavasthānaṃ bhaviṣyati yadi prajānīyuḥ saṃvṛttisatyaṃ paramārthasatyam
K03psp_6-8u:1981: iti naiva bālapṛthagjanā iti saṃkhyātāḥ syur yasmāt tu teṣāṃ nāsti parijñānaṃ tasmān
K03psp_6-8u:1982: nāsti teṣāṃ phalavyavasthānam. srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1983: vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhir vā samyaksaṃbodhir vā yat subhūte bālapṛthagjanānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:1984: na mārgo na mārgavyavasthānaṃ na mārgaphalaṃ tat kuto bālapṛthagjanānāṃ phalavyavasthānaṃ bhaviṣyati?
K03psp_6-8u:1985: yad āryapudgalānāṃ punaḥ subhūte mārgo mārgabhāvanā ca tasmād āryapudgalānāṃ phalavyavasthānaṃ bhavati.
K03psp_6-8u:1986: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kiṃ punar (PSP_6-8:73)
K03psp_6-8u:1990: na hi mārgaṃ bhāvayataḥ subhūte phalaprāptir bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:1994: na ca punar amārge sthitvā phalaṃ prāpnoti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvānāṃ phalavyavasthānaṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:1995: na ca bhāgacchedena saṃskṛte vā dhātāv asaṃskṛte vā dhātau phalavyavasthānam.
K03psp_6-8u:1997: yadi bhagavan na bhāgacchedena saṃskṛte vā dhātāv asaṃskṛte vā dhātau phalavyavasthānaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:1998: kathaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ punar bhagavatā idaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:2002: pratyekabodhir yat kiñcit samudayadharmi sarvantaṃ nirodhadharmi,
K03psp_6-8u:2003: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇam. syād yathāhaṃ bhagavato
K03psp_6-8u:2004: bhāṣitasyārtham ājāne tathā saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhāgacchedena phalavyavasthānaṃ bhavati.
K03psp_6-8u:2006: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhir vānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir vā saṃskṛtā ete
K03psp_6-8u:2010: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte asaṃskṛtasya dharmasya bhāgacchedo 'sti?
K03psp_6-8u:2014: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte yasmin samaye kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtān dharmān
K03psp_6-8u:2015: ekalakṣaṇān pratividhyati yad utālakṣaṇās tasmin samaye kasyacid dharmasya bhāgacchedaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2016: karoti saṃskṛtā vāsaṃskṛtā vā dharmā iti?
K03psp_6-8u:2020: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2021: abhāgacchedatām upādāya. yad utādhyātmaśūnyatām upādāya bahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya,
K03psp_6-8u:2026: dānapāramitāyāṃ vā śīlapāramitāyāṃ vā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vā vīryapāramitāyāṃ vā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2027: vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vā prathame vā dhyāne dvitīye vā dhyāne tṛtīye vā dhyāne caturthe vā dhyāne,
K03psp_6-8u:2028: maitryāṃ vā karuṇāyāṃ vā muditāyāṃ vā upekṣāyāṃ vā,
K03psp_6-8u:2029: ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattau vā vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattau vā ākiñcanyāyatanasamāpattau vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattau vā,
K03psp_6-8u:2030: smṛtyupasthāneṣu vā samyakprahāṇeṣu vā ṛddhipādeṣu vā indriyeṣu vā baleṣu vā bodhyaṅgeṣu
K03psp_6-8u:2031: vā āryāṣṭāṅgeṣu mārgeṣu vā āryasatyeṣu vā aṣṭavimokṣamukheṣu vā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu
K03psp_6-8u:2032: vā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu vābhijñāsu vādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ vā bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2033: vādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ vā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ vā samādhiṣu vā dhāraṇīmukheṣu
K03psp_6-8u:2036: so nābhiniviṣṭo na kvacit sajjati. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatanirmito dānaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2037: dadāti na ca dānaphaleṣu sajjati na ca dānaphalaṃ pratyanubhavaty anyatra sattvānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2038: paritrāṇāya yāvat sāsravānāsraveṣu dharmeṣu laukikalokottareṣu saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛteṣu
K03psp_6-8u:2039: dharmeṣu na kvacit tiṣṭhati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2040: tathā hy asya sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmalakṣaṇaṃ supratividdhaṃ bhavati.
K03psp_6-8u:2041: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2042: kathaṃ punar bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmalakṣaṇaṃ supratividdhaṃ bhavati?
K03psp_6-8u:2044: yathā subhūte nirmitasyāsamudācāro rāgadoṣamoheṣv asamudācāro rūpe vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2046: asamudācāraḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣv asamudācāro bāhyādhyātmikeṣu dharmeṣv asamudācāro
K03psp_6-8u:2048: dharmeṣu asamudācāro mārgeṣv asamudācāro mārgaphaleṣv asamudācāraḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte
K03psp_6-8u:2053: yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya subhūte naiva saṃkliśyeta naiva vyavadāyeta naiva pañcagatike saṃsāre dṛśyeta.
K03psp_6-8u:2055: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vastukān dharmān pratividhyati?
K03psp_6-8u:2058: subhūte 'pi nu tathāgatanirmitasya kiṃcid vastu saṃvidyate,
K03psp_6-8u:2063: no bhagavan na hi bhagavan tathāgatanirmitasya kiṃcid vastu saṃvidyate yad vastv āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta naiva vyavadāyeta naiva pañcagatike saṃsāre dṛśyeta.
K03psp_6-8u:2065: evaṃ khalu subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmaIakṣaṇaṃ supratividdhaṃ bhavati.
K03psp_6-8u:2066: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2067: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarvarūpaṃ nirmitopamaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:2068: sarvā vedanā sarvā saṃjñā sarve saṃskārāḥ sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ nirmitopamaṃ bhavati?
K03psp_6-8u:2070: sarvaṃ subhūte rūpaṃ nirmitopamaṃ sarvā vedanā sarvā saṃjñā sarve saṃskārāḥ sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ nirmitopamaṃ bhavati.
K03psp_6-8u:2072: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puruṣakāro bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:2073: yadi sarvaṃ rūpaṃ nirmitopamaṃ sarvā vedanā sarvā saṃjñā sarve saṃskārāḥ sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ nirmitopamaṃ nirmitasya ca na bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:2074: rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ na pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāro yataḥ saṃsārāt sattvān parimocayet.
K03psp_6-8u:2078: mahāsattvena pūrvaṃ boodhisttvacaryāṃ caratā kaścit sattva upalabdho yaṃ narakād vā mocayet tiryagyoner vā yamalokād vā manuṣyebhyo vā devebhyo
K03psp_6-8u:2082: evam etat subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na kaścit sattva upalabdho yaṃ traidhātukāt parimocayet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2083: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmā nirmitopamā jñātā dṛṣṭā viditā bhavantīty ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puruṣakāro
K03psp_6-8u:2085: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmā nirmitopamā jñātā dṛṣṭā viditāḥ
K03psp_6-8u:2086: kasyārthāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carati caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv
K03psp_6-8u:2087: apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu bodhimārge
K03psp_6-8u:2088: ca buddhakṣetrañ ca pariśodhayati sattvāṃś ca paripācayati.
K03psp_6-8u:2089: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2090: yadi subhūte sattvāḥ svayam eva nirmitopamān sarvadharmān jānīyur na bodhisattvo
K03psp_6-8u:2091: mahāsattvo 'saṃkhyeyān kalpān sattvānām arthāya bodhisattvacaryāṃ cared yasmāt tarhi
K03psp_6-8u:2092: subhūte sattvāḥ svayam eva nirmitopamān sarvadharmān na jānanti. tasmād bodhisattvo
K03psp_6-8u:2093: mahāsattvo 'saṃkhyeyān kalpān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carati sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetrañ ca pariśodhayati.
K03psp_6-8u:2094: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2095: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmā nirmitopamāḥ kutra bhagavan pratiṣṭhitāḥ sattvāḥ yato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭpāramitāyāṃ carann uccālayati?
K03psp_6-8u:2097: nāmanimitte subhūte sattvāḥ pratiṣṭhitā asatparikalpitatām upādāya,
K03psp_6-8u:2098: tato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nāmanimittād uccālayati.
K03psp_6-8u:2099: atha khalv āyuṣmāṃ subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2102: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ yad uta nāmanimittam iti kṛtrimam etan nāmadheyaṃ yad uta nāmanimittam iti,
K03psp_6-8u:2103: yad uta rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā strī vā puruṣo (PSP_6-8:77)
K03psp_6-8u:2104: vā dārako vā dārikā vā nairayiko vā tairyagyoniko vā yamalaukiko vā devo vā manuṣyo
K03psp_6-8u:2105: vā saṃskṛto vā dharmo vāsaṃskṛto vā dharmaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2106: vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddho vānuttarasamyaksaṃbuddho vā. api tu khalu
K03psp_6-8u:2107: punaḥ subhūte prakṛtidharmaḥ sarvan nāmārthena śūnyaṃ nāmamātram etat sarvasaṃskṛtaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2109: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvān vivecayati parikalpayati parikalpasamutthitam etan nāmadheyaṃ mā yūyam asatparikalpe sajjate,
K03psp_6-8u:2110: asati vastūni svabhāvaśūnye na hi śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu paṇḍitā abhiniviśante. evaṃ khalu
K03psp_6-8u:2111: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2112: dharmaṃ deśayati. katamat subhūte nimittaṃ dva ime subhūte yatra bālapṛthagjanāḥ saktāḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2114: rūpanimittañ cārūpanimittañ ca. katamac ca subhūte rūpanimittaṃ?
K03psp_6-8u:2115: yat kiñcit subhūte rūpam audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā madhyaṃ vādhimātraṃ vā tatra kṣaṇikeṣu dharmeṣu yat parikalpagrahaṇam idam ucyate rūpanimitta. katamac cārūpanimitttaṃ?
K03psp_6-8u:2116: yāni kānicid rūpāṇi dharmā vānimittagrāhiṇaḥ parikalpāḥ kleśañ janayantīdam ucyate,
K03psp_6-8u:2117: arūpanimittaṃ yatra bālapṛthagjanān saktān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2118: carann upāyakauśalyena sattvān nimittato vivecyānimitte dhātau niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati
K03psp_6-8u:2120: yathā na dvayaṃ patantīdaṃ nimittam idam animittam. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_6-8u:2121: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvān nimittato vivecyānimitte
K03psp_6-8u:2123: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2124: yadi bhagavann etatparamā ete sarvadharmā yad uta nāmanimittaparamāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:2125: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ātmanā ca viśeṣaṃ gacchati,
K03psp_6-8u:2126: kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu parāṃś ca viśeṣādhigame niveśayati kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu yaiḥ kuśalair dharmair bhūmer bhūmiṃ paripūrayati, (PSP_6-8:78)
K03psp_6-8u:2128: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2129: sacet subhūte vastv abhaviṣyan nāvastunimittan na subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
K03psp_6-8u:2130: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viśeṣam adhyagamiṣyan na ca parāṃś ca viśeṣe nyayokṣyad yataḥ
K03psp_6-8u:2131: khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayaty ānimittayogena,
K03psp_6-8u:2136: dhyānāni paripūrayaty ānimittayoganāpramāṇāni paripūrayaty ānimittayogenārūpyasamāpattīḥ paripūrayaty ānimittayogena,
K03psp_6-8u:2138: paripūrayaty ānimittayogenāṣṭavimokṣān navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr abhijñāḥ paripūrayaty ānimittayogena,
K03psp_6-8u:2140: daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrayaty ānimittayogena,
K03psp_6-8u:2141: sa imān kuśalān dharmān paripūrya parān api kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu niyojayaty ānimittayogena,
K03psp_6-8u:2142: sacet subhūte dharmanimittam abhaviṣyad anāsraveṣu sarvadharmeṣu naiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānām artham akariṣyad yataḥ subhūte anāsravāḥ
K03psp_6-8u:2143: ānimittā asmṛtayo 'manasikārās tasmāt khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvānām arthaṃ karoti.
K03psp_6-8u:2144: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2145: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmā ānimittā asmṛtayo 'manasikārās tat kuto bhagavān gaṇanāṃ karoti?
K03psp_6-8u:2146: ime sāsravā dharmā ime anāśravā dharmā ime sādhāraṇā dharmā ime 'sādhāraṇā dharmā
K03psp_6-8u:2147: ime laukikā dharmā ime lokottarā dharmā ime sāvadyā dharmā ime 'navadyā dharmā ime
K03psp_6-8u:2148: saṃskṛtā dharmā ime 'saṃskṛtā dharmā ime śrāvakadharmā ime pratyekabuddhadharmā ime
K03psp_6-8u:2150: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2171: tad anenāpi te subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam ānimittā asmṛtayo 'manasikārāḥ sarvadharmā
K03psp_6-8u:2172: ity atra hi subhūte śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kuśalair dharmair vivardhate
K03psp_6-8u:2173: yad uta ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiś caturbhir dhyānaiś caturbhir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiś
K03psp_6-8u:2174: caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiś caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiś caturbhi ṛddhipādaiḥ pañcabhir
K03psp_6-8u:2175: indriyaiḥ pañcabhir balaiḥ saptabhir bodhyaṅgair āryāṣṭāṅgamārgeṇādhyātmaśūnyatayā
K03psp_6-8u:2177: abhijñābhir aṣṭabhir vimokṣair navabhir anupūrvavihārasamāpattibhiḥ sarvasamādhibhiḥ
K03psp_6-8u:2181: svalakṣaṇaśūnyaṃ sa eṣu triṣu vimokṣamukheṣu śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu
K03psp_6-8u:2199: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2200: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu śikṣate?
K03psp_6-8u:2202: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ jānāti,
K03psp_6-8u:2207: atyantacchidrataś cātyantānṛtataś ca tadyathāpi nāma phenapiṇḍo 'sāraḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:2208: evaṃ rūpaṃ prajānāti. kathaṃ rūpasyotpādavyayau prajānāti?
K03psp_6-8u:2209: nāpi rūpaṃ kutaścid āgacchati nāpi rūpaṃ kvacid gacchati kutaścid āgamanato na kvacid gamanataḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:2210: evaṃ khalu subhūte rūpasyotpādavyayau prajānāti. kathaṃ rūpasya tathatāṃ prajānāti?
K03psp_6-8u:2211: na tathatotpadyate na nirudhyate nāgacchati na gacchati,
K03psp_6-8u:2213: na hānir na vṛddhir evaṃ tathatāṃ prajānāti,
K03psp_6-8u:2214: api tu khalu subhūte tathataiva sā yasmāt tathatety ucyate,
K03psp_6-8u:2218: tadyathāpi nāmodakabudbudā riktakā utpadyante vā nirudhyante vā,
K03psp_6-8u:2219: evaṃ vedanāṃ prajānāti. kathaṃ vedanāyā utpādavyayau prajānāti?
K03psp_6-8u:2220: na sā kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchaty evaṃ vedanāyā utpādavyayau prajānāti. kathaṃ vedanāyās tathatāṃ prajānāti?
K03psp_6-8u:2224: tadyathāpi nāma marīcyām udakam atyantatayā nopalabhyate,
K03psp_6-8u:2225: evaṃ saṃjñāṃ prajānāti. kathaṃ saṃjñāyā utpādavyayau prajānāti?
K03psp_6-8u:2226: na sā kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchaty evaṃ saṃjñāyā utpādavyayau prajānāti. kathaṃ saṃjñāyās tathatāṃ (PSP_6-8:81)
K03psp_6-8u:2230: tadyathāpi nāma kadalyāṃ sāram atyantatayā nopalabhyate,
K03psp_6-8u:2231: evaṃ saṃskārān prajānāti. kathaṃ saṃskārāṇām utpādavyayau prajānāti?
K03psp_6-8u:2232: na te kutaścid āgacchanti na kvacic gacchanty evaṃ saṃskārāṇām utpādavyayau prajānāti. kathaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ tathatāṃ prajānāti?
K03psp_6-8u:2236: tadyathāpi nāma māyākāranirmitaś caturaṅgo balakāya evaṃ vijñānaṃ prajānāti.
K03psp_6-8u:2238: na tat kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati,
K03psp_6-8u:2239: evaṃ vijñānasyotpādavyatau prajānāti. kathaṃ vijñānasya tathatāṃ prajānāti?
K03psp_6-8u:2266: vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātusvabhāvena śūnyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:2267: avidyāvidyāsvabhāvena śunyā. evaṃ saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpam ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇopādānaṃ bhavo jātir,
K03psp_6-8u:2271: bāhyā dharmā bāhyair dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ. kathaṃ satyāni prajānāti?
K03psp_6-8u:2276: evaṃ samudayam evaṃ nirodham evaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadam.
K03psp_6-8u:2277: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2278: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān evaṃ parasparavibhinnān prajānāti tadā na nu bhagavan dharmadhātur vikopito bhavati.
K03psp_6-8u:2280: vikopitaḥ subhūte dharmadhātuḥ syād yadi dharmadhātur vinirmukto 'nyaḥ kaścid dharmaḥ syān,
K03psp_6-8u:2281: na subhūte dharmadhātur vinirmukto 'nyaḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate,
K03psp_6-8u:2282: yady upalabhyeta syād dharmadhātuvikopanā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2283: na hi subhūte tathāgatena vā tathāgataśrāvakeṇa vā dharmadhātur vinirmukto 'nyaḥ kaścid dharmā upalabdhaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:2284: anupalabhya na prajñāpayati dhātuvinirmukto 'nyaḥ kaścid dharma uplabhyate,
K03psp_6-8u:2285: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dharmadhātau śikṣitavyam.
K03psp_6-8u:2286: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2287: dharmadhātau bhagavan śikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kiṃ śikṣitaṃ bhavati?
K03psp_6-8u:2289: dharmadhātau śikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmeṣu śikṣitaṃ bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2294: asaṃskṛto dhātur evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena dharmadhātau śikṣitaṃ bhavati.
K03psp_6-8u:2295: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2296: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmā dharmadhātus tat kiṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2297: śikṣitavyaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2299: kiṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamadhyāne śikṣitavyaṃ dvitīyadhyāne śikṣitavyaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2300: tṛtīyadhyāne śikṣitavyaṃ caturthadhyāne śikṣitavyaṃ maitryāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ karuṇāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2301: śikṣitavyaṃ muditāyāṃ śikṣitavyam upekṣāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattau
K03psp_6-8u:2306: śikṣitavyam ṣaṭsv abhijñāsu śikṣitavyaṃ dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapariniṣpattaye
K03psp_6-8u:2309: śikṣitavyaṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapattaye śikṣitavyaṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2310: yāmānāṃ tuṣitānān nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ brahmapārṣadyānāṃ brahmapurohitānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2311: mahābrahmāṇāṃ parīttābhānām apramāṇābhānām ābhāsvarāṇāṃ parīttaśubhānām apramāṇaśubhānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2313: anabhrakānāṃ puṇyaprasavānāṃ bṛhatphalānāṃ śuddhāvāsānām aspṛhāṇām atapānāṃ sudṛśānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2314: sudarśanānām akaniṣṭhānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapattaye śikṣitavyam. na ca tatropapattaye
K03psp_6-8u:2318: dvitīye tṛtīye caturthe pañcame ṣaṣṭe saptame 'ṣṭame navame kiṃ daśame cittotpāde śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:2319: kiṃ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā bodhisattvabhūmau vā sattvaparipāke vā buddhakṣetrapariśodhane vā dhāraṇīmukheṣu vā śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:2322: atra bodhimārge śikṣamāṇena sarvadharmāḥ sarvākārair jñātavyāḥ. na ca bhagavan dharmadhātāv
K03psp_6-8u:2323: ime vikalpās tasmāt mā haiva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viparyāseṣu caran na
K03psp_6-8u:2325: na hi bhagavan dharmadhātāv ime vikalpā na ca dharmadhātau rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā
K03psp_6-8u:2326: na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na cānyatra rūpād dharmadhātur nānyatra vedanāyā nānyatra
K03psp_6-8u:2327: saṃjñāyā nānyatra saṃskārebhyo nānyatra vijñānād dharmadhātuḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:2328: rūpam eva dharmadhātuḥ dharmadhātur eva rūpaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:2331: saṃskārā eva dharmadhātur dharmadhātur eva saṃskārāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:2332: vijñānam eva dharmadhātur dharmadhātur eva vijñānaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:2333: yathā madhyame parivartakṛtaṃ tathā sarvadharmā jñātavyāḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:2334: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2335: evam etat subhūte evam etad yathā vadasi,
K03psp_6-8u:2336: rūpam eva dharmadhātur dharmadhātur eva rūpam,
K03psp_6-8u:2338: vijñānam eva dharmadhātur dharmadhātur eva vijñānaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:2339: yadi punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kañcid dharmaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2340: dharmadhātuvmirmuktaṃ paśyen nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ pratiṣṭheta
K03psp_6-8u:2341: prajñāpāramitāyām evaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś caran sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmadhātuṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2343: atas tān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmān dharmadhātum eva jñātvānāmakāt (PSP_6-8:85)
K03psp_6-8u:2344: sarvadharmān nāmasaṃketena deśayatīdaṃ rūpam ime vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā,
K03psp_6-8u:2345: idaṃ vijñānam ime skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni,
K03psp_6-8u:2355: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā sa kiṃcid eva dravyam adhiṣṭhāya vividhāni rūpagatāni darśayet,
K03psp_6-8u:2356: strīvigrahaṃ vā puruṣavigrahaṃ vā hastivigrahaṃ vāśvavigrahaṃ vā balīvardavigrahaṃ vā,
K03psp_6-8u:2357: udyānāni vā nagarāṇi vā ārāmaramaṇīyāni vā nadīramaṇīyakaṃ vā puṣkiriṇīramaṇīyakaṃ vā,
K03psp_6-8u:2359: puṣpadhūpagandhamālyagaṇāṃś ca khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā darśayet mahatā gītavāditena janaṃ ramayet,
K03psp_6-8u:2360: dānaṃ vā dadan śīlaṃ vā rakṣan kṣāntiṃ vā saṃpādayamāno vīryaṃ vārabhamāṇo dhyānaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2361: vā samāpadyamānaḥ prajñāṃ vā bhāvayet. sa tatraibhir ākāraiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni
K03psp_6-8u:2362: vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni vā gṛhapatimahāśālakulāni vā darśayec cāturmahārājākāyikān vā devān darśayet,
K03psp_6-8u:2363: sumeruṃ vā darśayet trayastriṃśān vā devān darśayed yāmān tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino
K03psp_6-8u:2364: brahmapārṣadyān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān
K03psp_6-8u:2365: apramāṇaśubhān śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān śuddhāvāsān aspṛhān
K03psp_6-8u:2366: atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān darśayed,
K03psp_6-8u:2367: ākāśānantyāyatanāni vā vijñānānantyāyatanāṃ vā ākiñcanyāyatanāṃ vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanāṃ devān vā darśayed,
K03psp_6-8u:2368: rūpiṇaḥ srotaāpannān vā sakṛdāgāmino vānāgāmino vārhato vā pratyekabuddhān vā ye te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2377: tābhiś ca vikrīḍanti sattvāś ca paripācayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:2381: vaiśāradyāni vā pratisaṃvido vā mahāmaitrīṃ vā mahākaruṇāṃ vā niṣpādayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:2383: sarvāṅgapratyaṅgesu paripūrṇaṃ vā buddhavigraham ādarśayet. tatra bālapṛthagjanāḥ sattvā evaṃ jānīyur,
K03psp_6-8u:2384: aho yāvat suśikṣito batāyaṃ manuṣya iva śobhanaṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:2385: yad utaivaṃ janaṃ rameyati vividhañ ca rūpam ādarśayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2386: yāvad buddhavigrahaṃ vā vistaraśaḥ. ye khalu tatra manuṣyā bhavanti paṇḍitā medhāvino nipuṇās tadrūpayā mīmāṃsayā samanvāgatās teṣām evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:2389: ayaṃ ca manuṣya imaṃ janapadam evam asaṃvidyamāneṣu dharmeṣu ramayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2390: tac cāsya jñānaṃ bhavaty adravye 'sminn eva jano dravyasaṃjñī. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_6-8u:2391: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran na kañcid dharmadhātuvinirmuktaṃ samanupaśyati
K03psp_6-8u:2393: na ca sattvam upalabhate na ca sattvaprajñaptiḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:2395: sa ātmanā ca dānaṃ dadāti parāṃś ca dāne niyojayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2397: ye 'pi cānye dānaṃ dadāti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:2398: ātmanā ca śīlaṃ rakṣati parāṃś ca śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati śīlasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
K03psp_6-8u:2401: ātmanā ca kṣāntiṃ saṃpādayati parāṃś ca kṣāntau niyojayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2405: ātmanā ca vīryam ārabhate parāṃś ca vīrye niyojayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2407: ye 'pi cānye vīryam ārabhante teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:2413: ātmanā ca prajñāṃ bhāvayati parāṃś ca prajñāyāṃ niyojayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2415: ye 'pi cānye prajñāṃ bhāvayanti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:2417: ātmanā ca daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate,
K03psp_6-8u:2419: daśānāṃ ca kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
K03psp_6-8u:2420: ye 'pi cānye daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartante teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:2424: ye 'pi cānye pañcaśikṣāpadasamādāne vartante teṣāṃ varṇavādī bhāvati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:2426: parāṃś cāryāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgate poṣadhe samādāpayaty āryāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatasya ca poṣadhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
K03psp_6-8u:2427: ye 'pi cānye āryāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgataṃ poṣadham upavasanti teṣāñ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:2430: ye 'pi cānye 'pramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpttidhāraṇīmukhāni samāpadyante teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:2434: ye 'pi cānye saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu pravartante teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:2438: bhāṣate, ye 'pi cānye śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni bhāvayanti teṣāñ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:2442: ye 'pi cānye catvāry āryāsatyāni bhāvayanti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:2446: ye 'pi cānye pañcābhijñā niṣpādayanti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:2455: ye 'pi cānye mahākaruṇāṃ bhāvayanti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:2459: ye 'pi cānye dvātriṃśanmahāpurṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanāni niṣpādayanti teṣāñ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:2461: yadi subhūte na dharmadhātur yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt tathā madhye na bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakauśalyena dharmadhātuṃ śodhayet,
K03psp_6-8u:2462: na sattvāṃś ca paripācayet. yasmāt tarhi subhūte dharmadhātur yathaiva pūrvaṃ tathāiva
K03psp_6-8u:2463: paścāt tathāiva madhye tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2466: yadi bhagavann atyantatayā sattvo nopalabhyate na ca sattvaprajñaptiḥ. kasyārthāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
K03psp_6-8u:2467: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2468: bhūtakotiṃ subhūte 'pramāṇīkṛtya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K03psp_6-8u:2469: yadi subhūte anyā bhūtakoṭiḥ syād anyā sattvakoṭir na bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K03psp_6-8u:2470: yasmāt tarhi subhūte nānyā bhūtakoṭir nānyā sattvakoṭis tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satttvānām arthāya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K03psp_6-8u:2471: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś caran bhūtakoṭyavikopanāyai sattvān bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati.
K03psp_6-8u:2472: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2474: kiṃ punar bhagavan bhūtakoṭir bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhet?
K03psp_6-8u:2477: na ca bhagavan svabhāvaḥ svabhāve 'smin pratiṣṭhet,
K03psp_6-8u:2478: tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati?
K03psp_6-8u:2479: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2482: api tu khalu subhūte bodhisatttvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvān bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2483: na cānyā bhūtakoṭir anyā sattvakoṭir iti hi subhūte bhūtakoṭiś ca sattvakoṭiś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K03psp_6-8u:2484: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2485: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām upāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato
K03psp_6-8u:2486: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
K03psp_6-8u:2488: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2489: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sattvān dāne pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2490: dāne pratiṣṭhāpya tasya dānasya pūrvāntāparāntam ācaṣṭe yathaiva tad dānaṃ pūrvāntataḥ śūnyam aparāntataḥ śūnyaṃ madhyataḥ śūnyaṃ tat tathā tad dānaphalam api śūnyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:2495: evaṃ kulaputra sarva ete dharmā bhūtakoṭyāṃ na saṃvidyante,
K03psp_6-8u:2501: yatas tvaṃ kulaputra nānyad dānaṃ maṃsyase,
K03psp_6-8u:2506: tatas ta etad dānam amṛtāvahaṃ bhaviṣyaty amṛtaphalam amṛtaparyavasānam,
K03psp_6-8u:2507: etena ca tvaṃ dānena mā rūpaṃ pratigrahīṣyasi,
K03psp_6-8u:2508: mā vedanāṃ mā saṃjñāṃ mā saṃskārāṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:2509: mā vijñānaṃ pratigrahīṣyasi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2510: tathā hi tavaitad dānaṃ śūnyaṃ dānasvabhāvena,
K03psp_6-8u:2515: na pratigrāhaka upalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2516: tathā hy atyantatayā sarva ete dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:2517: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvān śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2518: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prāṇātipātaṃ prahāya praṇātipātāt prativirato bhava,
K03psp_6-8u:2519: evam adattādānāt kāmamithyācārāt mṛṣāvādāt paiśūnyāt paruṣavacanād abaddhapralāpād abhidhyāyā vyāpādād ehi tvaṃ kulaputra mithyādṛṣṭiṃ prahāya mithyādṛṣṭheḥ prativirato bhava,
K03psp_6-8u:2520: naiṣāṃ kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ kaścit svabhāvo vidyate yathā tvayā kalpito 'haṃ tat kulaputropaparīkṣe svabhāvaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:2521: katama eṣa dharmaḥ prāṇo nāma yo jīvitād vyaparopyate yena vā vyaparopyate?
K03psp_6-8u:2522: evam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācārā mṛṣāvādaḥ paiśūnyaṃ paruṣavacanam abaddhapralāpo 'bhidhyā vyāpādaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:2523: katama eṣa dharmo mithyādṛṣṭir nāma yo vā mithyāṃ paśyaty?
K03psp_6-8u:2524: anena subhūte upāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān paripācayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2525: tasya dānasya ca śīlasya ca phalam ākāṅkṣate,
K03psp_6-8u:2526: tad api dānaphalaṃ ca śīlaphalaṃ ca svabhāvena śūnyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:2527: tataḥ sa kulaputro 'nuttrastasya dānaphalasya ca śīlaphalasya ca phalaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ viditvā (PSP_6-8:91)
K03psp_6-8u:2528: tatra nābhiniviśate anabhiniveśamāno 'vikṣepam utpādya prajñām utpādayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2529: yayā prajñayā sarvānuśayaparyutthānāni cchitvānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāti lokavyavahāreṇa na punaḥ paramārthena. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2530: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharma upalabhyate yaḥ parinirvāyād yena ca parmirvāyād,
K03psp_6-8u:2531: api tu khalu punar etad eva tat parinirvāṇaṃ yad utātyantaśūnyatā.
K03psp_6-8u:2532: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ parasattvān parapudgalān,
K03psp_6-8u:2533: kṣudhān vyāpannacittān dṛṣṭvā evam avavadaty anuśāsti,
K03psp_6-8u:2534: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra kṣāntiṃ saṃpādaya kṣamī ca bhavaśūrato dātacitto 'dhivāsanajātīyo yatra tvaṃ vyāpadyase sarva ete dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā hantopaparīkṣasva
K03psp_6-8u:2539: yā ca prakrtiśūnyatā na sā jātu na śūnyatā,
K03psp_6-8u:2541: na pratyekabuddhair na śrāvakair na bodhisattvair na devair na nāgair na yakṣair
K03psp_6-8u:2542: na gandharvair nāsurair na garuḍair na kiṃnarair na mahoragair na caturbhir mahārājair
K03psp_6-8u:2543: na śakreṇa devānām indreṇa na yāmena devaputreṇa na tuṣitena devaputreṇa na nirmāṇaratinā
K03psp_6-8u:2544: devaputrair na paranirmitavaśavartinā devaputrair na brahmapārṣadyair na brahmapurohitair
K03psp_6-8u:2545: na mahābrahmabhir na parīttābhair nāpramāṇābhair nābhāsvarair na parīttaśubhair nāpramāṇaśubhair
K03psp_6-8u:2546: na śubhakṛtsnair nānabhrakair na puṇyaprasavair na bṛhatphalair na śuddhāvasair nātapair
K03psp_6-8u:2547: na sudṛśair na sudarśanair nākaniṣṭhair devaputrair nākāśānantyāyatanair na vijñānānantyāyatanair
K03psp_6-8u:2548: nākiñcanyāyatanair na naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaiḥ kṛtā hanta kulaputropaparīkṣasva kutrāhaṃ vyāpadye?
K03psp_6-8u:2551: sarva ete dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā na ca śūnyatā kasyacid antike vyāpadyate,
K03psp_6-8u:2552: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2553: niyojayaty ayaṃ hetur idaṃ phalaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ niyojayann anupūrveṇa yāvad anuttarāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2557: na hi prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ kaścid asti yo vā prāpnuyād yena vā prāpnuyād yatra vā prāpnuyād
K03psp_6-8u:2558: iyaṃ subhūte bhūtakoṭir yad uta prakṛtiśūnyatā yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2559: carati sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo nātra sattva upalabhyate na sattvaprajñaptiḥ. tat kasya hetoh?
K03psp_6-8u:2561: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ sattvān hīnavīryān dṛṣṭvā kāyike ca caitasike ca vīrye samādāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2562: na kulaputra prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ kasyacid dharmasya saṃsīdanā vidyate yatra vā saṃsīded yena vā saṃsīded yo vā saṃsīdyet,
K03psp_6-8u:2563: sarva ete dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyāḥ śūnyatā nātivartate hantedānīṃ kāyikaṃ ca caitasikañ
K03psp_6-8u:2564: ca vīryaṃ janayitvā kauśīdyam avasṛjya kuśala eva karmaṇy udyacchasva yadi vā dāne
K03psp_6-8u:2565: yadi vā śīle yadi vā kṣāntau yadi vā vīrye yadi vā dhyāne yadi vā prajñāyāṃ yadi
K03psp_6-8u:2567: yadi vā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu yadi vāryasatyeṣu yadi vādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ yadi
K03psp_6-8u:2568: vā bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ yadi vādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ yadi vā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2569: yadi vābhijñāsu yadi vā daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu yadi vā
K03psp_6-8u:2570: yāvat sarvadharmeṣu sarvān etān kulaputra dharmān anāvaraṇān prekṣasva svalakṣaṇaśūnyatayā
K03psp_6-8u:2571: na hy anāvaraṇeṣu dharmeṣu kasyacit saṃsīdanā vidyate,
K03psp_6-8u:2572: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sattvān samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2573: tathā ca pratiṣṭhāpayati yathā dvayan na saṃvidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2575: na hy advayo dharmaḥ kvacit kauśīdyam āpadyate.
K03psp_6-8u:2576: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśūnyatayā vīryasattvān avatārayaty anuśāsti,
K03psp_6-8u:2577: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra vīryam ārabhasva yadi vā dāne yadi vā śīle yadi vā kṣāntau yadi
K03psp_6-8u:2578: vā vīrye yadi vā dhyāne yadi vā prajñāyāṃ yadi vā smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgeṣu (PSP_6-8:93)
K03psp_6-8u:2579: yadi vā vimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukheṣu yadi vā daśatathāgatabaleṣu yadi vā
K03psp_6-8u:2580: caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu yadi vā catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu yadi vā mahākaruṇāyāṃ yadi vāṣṭādaśasv
K03psp_6-8u:2581: āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu mā etān dharmān dvayato manasikuru mādvayataḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2582: prakṛtiśūnyā hy ete dharmā na hi prakṛtiśūnyatā dvayato mānasikartavyā nādvayataḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:2583: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran sattvān paripācayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2588: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvānām arthaṃ karoty upāyakauśalyena dhyānabhāvanāyām evāvatārayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2589: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra dhyānaṃ bhāvaya mā ca vikṣepasaṃjñī bhava. tat kasya hetoh?
K03psp_6-8u:2590: prakṛtiśūnyā hy ete dharmā na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharma upalabhyate yo vikṣepyate vā ekāgrī bhavati vā,
K03psp_6-8u:2591: sa tvam atra dhyāne sthitvā yad yad evaṃ kuśalaṃ karma kariṣyasi kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā,
K03psp_6-8u:2592: yadi vā dānan dāsyasi yadi vā śīlaṃ rakṣasi yadi vā kṣāntiṃ saṃpādayiṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:2593: yadi vā vīryam ārabhase yadi vā dhyānam utpādayiṣyasi yadi vā prajñā bhāvayiṣyasi,
K03psp_6-8u:2596: yadi vāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamādhisamāpattīr yadi vābhijñā yadi vā daśabalavaiśāradyapratisamvido
K03psp_6-8u:2597: yadi vā mahāmaitrī yadi vā mahākaruṇā yadi vāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān yadi vā
K03psp_6-8u:2598: dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni yadi vāśītyanuvyañjanāni yadi vā śrāvakamārgaṃ yadi
K03psp_6-8u:2599: vā pratyekabuddhamārgaṃ yadi vā bodhisattvamārgaṃ yadi vā buddhamārgaṃ yadi vā srotaāpattiphalaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2600: yadi vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ yadi vānāgāmiphalaṃ yadi vārhattvaṃ yadi vā pratyekabodhiṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2602: sarvākārajñatāṃ yadi vā sattvān paripācayiṣyasi yadi vā buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyasi,
K03psp_6-8u:2603: tasya te ime kuśalā dharmā alpakṛcchreṇa prādurbhaviṣyanti prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ carataḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:2604: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:2606: kiṃ kuśalagaveṣī sattvānām arthaṃ kurvan buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ satatasamitaṃ saṃkrāmati,
K03psp_6-8u:2608: yaṃ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇoti,
K03psp_6-8u:2609: sa tasya jātivyativṛttasyāpi na jātu vipraṇakṣyati yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_6-8u:2610: abhisaṃbuddhaḥ syād dhāraṇīpratilabdhaś ca satatasamitaṃ bhavaty ahīṇendriyo yadi
K03psp_6-8u:2611: vā kāyendriyeṇa yadi vā vāgindriyeṇa yadi vā manaindriyeṇa.
K03psp_6-8u:2613: tathā hi sarvākārajñatāṃ satatasamitaṃ bhāvayaty anayā sarvākārajñatayā subhāvitayā sarvamārgāḥ subhāvitā bhavanti,
K03psp_6-8u:2614: yadi vā śrāvakamārgo yadi vā pratyekabuddhamārgo yadi vā bodhisattvamārgas tasyābhijñā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satatasamitam upakārībhūtā bhaviṣyanty avipraṇāśayogeṇa,
K03psp_6-8u:2615: sa tāsu vaipākikīṣv abhijñāsu sthitvā sattvānām arthaṃ karoti na parihīyate pañcagatike saṃsāre saṃsarann,
K03psp_6-8u:2616: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvopāyakauśalyena sattvānām arthaṃ karoti.
K03psp_6-8u:2617: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvopāyakauśalyena sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:2618: sa tayā prajñāpāramitayā subhāvitayā sattvān evam avavadaty evam anuśāsti,
K03psp_6-8u:2619: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra yad yad evaṃ karma karoṣi kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā tat sarvam
K03psp_6-8u:2620: amṛtādhigamāya pariṇāmaya tathā te ete dharmāḥ sarva amṛtāvigamāya bhaviṣyanty amṛtaparyavasānāya ca,
K03psp_6-8u:2621: na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharmo 'bhiniviśate yaḥ parihīyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2623: na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāḥ kaścit parihīyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2624: tathā hi prakṛtiśūnyatā na bhāvo nābhāvas tat kim abhāvo 'bhāve dharme parihāsyaty,
K03psp_6-8u:2626: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān evam avavadaty evam anuśāsti,
K03psp_6-8u:2627: sa evam avavadann evam anuśāsan na jātv akarmako 'bhūt,
K03psp_6-8u:2628: sa ātmanā ca satatasamitaṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu vartate,
K03psp_6-8u:2629: parāṃś ca daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayaty evaṃ pañcasu śikṣāpadeṣu āryāṣṭāṅge
K03psp_6-8u:2630: samanvāgata upoṣadhe. ātmanā ca dhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyate parāṃś ca dhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu samādāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2631: ātmanā ca satatasamitaṃ maitrīvihārī bhavati parāṃś ca satatasamitaṃ maitrīvihāre samādāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2632: ātmanā ca satatasamitaṃ karuṇāvihārī bhavati parāṃś ca satatasamitaṃ karuṇāvihāre samādāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2635: ātmanā ca satatasamitam upekṣāvihārī bhavati parāṃś ca satatasamitam upekṣāvihāre samādāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2637: ātmanā ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni bhāvayati parāṃś ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu samādāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2638: ātmanā ca sarvapāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu ca śikṣate parāṃś ca sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvapāramitāsu ca samādāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2639: ātmanā ca daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu śikṣate parāṃś ca daśabalavaiśāradyapratisamvidāvenikabuddhadharmeṣu samādāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2640: ātmanā ca dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanāni paripūrayati parāṃś ca dvātriṃsanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanapariniṣpattaye samādāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2642: jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś ca srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2643: ātmanā ca sakṛdāgāmiphale jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś ca sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2644: ātmanā cānāgāmiphale jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś cānāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2645: ātmanā cārhattve jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś cārhattve pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2646: ātmanā ca pratyekabodhau jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś ca pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2647: ātmanā cānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau mārgam utpādayati parāṃś ca tatra mārge 'vavadaty anuśāsti pratiṣṭhāpayati. evaṃ khalu (PSP_6-8:96)
K03psp_6-8u:2648: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacaryāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena na jātv akarmako 'bhūt.
K03psp_6-8u:2649: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2650: yadi bhagavan prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sattvā upalabhyante,
K03psp_6-8u:2652: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisaṃpratiṣṭhate?
K03psp_6-8u:2653: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2655: yathā vadasi prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sattvā upalabhyante na dharmo nādharmaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:2656: yadi punaḥ subhūte prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā abhaviṣyan na tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyām abhisaṃprāsthāsyad,
K03psp_6-8u:2657: evaṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya prakṛtiśūnyaṃ dharmaṃ deśayed,
K03psp_6-8u:2660: vijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pañcaskandhāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā iti dharmaṃ deśayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2661: dvādaśāyatanāny aṣṭādaśadhātavaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā iti dharmaṃ deśayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2662: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni
K03psp_6-8u:2663: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni
K03psp_6-8u:2665: trīṇi vimokṣamukhāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo daśatathāgatabalāni
K03psp_6-8u:2666: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā
K03psp_6-8u:2669: sarvākārajñatā sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇaṃ prakṛtiśūnyam iti dharmaṃ deśayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2670: yadi punaḥ subhūte 'dhyātmaśūnyatā na prakṛtiśūnyābhaviṣyan na tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ dharmam uddekṣyad,
K03psp_6-8u:2671: evaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na prakṛtiśūnyābhaviṣyan na tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ dharmam uddekṣyan,
K03psp_6-8u:2672: na ca prakṛtiśūnyatā vinaśyati na ca kūṭasthā bhavati na ca sā punar apakrāmati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2673: na hi sā deśasthā na pradeśasthā na ca sā kvacid gacchati nāpi (PSP_6-8:97)
K03psp_6-8u:2676: yatra na kasyacid dharmasyācayo vā upacayo vopalabhyate,
K03psp_6-8u:2677: hānir vā vṛddhir vā utpādo vā nirodho vā saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā eṣā sā prakṛtidharmāṇāṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:2678: yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhuṃ saṃprasthitā na kasyacid dharmasya prasthāne paśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:2681: yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmān prakṛtiśūnyān dṛṣṭvā na pratyudāvartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2682: tathā hi na kasyacid dharmasyāvaraṇaṃ vā samanupaśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:2685: yatra prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ na sattva upalabhyate na sattvaprajñaptir nātmā na sattvo
K03psp_6-8u:2686: na jīvo na jantur na poṣo na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako
K03psp_6-8u:2688: na rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam upalabhyate yāvat sarvadharmā nādhyātmā na bahirdhā nādhyātmabahirdhā nopalabhyate,
K03psp_6-8u:2691: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatanirmitasya bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā bodhisattvo vānuprabandhaṃ kalpaṃ śatasahasraṃ dharmaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2693: subhūte api nu te nirmitā bhavyāḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā prāpayituṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:2695: anāgāmiphalaṃ vā prāpayitum arhattvaṃ vā prāpayitum,
K03psp_6-8u:2699: tathā hi teṣāṃ bhagavan vastu nāsti.
K03psp_6-8u:2702: avastukānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamaḥ sa sattvo yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niveśayati
K03psp_6-8u:2703: pratiṣṭhāpayati srotaāpattiphale vā sakṛdāgāmiphale vānāgāmiphale vā arhattve vā
K03psp_6-8u:2705: 'nyatra vipacyā sāpannāyāḥ saṃjñāyā aviparyāse niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2706: yaś cāsau viparyāsaḥ sa evāviparyāsaḥ kalpanābhiṣyandam upādāyāvikalpaś cāviparyāso,
K03psp_6-8u:2707: yatrāvikalpas tatra viparyāso nāsti na tatrātmā na sattvo na jīvo na jantur na poṣo
K03psp_6-8u:2708: na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako na jānako na paśyako
K03psp_6-8u:2709: na tatra rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ
K03psp_6-8u:2710: na pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni na tatra pāramitā na śūnyatāmukhāni na bodhipakṣyā dharmā
K03psp_6-8u:2713: eṣā sā prakṛtiśūnyatā yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati caraṃs tāṃś ca viparyastān sattvān sattvasaṃjñāyā mocayaty,
K03psp_6-8u:2716: ye 'pi te anāsravā dharmās tad yathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni
K03psp_6-8u:2717: catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ so
K03psp_6-8u:2718: 'pi na tasya yathā na paramārtho yad utāsaṃskṛtam anutpādo 'prādurbhāvo 'bhāvaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:2720: eṣā sā sarvabuddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhir yatra na jīvo na jantur na poṣo na puruṣo
K03psp_6-8u:2721: na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako na jānako na paśyako na rūpaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2722: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā
K03psp_6-8u:2723: na pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni na pāramitā na śūnyatāmukhāni na bodhipakṣyā dharmā nāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni
K03psp_6-8u:2725: na mahākaruṇā na dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny aśītyanuvyañjanāni na hi bodhisattvo
K03psp_6-8u:2726: mahāsattvo mārgasya kṛtaśo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthito 'nyatra prakṛtiśūnyatā
K03psp_6-8u:2727: parijñānārthaṃ sā ca prakṛtiśūnyatā pūrvaṃ vā paścād vā madhye vā na jātu sāprakṛtiśūnyatā
K03psp_6-8u:2728: tatra prakṛtiśūnyatā pāramitāyāṃ sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ (PSP_6-8:99)
K03psp_6-8u:2729: sattvān sattvasaṃjñinaḥ sattvasaṃjñāyā mocanārthaṃ mārgajñatāyāṃ carati sa mārgajñatāyāṃ caran sarvamārgeṣu caran sarvamārgeṣu carati,
K03psp_6-8u:2731: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān paripūrya sattvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhyāyuḥsaṃskārān adhiṣṭhāyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_6-8u:2734: eṣā sā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhanetrī yad uta prakṛtiśūnyatā,
K03psp_6-8u:2735: ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani buddhā bhagavantas teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām iyam eva buddhanetrī yad uta prakṛtiśūnyatā,
K03psp_6-8u:2736: ye 'pi te 'nāgate 'dhvani bhaviṣyanti buddhā bhagavantaḥ teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām iyam eva buddhanetrī yad uta prakṛtiśūnyatā,
K03psp_6-8u:2737: ye 'pi te etarhi daśadiglokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:2738: teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām iyam eva buddhanetrī yad uta prakṛtiśūnyatā,
K03psp_6-8u:2740: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ teṣāṃ cāntike tathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prakṛtiśūnyatā pāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:2743: āścaryam idaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yatra nāma ime prakṛtiśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu caranti,
K03psp_6-8u:2744: tāṃ ca prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ na vikopayatīty anyad rūpam anyā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
K03psp_6-8u:2745: anyā vedanā anyā saṃjñā anye saṃskārā,
K03psp_6-8u:2748: anyā pāramitā anyāni śūnyatāmukhāny anye bodhipakṣyā dharmā anyā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
K03psp_6-8u:2753: prakṛtiśūnyataivānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir eva prakṛtiśūnyatā.
K03psp_6-8u:2754: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2755: yadi subhūte 'nyad rūpaṃ syād anyā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
K03psp_6-8u:2756: anyā vedanā anyā saṃjñā anye saṃskārā,
K03psp_6-8u:2764: na subhūte rūpaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyām abhisaṃbhotsyate,
K03psp_6-8u:2765: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyām abhisaṃbhotsyate. yasmāt tarhi subhūte rūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatā,
K03psp_6-8u:2769: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
K03psp_6-8u:2770: sarvavimokṣāḥ sarvasamāpattayaḥ sarvābhijñāḥ sarvāṇi dhyānāni sarvāṇy apramāṇāni
K03psp_6-8u:2771: sarvā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ sarvatathāgatabalāni sarvabodhisattvabhūmayaś catvāri vaiśāradyāni
K03psp_6-8u:2774: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpaṃ sarvākārajñatāyām abhisaṃbudhyeta,
K03psp_6-8u:2777: yāvad bodhiṃ sarvākārajñatāyām abhisaṃbudhyeta. yasmāt subhūte prakṛtiśūnyataiva rūpaṃ rūpam eva prakṛtiśūnyatā,
K03psp_6-8u:2781: tasmāt subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyān sarvadharmān viditvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ pratiṣṭhet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2782: na hi tatra kaścid dharmo vinaśyati vā kūṭastho vā bhavaty avakrāmati vānyatra sadevako lokaḥ samārakaḥ sabrahmakaḥ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikā prajāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:2784: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān,
K03psp_6-8u:2790: caranti te 'haṃkāramamakārāv abhiniviśyādhyātmikabāhyāni vastūni abhiniviśanta upalabhante,
K03psp_6-8u:2792: vedanāṃ vedanātvena saṃjñāṃ saṃjñātvena saṃskārān saṃskāratvena,
K03psp_6-8u:2794: te na parimucyante jātyā jarayā maraṇena śokena paridevena duḥkhena daurmanasyena na parimucyante,
K03psp_6-8u:2796: tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā rūpaṃ na vikopayati śūnyam iti vāśūnyam iti vā,
K03psp_6-8u:2798: vijñānaṃ na vikopayati śūnyam iti vāśūnyam iti vā,
K03psp_6-8u:2801: daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
K03psp_6-8u:2802: na vikopayati śūnyā iti vāśūnyā iti vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2803: na hi śūnyatā vikopayatīdaṃ rūpam iyaṃ vedanā iyaṃ saṃjñā ime saṃskārā,
K03psp_6-8u:2804: idaṃ vijñānam ime skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā imāni pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni,
K03psp_6-8u:2805: iyaṃ śūnyatā ime bodhipakṣyā dharmā imāny āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni,
K03psp_6-8u:2806: imāḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñā ime daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā iyam anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte nākāśam ākāśaṃ vikopayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2807: adhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vā na cādhyātmikam ākāśaṃ bāhyam ākāśaṃ vikopayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2808: na ca bāhyam ākāśam ādhyātmikam ākāśaṃ vikopayaty,
K03psp_6-8u:2809: evaṃ eva subhūte na rūpaṃ śūnyatāṃ vikopayati,
K03psp_6-8u:2810: na ca śūnyatā rūpaṃ vikopayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2811: na hi tasya svabhāvo 'sti ya evaṃ vikopayaty ayaṃ śūnyo 'yaṃ na śūnyaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:2813: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2814: yadi bhagavan na bhedaḥ sarvadhrmāṇāṃ kuto bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃprasthito bhavaty anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ? na
K03psp_6-8u:2819: na dvayacaritasya bodhir na dvaidhīkārā bodhiḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:2821: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dvaidhīkāreṇa carati bodhau,
K03psp_6-8u:2822: naiva ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhī rūpe carati,
K03psp_6-8u:2823: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
K03psp_6-8u:2825: na skandhadhātvāyataneṣu carati na pratītyasamutpādeṣu carati,
K03psp_6-8u:2833: na samyaksaṃbodhau carati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2834: na hi bodhir aham iti śabdo rūpe carati,
K03psp_6-8u:2836: na bodhir aham iti śabdo vijñāne carati,
K03psp_6-8u:2837: evaṃ yāvan na bodhir aham iti śabdaḥ samyaksaṃbodhau carati,
K03psp_6-8u:2838: na bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya samyaksaṃbodhir udgrahe carati.
K03psp_6-8u:2839: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2840: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir nodgrahe carati,
K03psp_6-8u:2841: kutra tarhi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhiś carati?
K03psp_6-8u:2844: subhūte kutra tathāgatanirmitasya buddhiś caraty udgrahe vānudgrahe vā.
K03psp_6-8u:2849: subhūte 'rhataḥ svapnāntaragatasya kutra buddhiś caraty udgrahe vānudgrahe vā.
K03psp_6-8u:2852: yadā bhagavann atyanto 'rhan na svapiti kutaḥ svapne buddhiś caraty udgrahe vānudgrahe vā?
K03psp_6-8u:2854: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na bodhir udgrahe vānudgrahe vā carati.
K03psp_6-8u:2855: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2856: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhir nodgrahe vānudgrahe vā carati na (PSP_6-8:103)
K03psp_6-8u:2857: rūpe na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne carati,
K03psp_6-8u:2858: na skandhadhātvāyataneṣu na pratītyasamutpādeṣu na pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu na pāramitāsu
K03psp_6-8u:2861: na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ carati. kathaṃ punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu
K03psp_6-8u:2862: caritvā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu sarvaśūnyatāsu dhyāneṣv
K03psp_6-8u:2866: abhijñāsu sthitvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhakṣetrañ ca pariśodhya sattvāṃś
K03psp_6-8u:2867: ca paripācya sarvākārajñatām abhisaṃbhotsyate. na ca bhagavann asthitvā daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu
K03psp_6-8u:2868: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣv āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukheṣu
K03psp_6-8u:2870: pañcasv abhijñāsv asthitvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhakṣetrañ cāpariśodhya
K03psp_6-8u:2875: na śakyāparipūrayitvā daśabodhisattvabhūmīr daśapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān
K03psp_6-8u:2880: paripūrayitvā punaḥ subhūte śakyā daśabhūmīr daśapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāś catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra (PSP_6-8:104)
K03psp_6-8u:2882: trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni yāvad aśītyanuvyañjanāni mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇāṃ mahāmuditāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2884: tat punaḥ subhūte rūpaprakṛtau sthitvā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā,
K03psp_6-8u:2885: vijñānaprakṛtau sthitvā yāvad bodhiprakṛtau sthitvā sā ca prakṛtir upaśāntā na kasyacid
K03psp_6-8u:2886: dharmasyopacayaṃ vā karoty apacayaṃ vā karoty utpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā ucchedaṃ vā
K03psp_6-8u:2887: śāśvataṃ vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā prāptiṃ vābhisamayaṃ vā.
K03psp_6-8u:2889: sa khalu subhūte lokavyavahāraprajñaptidharmam upādāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_6-8u:2890: na punar atra paramārthaṃ kaścid asti rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā,
K03psp_6-8u:2891: vijñānaṃ vā skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā pāramitā
K03psp_6-8u:2892: vā śūnyatā vā bodhipakṣyā vā dharmā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni
K03psp_6-8u:2894: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir yo vānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau caret,
K03psp_6-8u:2895: sarva ete dharmā lokavyavahāram upādāya prajñaptā na punaḥ paramārthena. sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya bodhaye carati,
K03psp_6-8u:2896: na punas tac cittam upalabhate na sattvaṃ na bodhiṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:2898: subhūte yasmin samaye subhūtinā kleśāḥ prahīnā indriyāṇi pratilabdhāni,
K03psp_6-8u:2899: ānantaryaś ca samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā prāptaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā prāptam anāgāmiphalaṃ vā prāptaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā prāptam,
K03psp_6-8u:2900: api nu tasmin samaye svapna upalabhyate,
K03psp_6-8u:2905: tat kathaṃ subhūtināmnā sthavireṇa tvayārhattvaṃ prāptam iti prajñaptam?
K03psp_6-8u:2909: evam etat subhūte lokavyavahāreṇa bodhisattvaḥ prajñapto lokavyavahāreṇa rūpaṃ prajñaptaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:2912: ca prajñaptāni lokavyavahāreṇa sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyā dharmā
K03psp_6-8u:2916: na punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena samyaksaṃbodhau kaścid dharma upalabdho yasya
K03psp_6-8u:2917: dharmasyopacayaṃ vāpacayaṃ vā kuryād upakāraṃ vāpakāraṃ vā kuryād dharmāṇāṃ prakṛtim
K03psp_6-8u:2923: yāvat sarvadharmān upalapsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
K03psp_6-8u:2924: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām arthaṃ karoti.
K03psp_6-8u:2926: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2927: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvapāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu saptatriṃsatsu
K03psp_6-8u:2928: bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv
K03psp_6-8u:2929: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caran bodhimārgañ ca pariśodhyābhavyo 'nuttarāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:2931: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
K03psp_6-8u:2933: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena dānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
K03psp_6-8u:2935: na dānapratigrāhakan nāpy anyatraiteṣu dharmeṣu carati, (PSP_6-8:106)
K03psp_6-8u:2936: tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo utsahate bodhimārge caritum,
K03psp_6-8u:2937: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
K03psp_6-8u:2938: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na ca prajñām upalabhate,
K03psp_6-8u:2939: yo vā bhāvayed yad vā bhāvayet tad api nopalabhate nāpy anyatraiteṣu dharmeṣu carati,
K03psp_6-8u:2940: tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva utsahate bodhimārge caritum. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_6-8u:2941: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
K03psp_6-8u:2942: evaṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caran buddhadharmān na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:2943: yo vā bhāvayati yad vā bhāvayati tad api na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:2945: tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva utsahate bodhimārge caritum,
K03psp_6-8u:2946: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām upāyakauśalyenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
K03psp_6-8u:2947: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2948: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dāne yogam āpadyate?
K03psp_6-8u:2949: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:2950: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carann upāyakauśalyena rūpaṃ na yojayati na viyojayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2951: tathā hi rūpasya svabhāvo nāsti yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā,
K03psp_6-8u:2953: vijñānaṃ na yojayati na viyojayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2954: tathā hi vijñānasya svabhāvo nāsti yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā,
K03psp_6-8u:2955: evaṃ na dānapāramitā na śīlapāramitā na kṣāntipāramitā na vīryapāramitā na dhyānapāramitā na prajñāpāramitā yojayati na viyojayati. tat kasya
K03psp_6-8u:2956: tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā,
K03psp_6-8u:2957: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanāni na pratītyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
K03psp_6-8u:2958: dharmā nādhyātmaśūnyatā na bahirdhāśūnyatā nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā na yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā
K03psp_6-8u:2960: na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni na vimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni nābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā yojayanti na viyojayanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2961: tathā hi buddhadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo nāsti yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā.
K03psp_6-8u:2963: yadi bhagavan na kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā,
K03psp_6-8u:2966: na hy aśikṣitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śakyā bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhum.
K03psp_6-8u:2969: yathā vadasi na śakyāśikṣitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbodhuṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:2970: yadi khalūpāyakauśalyena śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvam upalabhate gṛhṇāti. atha na
K03psp_6-8u:2972: iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā iyaṃ vīryapāramitā iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā iyaṃ śīlapāramitā iyaṃ dānapāramitā,
K03psp_6-8u:2973: idaṃ rūpam iyaṃ vedanā iyaṃ saṃjñā ime saṃskārā idaṃ vijñānam ime skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:2974: imāni pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni imāḥ pāramitā imāḥ śūnyatā ime bodhipakṣyā dharmā imāny āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni,
K03psp_6-8u:2978: tat kiṃ grahīṣyaty agrāhyā śāriputra prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_6-8u:2988: iyaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitāgrāhyapāramitā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_6-8u:2989: atra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ yatra śikṣamāṇo bodhiattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣām api na lapsyate, (PSP_6-8:108)
K03psp_6-8u:2990: kutaḥ punar bodhiṃ kutaḥ punaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ kutaḥ punar bodhisattvadharmān kutaḥ
K03psp_6-8u:2991: punaḥ pratyekabuddhadharmān kutaḥ punaḥ śrāvakadharmān kutaḥ punaḥ pṛthagjanadharmān. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:2992: tathā hi śāriputra na kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvo vidyate,
K03psp_6-8u:2993: evam abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamaḥ pṛthagjanadharmaḥ katamaḥ srotaāpannaḥ
K03psp_6-8u:2994: katamaḥ sakṛdāgāmī katamo 'nāgāmī katamo 'rhan katamaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ katamo bodhisattvaḥ
K03psp_6-8u:2998: yeṣu dharmeṣu nirdiśyate pṛthagjano vā srotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmī vānāgāmī vārhan vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā samyaksaṃbuddho vā.
K03psp_6-8u:3000: avastukānāṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ kutaḥ āgamaḥ prajñāyate?
K03psp_6-8u:3001: ayaṃ pṛthagjano 'yaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:3002: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3003: kiṃ nu śāriputra rūpasya vastv asti bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ yathā bālapṛthagjano 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:3006: naitat sugatānyatra viparyastaś cittaḥ pṛthagjano rūpam ity abhiniviṣṭo,
K03psp_6-8u:3009: kiṃ nu śāriputra vijñānasya vastv asti bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ yathā bālapṛthagjano 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:3012: naitat sugatānyatra viparyastacittaḥ pṛthagjano vijñānam ity abhiniviṣṭaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:3014: kiṃ punaḥ śāriputra yāvat sarvadharmāṇāṃ vastv asti bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ yathā bālapṛthakjano 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:3016: no bhagavan naitat sugatānyatra viparyastacittaḥ pṛthagjano yāvat sarvadharmā ity abhiniviṣṭaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:3018: evam eva śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyenāvastukān dharmān paśyann (PSP_6-8:109)
K03psp_6-8u:3021: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3022: katamaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalyenāvastukān sarvadharmān paśyann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitaḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:3023: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3024: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kasyacid dharmasya vastu samanupaśyati yatra vastūni pratihanyeta,
K03psp_6-8u:3025: yatra pratihanyamāna ālīyeta ālīyamānaḥ saṃsīdet kauśīdyam āpadyeta,
K03psp_6-8u:3026: tasmāt tarhi śāriputra avastukā ajīvā nirjīvā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3027: anyatra samohena sattvā abhiniviṣṭāḥ skandheṣu vā dhātuṣu vā āyataneṣu vā pratītyasamutpādeṣu
K03psp_6-8u:3028: pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu vā tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhāvasvabhāvān
K03psp_6-8u:3029: sarvadharmān saṃpaśyamānaḥ prakṛtiśūnyān svalakṣaṇaśūnyān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
K03psp_6-8u:3030: māyākārasadṛśam ātmānam adhiṣṭhāya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3031: ye sattvā matsariṇas teṣāṃ dānakathāṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:3037: yadā te sattvā dāne pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti,
K03psp_6-8u:3038: śīle kṣāntau vīrye dhyāne prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti,
K03psp_6-8u:3039: tadā teṣāṃ sattvānām anuśāsanīṃ kathāṃ karoty āryāṃ nairyāṇikīṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3044: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3045: kiṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva aupalaṃbhiko 'saṃvidyamānāṃ sattvān dāne niyojayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3050: prajñāyāṃ niyojayati. uttare cācāryā nairyāṇikīṃ kathāṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:3054: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3055: na khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kaścid upalaṃbhaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:3056: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kañcit sattvam upalabhate 'nyatra saṃvṛttisaṃketena vyavaharati,
K03psp_6-8u:3057: tac chāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvābhyāṃ satyābhyāṃ sthitvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3058: na hi śāriputra dvābhyāṃ satyābhyāṃ sattva upalabhyate na sattvaprajñaptiḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3059: api tu khalūpāyakauśalyena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3060: tat te sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharma ātmānaṃ nopalabhante,
K03psp_6-8u:3063: evaṃ khalu śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
K03psp_6-8u:3064: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3065: mahotpādo batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na ca nāma bhagavan kasyacid dharmasyaikatvaṃ vā nānātvaṃ vā pṛthaktvaṃ vā upalabhate,
K03psp_6-8u:3066: evaṃrūpaṃ ca saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyate yena saṃnāhena saṃnahya na kāmadhātau dṛśyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3073: sattvāprajñaptyā sattvābandhaḥ sattvāmokṣaḥ sattvābandhāmokṣād asaṃkleśāvyavadānam asaṃkleśāvyavadānān na gatisaṃbhedaḥ prajñāyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3076: yena vipākenātmanā sattvāḥ pañcagatike saṃsāre saṃdṛśyeran.
K03psp_6-8u:3077: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3078: evam etac chāriputraivam etad yathā vācaṃ bhāṣase,
K03psp_6-8u:3079: sacet pūrvaṃ sattvabhāvo 'bhaviṣyat paścād abhāvas tadā syād eṣa doṣaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3080: bodhisattvo 'pi tathāgato 'pi pūrvabhāvo 'bhaviṣyat paścād abhāvas tadā syād eṣa doṣaḥ,
