K03psp_6-8u:3081: pañcagatiko vā saṃsāraḥ pūrvabhāvo 'bhaviṣyat paścād abhāvas tadā syād eṣa doṣaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3082: yasmāt tarhi śāriputrotpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaiva eṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā
K03psp_6-8u:3083: tatra nātmā na sattvo na jīvo na jantur (PSP_6-8:111)
K03psp_6-8u:3084: na poṣo na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako na jānako na paśyakaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3086: kuto vedanā kutaḥ saṃjñā kutaḥ saṃskārāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3088: kutaḥ skandhadhātvāyatanāni kutaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ kutaḥ pratītyasamutpannadharmāḥ kutaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni bhaviṣyanty,
K03psp_6-8u:3089: asatām eṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kutaḥ pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāro bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3090: yataḥ sattvāḥ parimocayitavyāḥ syur yasmāt tarhi śāriputra ime dharmā īdṛśāḥ svabhāvaśūnyās
K03psp_6-8u:3091: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvakāṇāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāc chrutvānuttarāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:3093: na cātra kaścid dharmasvabhāvo yam upalabhate yo vā śakyo 'dhimoktuṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3095: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyate yena saṃnāhena saṃnahya na pratyudāvartate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_6-8u:3100: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra māyākāranirmitaḥ puruṣo bahūni prāṇikoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇy abhinirmimīte,
K03psp_6-8u:3102: saṃtarpyaivam udānam udānayed bahu me puṇyaṃ prasūtam iti. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_6-8u:3103: śāriputrāpi nu tatra kaścid bhojito vā saṃtarpito vā bhavet.
K03psp_6-8u:3107: evam eva śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu
K03psp_6-8u:3108: caran caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu
K03psp_6-8u:3109: caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣv ṛddhipādeṣu pañcendriyeṣu pañcasu baleṣu saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu
K03psp_6-8u:3110: āryāṣṭāṅge mārge sarvaśūnyatāsu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣv aṣṭasu vimokṣamukheṣu navasv
K03psp_6-8u:3111: anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu daśasu
K03psp_6-8u:3112: tathāgatabaleṣu daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu (PSP_6-8:112)
K03psp_6-8u:3113: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāñ caran bodhimārgāṃ ca paripūrayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3114: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati na ca kañcit sattvam upalabhate yam upalabhya vinayet.
K03psp_6-8u:3116: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3117: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgo yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena caratā sattvāḥ paripācayitavyāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3119: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3120: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caran
K03psp_6-8u:3121: śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:3123: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran,
K03psp_6-8u:3126: caran sattvān paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati.
K03psp_6-8u:3128: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān paripācayati?
K03psp_6-8u:3130: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti sattvebhyo dānaṃ datvā evam avavadati,
K03psp_6-8u:3131: iha kulaputrā mā dānam āgrahaṇato grahīṣyatha,
K03psp_6-8u:3134: neha kulaputrā paramārthena dānaṃ na dānapatir na pratigrāhakaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3136: na ca prakṛtiśūnyā dharmān gṛhṇanty agrāhyā śūnyatā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvebhyo dānaṃ dadāti,
K03psp_6-8u:3137: na cātra dānam upalabhate na dānapatiṃ na pratigrāhakam anupalaṃbhapāramitaiṣā (PSP_6-8:113)
K03psp_6-8u:3139: sa dānadātṛpratigrāhakān anupalaṃbhamānaḥ sattvān srotaāpattiphale niyojayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3143: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau niyojayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān paripācayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3146: dānasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate ye 'pi cānye dānaṃ dadāti,
K03psp_6-8u:3148: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃrūpaṃ dānaṃ datvā kṣatriyamahāśālakulānāṃ vā sahavratāyopapadyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3153: sa tatra sattvāṃś caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ saṃgṛhṇāti,
K03psp_6-8u:3156: arthacaryayā samānārthatayā ca. evaṃ tān sattvān dānena saṃgṛhyānupūrveṇa śīle kṣāntau vīrye dhyāne prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3157: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu
K03psp_6-8u:3158: caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣu pañcasv indriyeṣu pañcasu baleṣu saptabodhyaṅgeṣv
K03psp_6-8u:3162: pratyekāṃ bodhim anuprāpayaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3164: tatra na kaścid dharmaḥ svabhāvena saṃvidyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3169: evaṃ yūyam ātmanaś ca mahāntam arthaṃ kariṣyatha,
K03psp_6-8u:3170: parāṃś ca mahaty arthe niyojayiṣyatha. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3171: yathā caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya na jātu durgatiṃ patati,
K03psp_6-8u:3172: na jātu cakravartirājyan na kārayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:3173: yādṛśaṃ hi vījaṃ tādṛśaṃ phalaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:3174: tasya cakravartino yadā yācanakā āgacchanti tadā tasya cakravartino rājña evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:3175: yeṣāṃ mayā kṛtaśaś cakravartiphalaṃ parigṛhītaṃ nānyatra sattvānām (PSP_6-8:114)
K03psp_6-8u:3176: arthāya, tad etad yuṣmākam eva dattaṃ bhavatu,
K03psp_6-8u:3177: tasmd atra na mayānena cakravartirājyenārthaḥ prāg evānye nānyatra sattvānām arthāya saṃsāra upāttaḥ sa karuṇāyamāno mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3178: yāvan mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrayitvā sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:3179: te ca sattvā nopalabhyante ye pariniṣpannāḥ syur ity anyatra saṃjñānām asaṃketaṃ vyavahāra iti,
K03psp_6-8u:3180: sa ca vyavahāraḥ pratiśrutkopamo 'pravyāhāro veditavyaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3181: yathā carato na kiṃcit sattvānām antike 'parityakṣaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:3185: tāni punaḥ katamāny upakaraṇāni yad uta dānapāramitopakaraṇaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3191: imāni tāny upakaraṇāni yair upakaraṇair upagṛhītāḥ sattvāḥ saṃsārāt parimokṣyante.
K03psp_6-8u:3192: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasyā dānaṃ dadad evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣet,
K03psp_6-8u:3193: ahaṃ bho yūyaṃ kulaputrāḥ śīlaṃ rakṣatāhaṃ yuṣmākam avaikalyaṃ kariṣyāmy annena vā
K03psp_6-8u:3194: pānena vā vastreṇa vā śayanāsanair vā yānair vā hiraṇyasuvarṇamanimuktāvajravaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravāḍair vā,
K03psp_6-8u:3196: glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārair vā yāvad anyatarair vā mānuṣyakaiḥ pariṣkāropakaraṇair,
K03psp_6-8u:3198: tad ahaṃ yuṣmākam avaikalyaṃ kariṣyāmy annādinā vā saptabhir vā ratnair,
K03psp_6-8u:3200: tad yūyaṃ saṃvaraśīle sthitvānupūrveṇa duṣkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyatha tribhir yānaiḥ śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā (PSP_6-8:115)
K03psp_6-8u:3202: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sattvān kṣāntisauratye niyojayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3203: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvā ye kupyanti vā vyāpadyante vā teṣāṃ sattvānām evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣeta,
K03psp_6-8u:3204: kena yūyaṃ kāraṇena kulaputrā vyāpadyadhve doṣam utpādayatha?
K03psp_6-8u:3206: yasyārthena kupyatha vyāpadyatha tat mamāntikād gṛhṇītha,
K03psp_6-8u:3207: tena bhagavatām avaikalyaṃ kariṣyāmy annena vā pānena vā vastreṇa vā śayanāsanair
K03psp_6-8u:3209: vā vividhair vā maṇiratnair vā yāvad anyatarānyatarair vā mānuṣyopakaraṇapariṣkārair
K03psp_6-8u:3210: yena yūyaṃ na kupyatha vyāpadyadhve. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā
K03psp_6-8u:3212: naivātra kaścid bhāvo 'sti yaḥ bhāvo yena yuṣmākaṃ krodha upajāyata abhūtasaṃkalpa
K03psp_6-8u:3213: eṣa krodho naitasya kiṃcid vastv asti yasya yūyaṃ vastunaḥ kṛtaśo 'bhisajjatha kupyatha
K03psp_6-8u:3214: vyāpadyadhve 'bhiṣajya kupitvā vyāpadya daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā praharathānyamanyaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:3216: tad yūyam asadbhūtasaṃkalpitakṣubhitā narakaṃ vā prapatiṣyatha tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā prapatiṣyatha,
K03psp_6-8u:3217: yā apy anyāḥ kāścid gatayas tāsu ca duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayiṣyatha,
K03psp_6-8u:3218: haṃbho puruṣā māvastukānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśaḥ tat karma parigṛhṇīta yena parigṛhītena manuṣyapratilābho na bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3219: prāg eva buddhotpādo durlabhaḥ. sa khalu punar bho puruṣo durlabho buddhotpādo durlabho manuṣyalābho durlabhaḥ kṣaṇasaṃpad durlabhaḥ saṃsārāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:3220: mā imaṃ kṣaṇaṃ virāgayiṣyatha mā vicikitsā bhaviṣyatha kṣaṇaprāptāḥ. tato bodhisattvo mahāsattva ātmanā ca kṣāntyā saṃpādayāti,
K03psp_6-8u:3223: ye 'pi cānye kṣāntiṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3224: tatas tān sattvān kṣāntyāṃ niyojayitvā kṣāntyāṃ sthāpayitvānupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ (PSP_6-8:116)
K03psp_6-8u:3225: parinirvāpayati śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntisauratye sattvān niyojayati.
K03psp_6-8u:3226: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran,
K03psp_6-8u:3228: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān kuśīdān hīnavīryān alasān viditvā evam avavadati,
K03psp_6-8u:3232: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāñ caran tān sattvān etad avocat,
K03psp_6-8u:3233: hambho puruṣā ahaṃ bhavatāṃ sarvapratyayān upasaṃhariṣyāmi,
K03psp_6-8u:3234: yadi vā dānaṃ yadi vā śīlaṃ yadi vā kṣāntiṃ yadi vā yair ākārair yair liṅgair vīryam ārabhedhvaṃ tān bhavatām upasaṃhariṣyāmi,
K03psp_6-8u:3235: tatas te sattvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya upakaraṇair vīryam ārabhante kāyikaṃ vā caitasikaṃ vā,
K03psp_6-8u:3236: tena kāyikena vā caitasikena vā vīryeṇa sarvān kuśalān dharmān paripūrayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:3237: yaiḥ kuśalair dharmair āryān anāsravān dharmān bhāvayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:3238: yān bhāvayamānā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpsyanti sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prāpsyanti,
K03psp_6-8u:3239: pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ prāpsyanty anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ sattvān niyojayati.
K03psp_6-8u:3240: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sattvān avavadatīha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān evam avavadati,
K03psp_6-8u:3241: kim idaṃ bhoḥ sattvā yūyaṃ dhyānan na samāpadyadhve?
K03psp_6-8u:3245: haṃbho purusā ahaṃ tān pratyayān upasaṃhariṣyāmi,
K03psp_6-8u:3247: idam iti vā bahirdhety adhyātmeti vādhyātmabahirdheti,
K03psp_6-8u:3248: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvas teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tān pratyayān upasaṃharati yaiḥ pratyayair
K03psp_6-8u:3249: upasaṃhṛtair na vitarkayanti tatas te sattvā vitarkeṣu cchinneṣu prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyante,
K03psp_6-8u:3254: te tair dhyānais taiś cāpramāṇair yāvad (PSP_6-8:117)
K03psp_6-8u:3256: tatrāpare bodhimārgāṃ na parihīyante yāvad anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sattvān evam avavadati.
K03psp_6-8u:3257: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhṇāti,
K03psp_6-8u:3258: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān evam avavadati,
K03psp_6-8u:3259: kim idaṃ bhoḥ sattvā yūyaṃ prajñāpāramitān na bhāvayatha?
K03psp_6-8u:3262: tān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān evam avavadati,
K03psp_6-8u:3263: mamopari pūrayam upakaraṇaṃ gṛhṇīta mamopary upakaraṇaṃ gṛhītvā dānaṃ dadata,
K03psp_6-8u:3264: śīlaṃ rakṣata kṣāntyā saṃpādayata vīryam ārabhadhvaṃ dhyānaṃ saṃpādayadhvam,
K03psp_6-8u:3267: ātmā vā sattvo vā jivo vā jantur vā poṣo vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo
K03psp_6-8u:3268: vā kārako vā vedako vā jānako vā paśyako vā kāmadhātur vā rūpadhātur vā ārūpyadhātur
K03psp_6-8u:3269: vā ṣaṭpārāmitā vā sarvaśūnyatā vā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā vā dharmā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo
K03psp_6-8u:3270: vā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vāṣṭavimokṣā vā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo vā daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā
K03psp_6-8u:3271: vā srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhir
K03psp_6-8u:3273: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kañcid dharmam upalabhate
K03psp_6-8u:3274: yam upalabhyābhiniviśeta so 'nabhiniveśamāno na kasyacid dharmasya utpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:3275: vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na kalpayaty ayaṃ nairayiko
K03psp_6-8u:3276: 'yaṃ tiryagyoniko 'yaṃ yāmalaukiko 'yam asuro 'yaṃ devo 'yaṃ manuṣyo 'yam amanuṣyaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3277: ayaṃ śīlavān ayaṃ duḥśīlo ayaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann
K03psp_6-8u:3278: ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ. evaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:3279: khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_6-8u:3280: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:3281: sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā
K03psp_6-8u:3282: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā yāvat saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ sattvān parigṛhṇāti,
K03psp_6-8u:3283: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānām upakaraṇam upanāmayati yair upakaraṇair upagṛhītāḥ sattvāś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:3284: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catura ṛddhipādān pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:3285: yena mārgeṇa bhāvitena yāvat saṃsārāt parimucyante. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ sattvān parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_6-8u:3286: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā evaṃ sattvān paripācayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3287: ete yūyaṃ bhoḥ kulaputrā mamāntikād annaṃ pānaṃ yānaṃ vastrāṃ mālyaṃ gandhaṃ vilepanaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:3288: puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ cūrṇaṃ yāvat sarvān mānuṣyakopakaraṇapariṣkārān gṛhītvā saptabhiś ca
K03psp_6-8u:3290: tad bhavatāṃ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya,
K03psp_6-8u:3293: yad bhavatā dīrgharātram eṣo 'rthaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśa upārjitas tad yuṣmākam evaiṣa santaka ity evaṃ gṛhītvā sattvebhyo dānaṃ dadadhvaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3294: tena ca dānena śīle niyojayadhvaṃ kṣāntyā niyojayadhvaṃ vīrye niyojayadhvaṃ dhyāne
K03psp_6-8u:3295: niyojayadhvaṃ prajñāyāṃ niyojayadhvaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu niyojayadhvaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:3299: yāvad anuttareṣv āryeṣv anāsraveṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayadhvaṃ srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale
K03psp_6-8u:3301: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā sattvāḥ paripācayitavyāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3304: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:3305: sthitvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā
K03psp_6-8u:3307: yūyaṃ bhoḥ sattvā teṣāṃ pratyayānām asatāṃ dauḥśīlyam āpadyatha vyāpādaṃ kauśīdyaṃ vikṣepaṃ dauṣprajñam āpadyadhve tān pratyayān yuṣmākam upasaṃhariṣyāmi,
K03psp_6-8u:3308: annaṃ vā pānaṃ vā vastraṃ vā śayanāsanaṃ vā yāvat sarvān mānuṣyakopakaraṇapariṣkārān
K03psp_6-8u:3309: sa tān sattvāṃs tathārūpeṇānugraheṇānugṛhṇāti yathārūpeṇānugrahenānugṛhītāḥ samān
K03psp_6-8u:3314: atha khalv āyuṣmataḥ subhūter etad abhavat:
K03psp_6-8u:3315: katamo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgo yatra sthitvā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena idṛśāḥ saṃnāhāḥ saṃnaddhavyāḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:3316: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ subhūteś cetasaiva caitaḥ parivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3317: ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3318: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3322: mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ. api tu khalu subhūte sarvadharmā api bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3324: subhūte asti sa kaścid dharmo yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na śikṣitavyaṃ yatrāśikṣitvānuttarāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:3325: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. nāsti subhūte kaścid dharmo yatra bodhisattvena
K03psp_6-8u:3326: mahāsattvenāśikṣitavyam aśikṣitvā yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śaknoti sarvākārajñatām anuprāptum.
K03psp_6-8u:3327: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3330: na tu bhagavann aprapañcan na prapañcayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3331: iyanta iti vā neyanta iti vā,
K03psp_6-8u:3332: ayaṃ dharmo laukiko vā lokottaro vā sāsrāvo vā anāsravo (PSP_6-8:120)
K03psp_6-8u:3333: vā saṃskṛto vāsaṃskṛto vā pṛthagjanadharmo vārhaddharmo vā pratyekabuddhadharmo vā buddhadharmo vā.
K03psp_6-8u:3334: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3335: evam etat subhūte evam etat sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā,
K03psp_6-8u:3336: yadi punaḥ subhūte sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā nābhaviṣyan na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3337: yasmāt subhūte sarvadharmāḥ śūnyās tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3338: api tu khalu subhūte yad evaṃ vadasi,
K03psp_6-8u:3341: iyanta iti vā neyanta iti vā,
K03psp_6-8u:3342: ayaṃ dharmo laukiko vā lokottaro vā sāsravo vā anāsravo vā saṃskṛto vāsaṃskṛto vā
K03psp_6-8u:3343: pṛthagjanadharmo vārhaddharmo vā pratyekabuddhadharmo vā buddhadharmo veti. kiṃ punaḥ
K03psp_6-8u:3344: subhūte ete sattvā evaṃ jānanti sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti yadi jānīyur naimāṃ bodhisattvā
K03psp_6-8u:3346: yasmāt tarhi subhūte na jānanti sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti,
K03psp_6-8u:3347: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarvadharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ kṛtvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
K03psp_6-8u:3349: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhimārge caratā prathamam evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3350: nātra kaścid dharmo yaḥ svena bhāvenopalabhyate 'nyatrābhisaṃskāreṇa,
K03psp_6-8u:3351: tatra khalu dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvam upaparīkṣeyam aham upaparīkṣamāṇo na kvacid dharme
K03psp_6-8u:3352: 'bhiniveśeya yadi vā pāramitāsu yadi vā śūnyatāsu yadi vā saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu
K03psp_6-8u:3353: dharmeṣu yadi vā srotāapattiphale yadi vā sakṛdāgāmiphale yadi vānāgāmiphale yadi
K03psp_6-8u:3354: vārhattve yadi vā pratyekabodhau yadi vānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:3355: tathā hi svabhāvena sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā na hi śūnyatā śūnyatāyām abhiniviśate,
K03psp_6-8u:3357: śūnyatāyām abhinivekṣyate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nabhiniviṣṭaḥ sarvadharmeṣu viharati,
K03psp_6-8u:3359: kutreme sattvāś caranty asaṃgrahe tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:3361: tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā evam avavadati,
K03psp_6-8u:3362: ete yūyaṃ bhoḥ sattvā dānaṃ dadata tato yuṣmākam avaikalyaṃ bhaviṣyati bhogeṣu,
K03psp_6-8u:3363: teṣu ca bhogeṣu mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ śīle 'vavadati tena
K03psp_6-8u:3364: ca śīlena mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ kṣāntisauratye 'vavadati
K03psp_6-8u:3365: tayā ca kṣāntyā mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ vīrye 'vavadati mā
K03psp_6-8u:3366: ca tena vīryeṇa maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ dhyāne 'vavadati tena
K03psp_6-8u:3367: ca dhyānena mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadati
K03psp_6-8u:3368: tayā ca prajñayā mā maṃsyādhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ srotaāpattiphale
K03psp_6-8u:3369: 'vavadati tena ca srotaāpattiphalena mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:3371: evam arhattve 'vavadati tena cārhattvena mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti.
K03psp_6-8u:3372: evaṃ pratyekabodhāv avavadati tayā ca pratyekabodhyā mā maṃsyadhvam. evaṃ buddhadharmeṣv
K03psp_6-8u:3373: avavadati taiś ca buddhadharmair mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na teṣu kiṃcit sāram asti. sa evam
K03psp_6-8u:3375: na kvacid dharme 'bhiniviśate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:3377: ca sarvadharmās tathā hy eṣāṃ svabhāvo nāsti ye nābhiniviśeta śūnyatāsvabhāvatām
K03psp_6-8u:3378: upādāya. tat subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mārge caran na kvacit pratiṣṭhate so
K03psp_6-8u:3379: 'pratiṣṭhānayogena dānapāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
K03psp_6-8u:3380: śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
K03psp_6-8u:3381: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
K03psp_6-8u:3382: vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
K03psp_6-8u:3383: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
K03psp_6-8u:3384: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
K03psp_6-8u:3385: sa prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:3386: tathā hi dhyānaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ yad api samāpadyate tad api śūnyaṃ yair ākāraiḥ samāpadyate te 'py ākārāḥ śūnyāḥ, evaṃ (PSP_6-8:122)
K03psp_6-8u:3390: evaṃ maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣā evam ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanam ākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samāpadyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3393: srotaāpattiphalaṃ ca pratilabhate na ca tatra pratiṣṭhate,
K03psp_6-8u:3394: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ ca pratilabhate na ca tatra pratiṣṭhate,
K03psp_6-8u:3395: anāgāmiphalaṃ ca pratilabhate na ca tatra pratiṣṭhate,
K03psp_6-8u:3396: 'rhattvaṃ ca pratilabhate na ca tatra pratiṣṭhate,
K03psp_6-8u:3397: pratyekabuddhabhūmiñ ca pratilabhate na ca tatra pratiṣṭhate.
K03psp_6-8u:3399: kena kāraṇena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na pratiṣṭhate?
K03psp_6-8u:3401: dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ subhūte na pratiṣṭhate. katamābhyāṃ dvābhyām?
K03psp_6-8u:3402: svabhāvaś ca teṣāṃ phalaṃ nāsti yatra pratiṣṭheta yena vā pratiṣṭheta yo vā pratiṣṭheta,
K03psp_6-8u:3404: na ca mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ na prāptavyaṃ prāptavyaṃ mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ na ca tatra sthātavyam,
K03psp_6-8u:3406: na ca mayārhattvaṃ na prāptavyaṃ prāptavyaṃ mayārhattvaṃ na ca tatra sthātavyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3407: na ca mayā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ na prāptavyā prāptavyā mayā pratyekabuddhabhūmir na ca tatra sthātavyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3409: dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ na pratiṣṭhate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:3410: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya nānyatra cittaṃ pratilabdham anyatrānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. tat kasya
K03psp_6-8u:3411: tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamām api bhūmim upādāya vartamāno 'nyatra na
K03psp_6-8u:3412: kiṃcic cittam utpādayaty anyatrānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. evaṃ yāvad daśamīṃ bhūmim
K03psp_6-8u:3413: upādāya vartamāno nānyatra kiṃcic cittam utpādayaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3414: yāvad bodhisattvanyāmam avakrānter nānyatra kiṃcic cittam utpāditam anyatrānuttarāyāḥ
K03psp_6-8u:3415: samyaksaṃbodher atṛptamānasaḥ. sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvad eva kāyena (PSP_6-8:123)
K03psp_6-8u:3416: vā parākramate vācā vā manasā vā parākramate,
K03psp_6-8u:3417: nānyatra bodhicittāt tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhicitte sthitvāvikṣiptamānaso bodhimārgam utpādayati.
K03psp_6-8u:3418: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3419: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmā anutpannāḥ kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimārgam utpādayati?
K03psp_6-8u:3420: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3422: sarvadharmā anutpannās tat punaḥ kathaṃ yenābhisaṃskurvanti,
K03psp_6-8u:3424: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3425: na punar bhagavann anutpādād vā tathāgatānām utpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmasthititā.
K03psp_6-8u:3428: utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmasthititā,
K03psp_6-8u:3429: ye punar imāṃ dharmasthititān na jānanti teṣām arthāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimārgam utpādayati yena mārgeṇa sattvān mocayati saṃsārāt.
K03psp_6-8u:3431: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3432: kiṃ punar bhagavann anutpannena mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate utāho utpannena?
K03psp_6-8u:3435: kiṃ punar bhagavan nānutpannena cotpannena mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate?
K03psp_6-8u:3438: kiṃ punar bhagavan naiva nānutpannena naiva notpannena mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate?
K03psp_6-8u:3441: tat kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhiḥ prāpyate?
K03psp_6-8u:3442: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3443: na subhūte mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate nāmārgeṇa,
K03psp_6-8u:3446: evam ukte āyuṣman subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3447: yadi bhagavan bodhir eva mārgo mārga eva bodhir anuprāptaiva bhavati bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhis,
K03psp_6-8u:3450: vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiś caturbhir apramāṇaiś caturbhir dhyānaiś catasṛbhir
K03psp_6-8u:3451: ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmaiś caturbhir āryasatyaiḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaiḥ
K03psp_6-8u:3452: pañcabhir abhijñābhir aṣṭavimokṣair navabhir anupūrvavihārasamāpattibhiḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhair
K03psp_6-8u:3453: daśabhir bodhisattvabhūmibhir daśabhiḥ pāramitābhir viṃśatibhiḥ śūnyatābhir aṣṭādaśabhir
K03psp_6-8u:3455: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3457: subhūte buddho bodhiṃ prāpyati buddha eva bodhir eva buddhaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:3462: anuprāptaiva bhavati bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhir iti. iha subhūte yadā bodhisattvo
K03psp_6-8u:3463: mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭpāramitāḥ paripūrya saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān sarvaśūnyatāś
K03psp_6-8u:3467: catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrya vajropame samādhau
K03psp_6-8u:3469: tadā tathāgata iti nirdiśyate sarvadharmān jānīta ity ataḥ sarvadarśiṃ sarvajña ity abhidhīyate.
K03psp_6-8u:3471: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3472: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati?
K03psp_6-8u:3473: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3474: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya kāyadauḥśīlyaṃ (PSP_6-8:125)
K03psp_6-8u:3475: vāgdauḥśīlyaṃ manodauḥsīlyam ātmanaś ca parasya ca viśodhayati yaiḥ pariśudhaiḥ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati.
K03psp_6-8u:3476: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3477: katamad bhagavan kāyadauḥśīlyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vāgdauḥśīlyaṃ manodauḥśīlyam?
K03psp_6-8u:3478: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3492: punar aparaṃ subhūte yat mātsaryacittam idaṃ manodauḥśīlyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K03psp_6-8u:3493: yad dauḥśīlyacittaṃ kṣobhacittaṃ kauśīdyacittaṃ vikṣepacittam asamāhitacittaṃ dauṣprajñacittam
K03psp_6-8u:3495: punar aparaṃ subhūte yac chīlam apariśuddham idam apy apariśuddhaṃ dauḥśīlyacittaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya.
K03psp_6-8u:3496: punar aparaṃ subhūte caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānair virahitaś caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiḥ
K03psp_6-8u:3497: caturbhir ṛddhipādaiḥ pañcabhir indriyaiḥ pañcabhir balaiḥ saptabhir bodhyaṅgair
K03psp_6-8u:3500: punar aparaṃ subhūte yac chrotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyā tatra ca spṛhaṇā,
K03psp_6-8u:3501: idam api dauṣṭhulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. yat sakṛdāgāmiphalasākṣātkriyā tatra ca spṛhaṇā,
K03psp_6-8u:3502: idam api dauṣṭhulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. yad anāgāmiphalasākṣātkriyā tatra ca spṛhaṇā,
K03psp_6-8u:3503: idam api dauṣṭhulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. yad arhattvasākṣātkriyā tatra ca spṛhaṇā,
K03psp_6-8u:3504: idam api dauṣṭhulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. pratyekabodhisākṣātkriyā tatra ca spṛhaṇā,
K03psp_6-8u:3509: śrotrasaṃjñā ghrāṇasaṃjñā jihvāsaṃjñā kāyasaṃjñā manaḥsaṃjñā dauṣṭhulyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3511: śabdasaṃjñā gandhasaṃjñā rasasaṃjñā spraṣṭavyasaṃjñā dharmasaṃjñā dauṣṭhulyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3513: śrotravijñānasaṃjñā ghrāṇavijñānasaṃjñā jihvāvijñānasaṃjñā kāyavijñānasaṃjñā manovijñānasaṃjñā dauṣṭhulyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3515: śrotrasaṃsparśasaṃjñā ghrāṇasaṃsparśasaṃjñā jihvāsaṃsparśasaṃjñā kāyasaṃsparśasaṃjñā manaḥsaṃsparśasaṃjñā dauṣṭhulyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3529: saṃskārasaṃjñā vijñānasaṃjñā nāmarūpasaṃjñā ṣaḍāyatanasaṃjñā sparśasaṃjñā vedanāsaṃjñā
K03psp_6-8u:3530: tṛṣṇāsaṃjñā upādānasaṃjñā bhavasaṃjñā jātisaṃjñā jarāmaraṇasaṃjñā śokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyopāyāsasaṃjñā dauṣṭhulyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3531: strīsaṃjñā puruṣasaṃjñā kāmadhātusaṃjñā rūpadhātusaṃjñā ārūpyadhātusaṃjñā dauṣṭhulyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3532: kuśalasaṃjñā akuśalasaṃjñā laukikasaṃjñā lokottarasaṃjñā sāsravasaṃjñā anāsravasaṃjñā saṃskṛtasaṃjñā asaṃskṛtasaṃjñā dauṣṭhulyam,
K03psp_6-8u:3536: annam annārthikānāṃ pānaṃ pānārthikānāṃ vastraṃ vastrārthikānāṃ yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakān sarvopakaraṇapariṣkārān dadāti,
K03psp_6-8u:3539: tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaye pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3540: ātmanā ca śīlaṃ rakṣati parāṃś ca śīle samādāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3541: ātmanā ca kṣāntyā saṃpādayati parāṃś ca kṣāntau samādāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3542: ātmanā ca vīryam ārabhate parāṃś ca vīrye samādāpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3543: ātmanā ca dhyānaṃ samāpadyate parāṃś ca dhyāne samādapayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3546: tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3547: ātmanā ca trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇe kṛtvā triṣu ratneṣu dānaṃ dadāti tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:3550: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyāni vādyāni vādayati buddheṣu vā buddhacaityeṣu vā,
K03psp_6-8u:3551: tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ karoti tasyaivaṃ bhavaty anena kuśalamūlena me divyāḥ śabdā manoramāḥ śrotrasukhā satatasamitaṃ vādyā bhavantu buddhakṣetre.
K03psp_6-8u:3552: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyair gandhais trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ paripūrayitvā buddheṣu vā buddhacaityeṣu vā dadāti,
K03psp_6-8u:3554: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty anena kuśalamūlena me divyā gandhā ghrāṇasukhā manoramā bhavantu buddhakṣetre.
K03psp_6-8u:3555: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śatarasāni bhojanāni tathāgateṣu vā dadāti,
K03psp_6-8u:3556: tathāgataśrāvakeṣu vā tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:3557: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty anena kuśalamūlena buddhakṣetre me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya śrāvakasaṃghasya śatarasāni bhojanāni saṃpadyeran.
K03psp_6-8u:3558: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyāny upalepanāni dadāti,
K03psp_6-8u:3559: tathāgateṣu vā tathāgataśrāvakeṣu vā tathāgatacaityeṣu vā,
K03psp_6-8u:3561: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty anena kuśalamūlena me buddhakṣetre divyāni spraṣṭavyāni kāyasukhāni manonukūlāni (PSP_6-8:128)
K03psp_6-8u:3563: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃkalpair ātmanā ca sarvasattvaiś ca sārdhaṃ pañcakāmaguṇān buddheṣu vā buddhaśrāvakeṣu vā sarvasattveṣu
K03psp_6-8u:3565: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty anena kuśalamūlenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya me
K03psp_6-8u:3566: sarvaśrāvakasaṃghasya sarvasattvānāṃ ca manoramāḥ pañcakāmaguṇāḥ syur iti. evaṃ subhūte
K03psp_6-8u:3568: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:3569: yaṃ nūnam aham ātmanā ca prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadye sarvasattvāṃś ca prathame dhyāne niveśayeyam,
K03psp_6-8u:3571: ātmanā ca caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadye sarvasattvāṃś ca caturthe dhyāne niveśayeyam,
K03psp_6-8u:3574: evaṃ karuṇāmuditām ātmanā copekṣāṃ bhāvayeyaṃ sarvasattvāṃ copekṣābhāvanāyāṃ niveśayeyam,
K03psp_6-8u:3575: ātmanā cākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadye sarvasattvāṃś cākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattau pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3577: ātmanā ca naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadye sarvasattvāṃś ca naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattau pratiṣṭhāpayeyam,
K03psp_6-8u:3578: ātmanā ca smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayeyaṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca smṛtyupasthānabhāvanāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyam,
K03psp_6-8u:3580: ātmanā cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayeyaṃ sarvasattvāṃś cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgabhāvanāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyam,
K03psp_6-8u:3581: ātmanā ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vimokṣamukhāni bhāvayeyaṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhabhāvanāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3583: sarvasattvā evaṃ caturbhir dhyānair avirahitā bhāveyuś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhir avirahitā bhāveyuś caturbhir brāhmair vihārair avirahitā
K03psp_6-8u:3585: bhaveyuḥ, śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitair vimokṣamukhair avirahitā bhaveyur ity,
K03psp_6-8u:3586: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3587: sa tāvad bodhau carati yāvad ime sarvābhiprāyāḥ paripūrṇā bhavanti,
K03psp_6-8u:3590: tasya svabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyo mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇavibhūṣita ātmabhāvo bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:3591: ye ca tena boodhisattvena mahāsattvena sattvāḥ paripācitās teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ svabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyo mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇavibhūṣita ātmabhāvo bhavati yad uta puṇyaparigrahād,
K03psp_6-8u:3592: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena buddhaksetraṃ pariśodhayitavyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3593: yathā trayāṇām apāyānāṃ prajñaptir api na bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3597: yāvad dvayasya nāmadheyam api na bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3603: tyāgecchatāyāḥ yāvat prajñecchatāyāḥ sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ chandād eva vṛkṣebhyo ghoṣā niścariṣyanti vāteritebhyaḥ evaṃ sarvebhyo 'dhyātmikabāhyebhyo dharmebhyo ghoṣā niścariṣyanti,
K03psp_6-8u:3604: śūnyam iti vānimittam iti vāpraṇihitain iti vā śabdo niścariṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3606: yathaiva sarvadharmāṇāṃ naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ tathāiva śabdo niścariṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3608: yathaiteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvas tathāiva śabdo niścariṣyaty utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3609: yac chūnyan na tatra nimittam asti tad apraṇihitam eṣā saivaṃ rūpādharmadeśanā niścariṣyati
K03psp_6-8u:3610: rātrau divase vā sthitāṇāṃ vā niṣaṇṇānāṃ vā śayanānāṃ vā caṅkramatāṃ vā idṛśāḥ sarvadharmadeśanā
K03psp_6-8u:3611: niścariṣyanti. tatra buddhakṣetre yadāsau bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_6-8u:3613: tasya khalu punas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaiva
K03psp_6-8u:3614: sato ye daśadiglokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti, te (PSP_6-8:130)
K03psp_6-8u:3616: ye ca tasya varṇaṃ sattvā śroṣyanti nāmadheyaṃ vā te sarve niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:3617: samyaksaṃbodhyau. tasya khalu punas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:3618: deśayato na kasyacit sattvasya saṃśayo bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3619: ayaṃ dharmo 'yan na dharmaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:3620: yā khalu punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na tatra kaścid adharmaḥ sarva eva sa dharmaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:3621: tatra ye sattvā akuśalamūlagrastā vānavaropitakuśalamūlā vā buddheṣu vā buddhaśrāvakeṣu
K03psp_6-8u:3627: samyaksaṃbuddheṣu vāsamyaksaṃbuddhasaṃjñinas te 'dharme dharma iti vadanti,
K03psp_6-8u:3628: te dharmaṃ pratikṣipanti te dharmaṃ pratikṣipya kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyante,
K03psp_6-8u:3629: tāṃs te buddhā bhagavanto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvān saṃsāraparyāpannāṃs
K03psp_6-8u:3630: tataḥ pāpakadṛṣṭigatād vivecayanti vivecya niyate rāśau pratiṣṭhāpayanti. te tatra
K03psp_6-8u:3631: pratiṣṭhāpitā na punar apāyeṣūpapadyante. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K03psp_6-8u:3633: yasya pariśuddhasya na kiṃcit sattvānāṃ vaikalyaṃ bhaviṣyati laukikeṣu vā dharmeṣu
K03psp_6-8u:3634: lokottareṣu vā dharmeṣu sāsraveṣu vā dharmeṣv anāsraveṣu vā dharmeṣu saṃskṛteṣu vāsaṃskṛteṣu
K03psp_6-8u:3635: vā dharmeṣu yāvat sarve niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K03psp_6-8u:3637: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3638: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:3642: katame rāśau niyataḥ śrāvakarāśau vā pratyekabuddharāśau vā?
K03psp_6-8u:3644: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakarāśau vā niyataḥ pratyekabuddharāśau vā niyato 'pi tu buddharāśau subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:3646: kiṃ punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ prathamacittotpādika (PSP_6-8:131)
K03psp_6-8u:3649: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vā niyataḥ caramabhaviko vā niyato 'pi tu prathamacittotpādiko niyataḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:3651: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyato 'pāyeṣūpapatsyate?
K03psp_6-8u:3653: na subhūte niyataḥ patito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'pāyeṣūpapatsyate. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_6-8u:3654: subhūte api tv aṣṭamako vā srotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmi vā anāgāmi vārhan vā pratyekabuddho vā niyato 'pāyeṣūpapatsyante.
K03psp_6-8u:3658: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'pāyeṣūpapatsyate naitat sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:3659: tathā hi yaḥ punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati kṣāntiṃ saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate dhyānaṃ samāpadyate prajñāṃ bhāvayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3660: maitrīṃ karuṇāṃ muditām upekṣāṃ sattveṣu bhāvayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3663: dīrghāyuṣkeṣu vā deveṣūpapatsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3664: yatrāpacāraḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratyanteṣu vā janapadeṣūpatsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3665: mithyādṛṣṭikeṣu vā kuleṣūpapadyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3666: tatra copapatsyate yatra na buddhaśabdo na dharmaśabdo na saṃghaśabdaḥ śruyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3667: akriyādṛṣṭikeṣu vā kuleṣūpapatsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3668: api tu khalu subhūte prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthito 'dhyāśayena daśākuśalān karmapathān adhyāpadyeta nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
K03psp_6-8u:3669: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3670: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ kuśaladharmasamanvāgato yad uta nāpratirūpeṣu sthāneṣūpapatsyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3673: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3674: na punaḥ suhbūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saṃcintyatam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti, (PSP_6-8:132)
K03psp_6-8u:3675: yenātmabhāvena sattvānām arthaḥ kartavyaḥ tam ātmabhāvaṃ sattvānām arthāya pratigṛhṇāti,
K03psp_6-8u:3676: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte 'sty etad arhataḥ pratyekabuddhasya vā upāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatas tiryagyonāv upapannaḥ syāt.
K03psp_6-8u:3680: tathāgatasya tad upāyakauśalyam asti yena tatropapannaḥ syād,
K03psp_6-8u:3681: ye ca tatra vadhāya parākramante tān anuttarāyāṃ kṣāntau samādāpayati vinaye pratiṣṭhāpayati teṣām eva cārthe ātmānaṃ parityajayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3682: na ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ viheṭhanā bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:3683: tad anena te suhbūte paryāyenaivaṃ veditavyaṃ tathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānām arthāya mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrayamāṇo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tiryagyonau vartate.
K03psp_6-8u:3684: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3685: katameṣu bhagavan kuśaladharmeṣu sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattva imam evaṃrūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_6-8u:3686: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3687: sarvan tat subhūte kuśalaṃ karma yad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena paripūrayitavyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3688: sarvakuśaladharmaparipūrir anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhis tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K03psp_6-8u:3689: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇena na kaścid dharmo yo na paripūrayitavyo
K03psp_6-8u:3691: tad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvakuśaladharmaparipūryai śikṣitavayaṃ yatra śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati sarvavāsanānusaṃdhiṃ prahāsyati.
K03psp_6-8u:3692: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3693: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvac chukladharmasamanvāgata āryeṇānāsraveṇa dharmeṇāpāyeṣūpapadyate tiryagyonau vā?
K03psp_6-8u:3699: kiṃ punas tathāgatas tiryagyonigataṃ prāṇinam ātmānam abhinirmiṇoti,
K03psp_6-8u:3713: bodhisattvo mahāsattva āryeṇānāśraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvagataḥ sañcintya tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
K03psp_6-8u:3714: yenātmabhāvena samanvāgatam anyān paripācayed yathā tathāgataḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:3716: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatas tan nirmitam abhinirmiṇoti,
K03psp_6-8u:3721: bodhisattvo mahāsattva āryeṇānāsraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvāgatas tat tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
K03psp_6-8u:3729: hastivigrahaṃ vāśvavigrahaṃ vā balīvardavigrahaṃ vānyān vā vividhān prāṇakajātān darśayaty api tu sa hastī vā bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:3730: aśvo vā balīvardavigraho vānye vā vividhāḥ prāṇakajātā bhavanti.
K03psp_6-8u:3735: bodhisattvo mahāsattva āryeṇānāsraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvāgataḥ sañcintya tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti yenātmabhāveṇa samanvāgataḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtyaṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:3738: mahopāyakuśalo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo nāma bhagavann āryeṇānāsraveṇa dharmeṇa
K03psp_6-8u:3739: samanvāgato yena yena hy ātmabhāvena śakyate sattvānām arthaḥ kartun taṃ tam evātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_6-8u:3741: katameṣu bhagavan śukleṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā idam evaṃrūpam upāyakauśalyaṃ karoti yena tair na lipyate?
K03psp_6-8u:3745: yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarasyām adhamūrdhaṃ vidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ kṛtyaṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:3746: na tatra kvacit spṛśyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:3747: tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvathaiva dharmān nopalabhate,
K03psp_6-8u:3748: yad vā spṛśyeta yena vā spṛśyeta yo vā spṛśyet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:3749: tathā hi sarva ete trayo dharmāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāḥ tatra na śūnyatayā śūnyatā saṃspṛśyate naiva śūnyatāṃ kaścit saṃspṛśati,
K03psp_6-8u:3753: iyaṃ sānupalaṃbhaśūnyatā yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
K03psp_6-8u:3755: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyām eva sthito nānyeṣu dharmeṣu?
K03psp_6-8u:3757: katamo vā subhūte dharmoe yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāntargataḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:3761: na hi bhagavañ chūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharmāntargataḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:3764: na punaḥ subhūte sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3767: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3768: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharme śūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā abhijñāpāramitām abhinirharati,
K03psp_6-8u:3769: yāsv abhijñāsu sthitvā pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadī vālukopamān lokadhātūn gacchati,
K03psp_6-8u:3770: teṣu ca lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:3771: tān paryupāste dharmañ ca śṛṇoti teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavansu kuśalamūlāny avaropayaty,
K03psp_6-8u:3772: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adha ūrdhavaṃ vidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn gacchati,
K03psp_6-8u:3773: teṣu ca lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:3774: tān paryupāste dharmañ ca śṛṇoti teṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlāny avaropayati.
K03psp_6-8u:3775: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3776: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran ye te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tān sarvān śūnyān paśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3777: ye 'pi tatra buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pi buddhā bhagavantaḥ svabhāveṇa śūnyā,
K03psp_6-8u:3779: sā ca sarvā prajñaptiḥ svabhāvena śūnyā. yadi te lokadhātavo na svabhāvena śūnyā abhaviṣyaṃs,
K03psp_6-8u:3780: te 'pi buddhā bhagavanto na svabhāvena śūnyā abhaviṣyaṃs,
K03psp_6-8u:3781: te 'pi prajñaptisamudācārā na svabhāvena śūnyā abhaviṣyaṃs,
K03psp_6-8u:3782: tatprādeśikī śūnyatābhaviṣyad yasmāt prādeśikī śūnyatā nopalabhyate tasmāt sarvadharmā sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:3783: atra bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhijñāpāramitām abhinirharati,
K03psp_6-8u:3784: yāsv abhijñāsu sthitvā divyañ cakṣur abhinirharati,
K03psp_6-8u:3785: divyaṃ śrotram ṛddhividhijñānaṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ cyutyupapattim abhinirharati. ābhir abhijñābhir bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śakyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhir
K03psp_6-8u:3786: yad iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyābhijñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhir antargatā,
K03psp_6-8u:3787: abhijñāsu bodhir antargatā mārgayitavyāyāṃ mārgayamāṇo divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇātmanas tān kuśalān dharmān paśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3789: na ca kuśaleṣu dharmeṣv abhinivekṣyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:3790: tathā hi te sarvakuśalā dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3791: na ca śūnyatā kvacid abhinivekṣyate yad abhiniveśam āsvādayiṣyati niḥsvabhāvaśūnyatā.
K03psp_6-8u:3792: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran divyaṃ cakṣur abhinirharati yena cakṣuṣā sarvadharmā śūnyān paśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3793: tat punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tān dharmān āgamya tat karmābhinirūpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3794: yayā karmābhiniruktyā sattvānān dharmaṃ deśayati na punaḥ sattvaprajñaptim uplabhyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3795: ity anupalaṃbhayogena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām abhijñā abhinirharati,
K03psp_6-8u:3796: yāsv abhijñāsv abhijñā karuṇādharmāḥ kartavyās tān karoti.
K03psp_6-8u:3797: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa pūrvasyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:3798: diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyāṃ diśy uttarasyāṃ diśy adha ūrdhvalokadhātuṣu yāvad
K03psp_6-8u:3800: sa tatrarddhyā gatvā sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:3801: yadi vā dānena yadi vā śīlena yadi vā kṣāntyā yadi vā vīryeṇa yadi vā dhyānena yadi
K03psp_6-8u:3802: vā prajñayā yadi vā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmair yadi vāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhair
K03psp_6-8u:3803: yadi vā śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmair yadi vā bodhisattvadharmair yadi vā buddhadharmais
K03psp_6-8u:3805: tatra ye sattvā matsariṇas teṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3806: dadata dānan duṣkhaṃ hi bhoḥ puruṣā dāridryan na ca dāridryeṇa śakyam ātmano 'rthaḥ kartuṃ prāg eva parasya,
K03psp_6-8u:3807: tasmād yūyam ātmanā ca sukhino bhaviṣyatha parāṃś ca sukhayiṣyatha mā dāridryeṇānyeṣāṃ māṃsāni khādayanto na mokṣyatha tribhir apāyaiḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:3808: ye duḥśīlā sattvās teṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3809: duḥkhaṃ hi bhoḥ puruṣā dauḥśīlyaṃ na ca dauḥśīlyena śakyam ātmano 'thaḥ kartuṃ prāg eva parasya,
K03psp_6-8u:3810: dauḥśīlyasya ca yo vipāko narako vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā tatra yūyaṃ triṣv apāyeṣu prapatitā ātmānam eva na śakyathoddhartuṃ prāg eva
K03psp_6-8u:3811: tad bhavadbhir ekadauśīlyacittasyāpy avakāśo na dātavyaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3813: ye sattvāḥ pratihatacittāḥ parasya caṃ krudhyanti vyāpadyante doṣam utpādayatām eṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3814: mā bhavanto 'nyonyaṃ kṣubhyathānyonyaṃ vyāpadyadhve mā doṣam utpādayata kṣubdhacittasya hi na kaścit kuśalo dharma āmukhī bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:3815: tad bhavanto 'nyonyam evaṃ kṣubdhacittā vyāpannacittāḥ sthānam etad vidyate yan narakaṃ vā prapatathā tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā,
K03psp_6-8u:3816: tad bhavadbhir ekacittenāpi na kṣobdhavyaṃ prāg evānyeṣāṃ cittānām avakāśo dātavyaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:3817: ye kuśīdāḥ sattvās tān vīrye niyojayati teṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3818: mā bhavantaḥ kauśīdyam āpadyadhvaṃ na kusīdānāṃ hīnavīryāṇāṃ kācic chubhā pravṛttiḥ
K03psp_6-8u:3819: sthānam etad vidyate yat kuśīdānān narako vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā tad bhavadbhir
K03psp_6-8u:3820: ekasyāpi kuśīdacittasyāvakāśo na dātavyaḥ prāg evānyeṣāṃ cittānām.
K03psp_6-8u:3821: ye vikṣiptacittāḥ sattvās tān sarvān dhyāne niyojayati, teṣāṃ evaṃ (PSP_6-8:137)
K03psp_6-8u:3823: mā bhavanto muṣitasmṛtayo vikṣiptacittāś ca bhavatan muṣitasmṛtīnām vikṣiptacittānāṃ vā kuśalā dharmā bhavanti sthānam etad vidyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3824: yaṃ muṣitasmṛtīnāṃ vikṣiptacittānāṃ vā narako vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā tad bhavadbhir ekasyāpi vikṣiptacittasyāvakāśo na dātavyaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3826: ye duṣprajñāḥ sattvās tān sarvān prajñāyāṃ niyojayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3828: mā yūyaṃ dauṣprajñacittam utpādayedhvaṃ nāprajñānāṃ sugatigamanaṃ bhavati sthānam etad vidyate yad duṣprajñānāṃ narako vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko
K03psp_6-8u:3829: tad bhavadbhir ekacittotpādo 'pi prajñāvirahito notpādayitavyaṃ prāg evānyeṣāṃ cittotpādānām avakāśo dātavyaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:3830: ye rāgacaritāḥ sattvās tān śubhabhāvanāyāṃ niyojayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3831: ye mārge 'sthitāḥ sattvās tān mārge niyojayati yadi vā śrāvakamārge niyojayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3832: yadi vā pratyekabuddhamārge niyojayati teṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3833: yatra bhavanto 'bhiniviṣṭāt te dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3834: na svabhāvena śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu śakyam abhiniveṣṭum anabhiniviṣṭā ca śūnyatā.
K03psp_6-8u:3835: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhijñāsu sthitvā sattvānām upakāraṃ karoti.
K03psp_6-8u:3836: nāsti sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaḥ śakto 'bhijñāsv asthitvā sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kartum,
K03psp_6-8u:3837: utpathaprasthitān vā sattvān mārge 'vatārayituṃ nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tadyathā subhūte 'pakṣaḥ pakṣī na śaknoty ākāśe kramitum,
K03psp_6-8u:3838: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nāgamyābhijñā na śaknoti sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayituṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3839: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā abhijñā abhinirhartavyāḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:3840: sa imābhir abhijñābhir abhinirhṛtābhir yad ākāṅkṣati sattvānām arthaṃ kartuṃ tat
K03psp_6-8u:3841: kariṣyati divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn
K03psp_6-8u:3842: drakṣyati tatra sattvā utpannās tān drakṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3843: dṛṣṭvā ca tān satttvān ṛddhyā gatvā cetasaiva cittaṃ prajñāsyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3844: cittaṃ jñātvā tathāiva teṣāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3846: yadi vā śīlakathāṃ yadi vā kṣāntikathāṃ yadi vā vīryakathāṃ yadi vā dhyānakathāṃ yadi vā prajñākathāṃ yāvan nirvāṇakathāṃ vā.
K03psp_6-8u:3847: sa divyena śrotradhātunā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇobhau śabdau śroṣyati mānuṣyañ cāmānuṣyañ ca,
K03psp_6-8u:3848: tatra ye gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3849: tan divyena śrotradhātunā śrutvā tathāivodgrahīṣyati tathāivodgṛhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
K03psp_6-8u:3850: dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā dhyānakathāṃ vā prajñākathāṃ vā yāvan nirvāṇakathāṃ vā.
K03psp_6-8u:3851: tasya cetaḥparyāyajñānaṃ suviśuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati sa tena cetaḥparyāyajñānena suviśuddhena sattvānāṃ cittaṃ prajñāsyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3852: cittaṃ jñātvā teṣāṃ tathāiva dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3853: dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā dhyānakathāṃ vā prajñākathāṃ vā yāvan nirvāṇakathāṃ vā.
K03psp_6-8u:3855: apy ātmanaḥ pareṣām api sa tena pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānena evaṃ jñāsyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3856: evaṃnāmāni te 'bhūvan pūrvakās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ saśrāvakasaṃghās
K03psp_6-8u:3857: tatra ye sattvāḥ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtyadhimuktikā bhaviṣyanti tebhyas tathāiva dharmaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:3858: deśayiṣyati dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā dhyānakathāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:3859: vā prajñākathāṃ vā yāvan nirvāṇakathāṃ vā.
K03psp_6-8u:3860: so 'nekavividhayā ṛddhyā samanvāgato gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn gatvā buddhān
K03psp_6-8u:3861: bhagavataḥ paryupāste teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlāny avaropayiṣyati kuśalamūlāny
K03psp_6-8u:3862: avaropya tad eva punar buddhakṣetram āgamiṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3864: dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā dhyānakathāṃ vā prajñākathāṃ vā yāvan nirvāṇakathāṃ vā.
K03psp_6-8u:3867: dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā dhyānakathāṃ vā prajñākathāṃ vā yāvan (PSP_6-8:139)
K03psp_6-8u:3869: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā abhijñā abhinirhartavyāḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:3870: sa imābhir abhijñābhir nihṛtābhir yaṃ yam evākāṅkṣiṣyaty ātmabhāvaṃ pratigrahītuṃ taṃ tam evātmabhāvaṃ pratigrahīṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3871: na ca tena sukhena vā duḥkhena vā sumanā vā durmanā vā bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:3872: naivāsyānunaya pratighau bhaviṣyathaḥ. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte buddhanirmitaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvakṛtyāni karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:3873: na ca tena sukhena vā duṣkhena vā lipyate.
K03psp_6-8u:3874: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratābhijñābhir vikrīḍitavyam evaṃ vikrīḍaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayiṣyati sattvān paripācayiṣyati.
K03psp_6-8u:3875: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pariśuddheṣu buddhakṣetreṣu paripāciteṣu sattveṣu śakyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:3876: nāsti hi subhūte aṅgahānir asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksamodhau.
K03psp_6-8u:3878: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3879: katamāni bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhyaṅgāni yāni bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
K03psp_6-8u:3880: evam ukte bhāgavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3881: sarve kuśalā dharmāḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhyaṅgāni.
K03psp_6-8u:3883: te punar bhagavan katame kuśalā dharmā yaiḥ kuśalaiḥ dharmair anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
K03psp_6-8u:3884: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3885: prathamacittotpādam upādāya subhūte dānapāramitā kuśalo dharmas tatra ca yāvikalpanā yad dānaṃ na jānātīdaṃ dānaṃ yasyārthe dātavyaṃ yena dātavyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:3886: te cāsya trayo vikalpā na saṃvidyante svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya,
K03psp_6-8u:3887: yayā pāramitayātmanā ca tarati sattvāṃś ca saṃsārād uttārayatīme te kuśalā dharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye (PSP_6-8:140)
K03psp_6-8u:3888: mārgaḥ, yena mārgeṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tīrṇās taranti
K03psp_6-8u:3889: tariṣyanti ca. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā
K03psp_6-8u:3891: yat prajñāṃ na jānātīyaṃ prajñā yasyārthe bhāvayitavyā yena bhāvayitavyā,
K03psp_6-8u:3892: te cāsya trayo vikalpā na saṃvidyante svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya yayā prajñāpāramitayā,
K03psp_6-8u:3893: ātmanā ca tarati sattvāṃś ca saṃsārād uttārayatīme te kuśalā dharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye mārgaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3894: yena mārgeṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvās tīrṇās taranti tariṣyanti ca.
K03psp_6-8u:3895: evaṃ catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāni pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni,
K03psp_6-8u:3898: pañcābhijñā daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā
K03psp_6-8u:3899: buddhadharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalā dharmās teṣu cāvikalpanā yad buddhadharmān
K03psp_6-8u:3900: na jānātīme buddhadharmā yasyārthe bhāvayitavyā yena bhāvayitavyās te cāsya trayo
K03psp_6-8u:3901: vikalpā na saṃvidyante svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya yair buddhadharmair ātmanā ca tarati
K03psp_6-8u:3902: sattvāṃś ca saṃsārād uttārayatīme te kuśalā dharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsatttvasyānuttarāyai
K03psp_6-8u:3904: yena mārgeṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tīrṇās taranti ca tariṣyanti ca,
K03psp_6-8u:3905: yāvantaḥ subhūte kecid bodhaye mārgās tān kuśalān dharmān bodhisattvena mahāsattvena paripūrya sarvākārajñatānuprāptavyā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayitavyam.
K03psp_6-8u:3907: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3910: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3911: yat punar āyuṣmān subhūtir evam āha,
K03psp_6-8u:3912: yadīme dharmā bodhisattvadharmā buddhadharmāḥ punaḥ katame?
K03psp_6-8u:3914: ebhir dharmaiḥ sarvākārajñatām abhisaṃbudhyate tasya sarvākārajñatāprāptasya sarvavāsanānusaṃdhiḥ prahīyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3915: tāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhisaṃbudhyate tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvadharmā
K03psp_6-8u:3916: ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā abhisaṃbuddhā ayaṃ viśeso bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K03psp_6-8u:3917: ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya. tad yathāpi nāma subhūte anya eva pratipannako 'nyaḥ phalasthaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3918: na ca tāv ubhāv api nāgrapudgalau,
K03psp_6-8u:3919: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattva ānantaryamārgapratipannakas tathāgataḥ punar arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmeṣv anāvaraṇajñānaprāptaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3920: ayaṃ subhūte viśeṣo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya.
K03psp_6-8u:3921: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3922: yadi bhagavann ime dharmāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyās tat kathaṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vopalabhyate?
K03psp_6-8u:3923: ayaṃ nairayiko 'yaṃ tairyagyoniko 'yaṃ yāmalaukiko 'yaṃ devo 'yaṃ manuṣyo 'yaṃ gotrabhūmir
K03psp_6-8u:3924: ayam aṣṭamako 'yaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho
K03psp_6-8u:3926: yathaiva bhagavann ime pudgalā nopalabhyante tathāiva bhagavan karma nopalabhyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3927: yathaiva bhagavan karma nopalabhyate tathāiva vipāko nopalabhyate.
K03psp_6-8u:3928: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmaṇtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3930: yathā vadasi svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na karma na vipāka upalabhyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3931: ye svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān sattvā nābhijānanti te karmābhisaṃkurvanti duścaritaṃ vā sucaritaṃ vā sāsravaṃ vānāsravaṃ vā,
K03psp_6-8u:3932: te duścaritena karmaṇā triṣv apāyeṣu prapatanti,
K03psp_6-8u:3933: narakeṣu vā tiryagyonau vā yamaloke vā,
K03psp_6-8u:3958: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu carann acchidracārīmān bodhisattvadharmān utpādayati
K03psp_6-8u:3959: yānutpādya bodhyaṅgaparivārasahagataṃ vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno 'nutttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_6-8u:3961: yenārthena kṛtena na punar vipraṇasyanti yena vipraṇāśeṇa pañcagatike saṃsāre prapateyuḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:3962: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:3963: kiṃ punar bhagavatānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāra upalabdhaḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:3966: kiṃ punar bhagavatā kṛṣṇāṃ vā śuklaṃ vā karmopalabdham?
K03psp_6-8u:3969: yadi nopalabdhaṃ kuto narakas tiryagyonir yamalokaḥ prajñapto devamanuṣyāḥ prajñaptāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:3973: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte ete sattvā jānanti svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā iti?
K03psp_6-8u:3977: yadi subhūte sattvā evaṃ jānīyuḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā iti,
K03psp_6-8u:3978: na bodhisattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhetānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sthitvā na sattvān mocayet,
K03psp_6-8u:3981: sattvā na jānanti svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmāṃs te 'jñatā na parimucyante pañcagatikāt saṃsārāt,
K03psp_6-8u:3982: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvas teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike śrutvā svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhet,
K03psp_6-8u:3983: ime dharmās tathā na saṃvidyante yathā bālapṛthagjanā abhiniviṣṭhās te sattvā asato
K03psp_6-8u:3984: 'saṃvidyamānāṃ dharmān svayam eva vikalpayanty upalabhante vāsattve sattvasaṃjñino
K03psp_6-8u:3992: asaṃvidyamānānāṃ viparyāse 'viparyastacittāḥ kāyena vācā manasā ca karmābhisaṃskurvanti,
K03psp_6-8u:3994: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpārmitāyāṃ caran sarvān antargatān kuśalān dharmān kṛtvā bodhisattvacaryāṃ carati,
K03psp_6-8u:3995: yayā caryayā carann anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
K03psp_6-8u:3997: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya duṣkhañ ca duṣkhasamudayaṃ ca duṣkhanirodhañ
K03psp_6-8u:3998: ca duḥkhanirodhagāminīñ ca pratipadam ākhyāti deśayati prakāśayati vivṛṇoti vibhajati
K03psp_6-8u:4000: eṣu caturṣv āryasatyeṣu sarvāntargatāḥ kuśalā dharmā ye kecid bodhipakṣyā dharmā yair bodhipākṣikair dharmais trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4003: eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ prādurbhāvāt sattvāḥ parimucyante pañcagatikāt saṃsārāt.
K03psp_6-8u:4004: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:4013: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:4014: na subhūte duṣkhajñānena parinirvānti na duṣkhena,
K03psp_6-8u:4018: yā punaḥ subhūte caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ samatā tat parinirvāṇam uktaṃ mayā,
K03psp_6-8u:4019: na punar duḥkhena parinirvānti na duṣkhajñānena,
K03psp_6-8u:4023: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:4026: yatra subhūte na duṣkhan na duṣkhajñānaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4030: api tu khalu subhūte yā eṣāṃ caturṇām āryasatyāṇāṃ tathatāvitathatānanyatathatā dharmatā
K03psp_6-8u:4031: dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā yasyotpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād
K03psp_6-8u:4032: vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmādhātur yāsaṃpramoṣadharmatāyai
K03psp_6-8u:4034: tāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran satyānubodhaye carati,
K03psp_6-8u:4037: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:4038: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran satyānubodhaye carati,
K03psp_6-8u:4041: yathā pratipadyamāno na śrāvakabhūmiṃ patati na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ patati bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati.
K03psp_6-8u:4042: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:4044: tathā ca paśyati yathā na kañcid dharmam upalabhate,
K03psp_6-8u:4047: vā asatyaparyāpannāṃ vā taṃ sarve śunyā iti paśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:4048: sa evaṃ paśyann avakrāntaniyāmo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gotrabhūmau sthito bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:4049: tasya gotrabhūmau sthitasya na mūrdhavinipāto bhavati yena mūrdhavinipātena śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patet,
K03psp_6-8u:4050: sa iha gotrabhūmau sthitvā catvāri dhyānāny utpādayati,
K03psp_6-8u:4052: sa iha śamathabhūmau sthitvā sarvadharmān pravicinoti,
K03psp_6-8u:4054: sa duḥkhañ ca parijānāti na ca duṣkhārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati,
K03psp_6-8u:4055: samudayañ ca prajahāti na ca samudayārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati,
K03psp_6-8u:4056: nirodhañ ca sākṣātkaroti na ca nirodhārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati,
K03psp_6-8u:4057: mārgañ ca bhāvayati na ca mārgārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati,
K03psp_6-8u:4058: anyatra bodhinimnena cittena bodhipraveśena bodhiprāgbhāreṇa cittena sarvadharmān yathāvat paśyati.
K03psp_6-8u:4067: yo 'nayaivaṃrūpayā vipaśyanayā sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti paśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:4068: na ca kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvaṃ paśyati,
K03psp_6-8u:4076: sā na buddhena kṛtā na pratyekabuddhena nārhatā nāpi tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair ya iha samādhau caranty anyatra sattvā na jānanti na paśyanti,
K03psp_6-8u:4077: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
K03psp_6-8u:4079: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:4080: yadi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tadā bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ (PSP_6-8:146)
K03psp_6-8u:4082: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
K03psp_6-8u:4083: cakṣurāyatane śrotrāyatane ghrāṇāyatane jihvāyatane kāyāyatane manaāyatane kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
K03psp_6-8u:4084: rūpāyatane śabdāyatane gandhāyatane rasāyatane spraṣṭavyāyatane dharmāyatane kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
K03psp_6-8u:4092: avidyāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne nāmarūpe ṣaḍāyatane sparśe vedanāyāṃ tṛṣṇāyām upādāne bhave jātau jarāmaraṇe kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
K03psp_6-8u:4093: duṣkhasatye samudayasatye nirodhasatye mārgasatye kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
K03psp_6-8u:4094: rūpiṣu dharmeṣv arūpiṣu sanidarśaneṣv anidarśaneṣu sapratigheṣv apratigheṣu saṃskṛteṣv
K03psp_6-8u:4095: asaṃskṛteṣu sāsraveṣv anāsraveṣu sāvadyeṣv anavadyeṣu hīneṣu praṇīteṣv adhyātmikeṣu
K03psp_6-8u:4096: vā bāhyeṣu vā dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñāteṣv atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu kuśalākuśalavyākṛtāvyākṛteṣu
K03psp_6-8u:4099: rāge pratighe māne 'vidyāyāṃ dṛṣṭau vicikitsāyāṃ kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
K03psp_6-8u:4100: mātsarye dāne dauḥśīlye śīle vyāpāde kṣāntau kauśīdye vīrye vikṣepe dhyāne dauṣprajñe prajñāyāṃ kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
K03psp_6-8u:4101: vikalpe śūnyatāyāṃ nimitte ānimitte mithyāpraṇihite samyakpraṇihite,
K03psp_6-8u:4103: kleśe kleśaprahāṇe saṃkleśe vyavadāne saṃsāre nirvāṇe dhātau kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
K03psp_6-8u:4105: evam ukte bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam evam āha:
K03psp_6-8u:4106: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā maitreya bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena,
K03psp_6-8u:4108: nāmamātraṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmamātraṃ yāvad (PSP_6-8:147)
K03psp_6-8u:4110: atha maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:4111: yadā bhagavan savastukam idaṃ nāmadheyam upalabhyate,
K03psp_6-8u:4113: savastukam idaṃ nāmadheyam upalabhyate yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4114: savastukam idaṃ nāmadheyam upalabhyate yad idaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti,
K03psp_6-8u:4116: tadā kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmamātrakaṃ rūpam iti śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4117: nāmamātraṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmamātraṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti śikṣitavyam,
K03psp_6-8u:4118: athāvastukam evaṃ sati tasya nāmnas tad api nāmamātraṃ na prayujyate yad idaṃ rūpam iti nāmamātraṃ na prayujyate yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā
K03psp_6-8u:4119: yāvad buddhadharmā iti nāmamātraṃ na prayujyate.
K03psp_6-8u:4120: evam ukte bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:4121: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ tasmin saṃskāranimitte vastūni yad idaṃ rūpam iti,
K03psp_6-8u:4122: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam,
K03psp_6-8u:4123: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad idaṃ yāvad budhadharmā iti,
K03psp_6-8u:4124: yataś ca maitreya tena saṃskāranimittena vastūni rūpam ity etasmin nāmni rūpam iti saṃpratyayo bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:4127: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ tasmin saṃskāranimitte vastūni yad idaṃ rūpam iti,
K03psp_6-8u:4128: yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad idaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti,
K03psp_6-8u:4130: maitreya syād ihaikatyasya tasminn eva saṃskāranimitte vastūni saṃjñā vā prajñaptir vā nāma vānuvyavahāro vābhiniveśo vā.
K03psp_6-8u:4134: ] tad anenāpi te maitreya paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4135: āgantukam ekam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ tasmin saṃskāranimitte vastūni yad idaṃ rūpam iti,
K03psp_6-8u:4136: yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad idaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti.
K03psp_6-8u:4137: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantam etad avocat: (PSP_6-8:148)
K03psp_6-8u:4138: evaṃ sati bhagavann upalabdha eva bhavati rūpasya svabhāvo yat tat saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu,
K03psp_6-8u:4139: yad upādāya nāma saṃjñā prajñaptir anuvyavahāro bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:4140: yad idaṃ rūpam iti yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad idaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti.
K03psp_6-8u:4141: evam ukte bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam evam āha:
K03psp_6-8u:4142: saṃskāranimitte vastūni nāma saṃjñā prajñaptir anuvyavahāro rūpam iti,
K03psp_6-8u:4144: maitreya svabhāvo vā sa rūpasya prajñaptimātraṃ veti.
K03psp_6-8u:4148: tat kathaṃ maitreya tavaivaṃ bhavaty upalabdha evaṃ bhavati rūpasya svabhāva iti,
K03psp_6-8u:4149: yat tat saṃskāranimittavastu yad upādāya nāma saṃjñā prajñaptir anuvyavahāro bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:4151: yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad idaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_6-8u:4152: maitreya svabhāvo vā sa vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ prajñaptimātraṃ veti.
K03psp_6-8u:4156: tat kathaṃ maitreya tavaivaṃ bhavaty upalabdha evaṃ bhavati vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ svabhāva iti?
K03psp_6-8u:4159: saced bhagavan nāmasaṃjñāsaṃketaprajñaptivyavahāramātratvaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti,
K03psp_6-8u:4160: tad evaṃ sati na tūpalabdha eva svabhāvo bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:4162: tad evaṃ sati na tūpalabdha eva svabhāvo bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:4163: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4169: iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti,
K03psp_6-8u:4170: nāmasaṃjñāsaṃketaprajñaptivyavahāramātratvam api nu tasyotpādo vā prajñāyate vyayo vā saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā.
K03psp_6-8u:4174: ] tat kutas tavaivaṃ bhavati maitreya upalabdha eva svabhāvo bhavati rūpasya vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇām iti peyālam?
K03psp_6-8u:4176: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarvaśaḥ svalakṣaṇena nāsty eva rūpaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4177: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarvaśaḥ svalakṣaṇena nāsty eva vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4180: nāhaṃ maitreya sarvaśaḥ svalakṣaṇena rūpan nāstīti vadāmi,
K03psp_6-8u:4181: nāhaṃ maitreya sarvaśaḥ svalakṣaṇena vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā na santīti vadāmi.
K03psp_6-8u:4184: kathaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad buddhadharmāḥ santi?
K03psp_6-8u:4186: lokasaṃketavyavahārato maitreya rūpam asti na tu paramārthato lokasaṃketavyavahārato maitreya vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad buddhadharmāḥ santi no paramārthataḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:4188: yathā khalv ahaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi nirabhilapya eva dhātuḥ paramārthataḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:4190: tat kathaṃ yat tat saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu yatra rūpam ity āgantukaṃ nāmadheyaṃ prakṣipyate,
K03psp_6-8u:4191: tat kathaṃ yat tat saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu yatra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā ity āgantukaṃ nāmadheyaṃ prakṣipyate paramārthato na bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:4192: sacet tan na paramārthaḥ tat kathaṃ nirabhilapyo dhātur bhavati saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu nirabhilapyo dhātur iti na yujyate.
K03psp_6-8u:4194: tena hi maitreya tvām evātra pratipakṣāmi yathā te kṣamate tathāivaṃ vyākuru. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_6-8u:4195: maitreya yathā te nirabhilapya dhātau prajñāpracāro bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:4196: upalabhase tvaṃ tasmin samaye saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu yatredam āgantukanāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad (PSP_6-8:150)
K03psp_6-8u:4197: idaṃ rūpam iti vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskarā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti.
K03psp_6-8u:4201: ] tad anenāpi te maitreya paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4202: yat tat saṃskāranimittaṃ vastus tan nirabhilapyād dhātor nānyan nāpy ananyan,
K03psp_6-8u:4203: sa ca tasmāt saṃskāranimittād vastuno nānyo nirabhilapyo dhātur nāpy ananyo yatredam āgantukaṃ nāmadheyaṃ prakṣipataṃ yad idaṃ rūpam iti,
K03psp_6-8u:4204: vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti,
K03psp_6-8u:4205: saṃskāranimittāc ced vastuno maitreya nirabhilapyo dhātur anyaḥ syād apīdānīṃ sarvakālaṃ pṛthagjanāḥ parinirvāyur anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_6-8u:4206: ananyaś cen maitreya saṃskāranimittād vastuno nirabhilapyo dhātuḥ syād apīdānīṃ tad api nimittaṃ nopalabhyet,
K03psp_6-8u:4207: yatas tasya nirabhilapyasya dhātoḥ prativedho bhavet. tad anenāpi te maitreya paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4208: na tasmāt saṃskāranimittād vastuno 'nyo nirabhilapyo dhātur,
K03psp_6-8u:4209: nāpi tasmād ananyo nirabhilapyo dhātur yatredam āgantukaṃ nāmadheyaṃ prakṣipataṃ yad idaṃ rūpam iti vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti.
K03psp_6-8u:4211: saced bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nirabhilapyadhātūpanibaddhe prajñāpracāre vartamānas tat saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu nopalabhate,
K03psp_6-8u:4212: yatredam āgantukaṃ nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad idaṃ rūpam iti vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti,
K03psp_6-8u:4214: evam ukte bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam evam āha:
K03psp_6-8u:4215: na hi maitreya tasya saṃskāranimittasya vastunaḥ kācid vidyamānatā vāvidyamānatā vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:4216: yasmin hi vā maitreya samaye tat saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu vikalpayasi tasmin samaye tat saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu vikalpato grahaṇam eti,
K03psp_6-8u:4217: tasmin vā punaḥ samaye nirabhilapyadhātūpanibaddhe prajñāpracāre vartamāno na vikalpayasi tasmin samaye nirvikalpato grahaṇam eti.
K03psp_6-8u:4221: na tv evaṃ sati maitreya vikalpamātram etad yad uta saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu yatredam āgantukaṃ nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ (PSP_6-8:151)
K03psp_6-8u:4222: yad idaṃ rūpam iti vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskarā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti,
K03psp_6-8u:4223: vikalpamātre vā punas tasya nirvikalpe vā dhātau vartamānasya vikalpeṣv apagateṣu katamā tasya vidyamānatā vāvidyamānatā vopalabhyate,
K03psp_6-8u:4224: yatredam āgantukaṃ nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad idaṃ rūpam iti vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti?
K03psp_6-8u:4226: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharmaprabhedakauśalye vartamānena katibhir ākārai rūpaprabhedaprajñaptir anugantavyā?
K03psp_6-8u:4227: katibhir ākārair vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad buddhadharmaprabhedaprajñaptir anugantavyā?
K03psp_6-8u:4229: tribhir maitreyākārair bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dharmaprabhedakauśalye vartamānena rūpaprabhedaprajñaptir anugantavyā,
K03psp_6-8u:4230: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad budhdhadharmaprabhedaprajñaptir anugantavyā,
K03psp_6-8u:4231: yad utedaṃ parikalpitaṃ rūpam idaṃ vikalpitaṃ rūpam idaṃ dharmatā rūpam iti,
K03psp_6-8u:4232: yad uteyaṃ parikalpitā vedanā iyaṃ vikalpitā vedanā iyaṃ dharmatā vedanā,
K03psp_6-8u:4233: yad uta iyaṃ parikalpitā saṃjñā iyaṃ vikalpitā saṃjñā iyaṃ dharmatā saṃjñā,
K03psp_6-8u:4234: yad uteme parikalpitāḥ saṃskārā ime vikalpitāḥ saṃskārā ime dharmatā saṃskārāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:4235: idaṃ parikalpitaṃ vijñānam idaṃ vikalpitaṃ vijñānam idaṃ dharmatā vijñānam,
K03psp_6-8u:4236: ime yāvat parikalpitā buddhadharmā ime vikalpitā buddhadharmā ime dharmatā buddhadharmāḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:4241: katamā bhagavan parikalpitā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ?
K03psp_6-8u:4242: katamā vikalpaitā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ?
K03psp_6-8u:4243: katamā dharmatā vedanā saṃjjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ?
K03psp_6-8u:4248: yā maitreya tasmin saṃskāranimitte vastūni rūpam iti nāmasaṃjñāsaṃketaprajñaptivyavahāran niśritya rūpasvabhāvatayā parikalpatenedaṃ parikalpitaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4250: vastūni vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskāra iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti nāmasaṃjñāsaṃketaprajñaptivyavahāran
K03psp_6-8u:4253: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad ime parikalpitā buddhadharmāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:4254: yā punas tasya saṃskāranimittasya vastuno vikalpamātradharmatāyām avasthānatā vikalpapratītyābhilapanatā tatredaṃ nāmasaṃjñāsaṃketaprajñaptivyavahāro rūpam iti,
K03psp_6-8u:4257: idaṃ vikalpitaṃ rūpam iyaṃ vikalpitā vedanā iyaṃ vikalpitā saṃjñā ime vikalpitāḥ
K03psp_6-8u:4258: saṃskārā idaṃ vikalpitaṃ vijñānam ime vikalpitā buddhadharmāḥ. yā utpādād vā tathāgatānām
K03psp_6-8u:4259: anutpādād vā sthitaiveyaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmadhātur yat tena
K03psp_6-8u:4260: parikalpitarūpeṇa tasya vikalpitarūpasya nityaṃ nityakālaṃ dhruvaṃ dhruvakālaṃ niḥsvabhāvatā
K03psp_6-8u:4261: dharmanairātmyaṃ tathatā bhūtakoṭir idaṃ dharmatā rūpam iyaṃ dharmatā vedanā saṃjñā
K03psp_6-8u:4264: eṣāṃ bhagavan trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇāṃ katamad rūpam adravyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ?
K03psp_6-8u:4266: kataman naivādravyaṃ na sadravyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ paramārthaprabhāvitaṃ?
K03psp_6-8u:4267: āsāṃ bhagavaṃs tiṣṛṇāṃ vedanānāṃ tiṣṛṇāṃ saṃjñānāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ trayāṇāṃ yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ katame 'dravyā draṣṭavyā?
K03psp_6-8u:4269: katame naivādravyā draṣṭavyā na sadravyān paramārthaprabhāvitāḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:4271: yat maitreya parikalpitaṃ rūpam idam adravyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4272: yad vikalpitaṃ rūpam idaṃ vikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ sadravyatām upādāya sadravyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ no tu svatantravṛttitaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:4273: yad dharmatā rūpaṃ tan naivādravyaṃ sadravyaṃ paramārthaprabhāvitaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ, (PSP_6-8:153)
K03psp_6-8u:4274: yā maitreya parikalpitā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad ye parikalpitā buddhadharmā ime 'dravyā draṣṭavyāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:4275: yā vikalpitā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad ye vikalpitā buddhadharmā ime vikalpitasadravyatām upādāya sadravyā draṣṭavyā no tu svatantravṛttitaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:4276: yā maitreya dharmatā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad ye maitreya dharmatā buddhadharmās te naivādravyā na sadravyāḥ paramārthena prabhāvitā
K03psp_6-8u:4278: yad uktaṃ bhagavan bhagavatādvayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad uta rūpam ity,
K03psp_6-8u:4279: advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad uta vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti tad evaṃ rūpaprabhedaprajñaptau satyām,
K03psp_6-8u:4280: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad buddhadharmaprabhedaprajñaptau satyāṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4281: kiṃ saṃdhāya nirdiṣṭaṃ bhagavatā advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad uta rūpam ity advayasyaiṣā
K03psp_6-8u:4282: gaṇanā kṛtā yad uta vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā
K03psp_6-8u:4286: maitreya yā parikalpite rūpe 'dravyatā rūpaṃ vā tan na veti.
K03psp_6-8u:4290: ] yā punas tatra nāmasaṃjñāprajñaptivyavahāramātratā rūpam ity api nu tad rūpam?
K03psp_6-8u:4295: yat parikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ tan na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ yat punā rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ tad advayaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4296: idaṃ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ mayā advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad idaṃ rūpam iti. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_6-8u:4297: maitreya yā vikalpitasya rūpasya sadravyatā api nu tad rūpaṃ yad upādāya nāmasaṃjñāprajñaptivyavahāro bhavati rūpam iti.
K03psp_6-8u:4302: maitreya yā nimittena parikalpitena rūpeṇa parikalpitasya rūpasya tat svabhāvatāsallakṣaṇatāpi nu tad (PSP_6-8:154) rūpam.
K03psp_6-8u:4306: ] tad anena te maitreya paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4307: yad vikalpitaṃ rūpam api na rūpan nārūpaṃ yat punar na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ tad advayam,
K03psp_6-8u:4308: idañ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ mayā advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad idaṃ rūpam iti. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_6-8u:4309: maitreya yā dharmatā rūpasya nairātmyaprabhāvitatāpi nu tad rūpam.
K03psp_6-8u:4313: ] yā punas tathāivaṃ dharmatā rūpasya rūpadharmatā api nu tad rūpam?
K03psp_6-8u:4318: yad dharmatā rūpam api na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ yan na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ tad advayam idaṃ ca
K03psp_6-8u:4319: saṃdhāyoktaṃ mayādvayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad idaṃ rūpam iti vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu
K03psp_6-8u:4322: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rūpa evam advayalakṣaṇakuśalasya
K03psp_6-8u:4323: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne yāvad buddhadharmeṣu evam advayalakṣaṇakuśalasyāntadvayaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4330: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ maitreya carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntadvayaṃ varjayitvā madhyamāṃ pratipadaṃ pratipannasya,
K03psp_6-8u:4331: rūpasya yan na parijñānaṃ nāparijñānam iyam evāsya parijñā,
K03psp_6-8u:4332: yad vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ na parijñānaṃ nāparijñānam iyam evāsya parijñā,
K03psp_6-8u:4334: na prahāṇaṃ nāprahāṇam idam evāsya prahāṇaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4335: yad vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ na prahāṇaṃ nāprahāṇam idam evāsya prahāṇaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4336: yā rūpasya na sākṣātkriyā nāsākṣātkriyā iyam evāsya sākṣātkriyā,
K03psp_6-8u:4337: yā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ na sākṣātkriyā
K03psp_6-8u:4338: nāsākṣātkriyā iyam evāsya sākṣātkriyā rūpaprahāṇāya na mārgasya bhāvanā nābhāvanā
K03psp_6-8u:4340: evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya na mārgasya bhāvanā nābhāvanā iyam evāsya bhāvanā.
K03psp_6-8u:4342: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhagavaṃś carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ parijñāprahāṇasākṣātkriyābhāvanāsamanvāgatasya katamaṃ nirvāṇam?
K03psp_6-8u:4344: gambhīraṃ maitreya paramagambhīraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nirvāṇam.
K03psp_6-8u:4346: kena kāraṇena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām evaṃ gambhīraṃ paramagambhīraṃ nirvāṇam?
K03psp_6-8u:4348: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ maitreya nirvāṇaṃ yan nirvāṇaṃ nānirvāṇaṃ tena gambhīraṃ paramagambhīram ity ucyate.
K03psp_6-8u:4350: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ na nirvāṇaṃ bhavati?
K03psp_6-8u:4355: saced bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ parārtham ārabhya saṃsāraṃ na parityajati saṃsārāt parityāgāt katham anena nirvāṇaṃ na parityaktaṃ bhavati?
K03psp_6-8u:4356: saced bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ātmārtham ārabhya nirvāṇaṃ na parityajati nirvāṇāparityāgāt katham anena saṃsāro na parityakto bhavati?
K03psp_6-8u:4358: iha maitreya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran saṃsāram api saṃsārato na vikalpayati,
K03psp_6-8u:4361: yad uta saṃsāraś ca nirvāṇaś ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:4362: tathā hi sa yathā saṃsāraṃ saṃsārato 'vikalpayan saṃsārān nodvijati,
K03psp_6-8u:4363: tathāiva nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇato 'vikalpayan nirvāṇato nodvijaty evam avikalpadhātupratiṣṭhitasyānayā yuktyā na saṃsāraparityāgo na nirvāṇaparityāgo
K03psp_6-8u:4365: na nu bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāvikalpadhātupratiṣṭhitena saṃsāro yathaiva na tyaktas tathā nādattaḥ katham atyakto bhavati?
K03psp_6-8u:4366: nirvāṇaṃ yathā na tyaktaṃ tathā nādattaṃ kathaṃ atyaktaṃ bhavati?
K03psp_6-8u:4368: nāhaṃ maitreya saṃsārasyaivam ādānaṃ vānādānaṃ vā vadāmi,
K03psp_6-8u:4369: nirvāṇasyaivam ādānaṃ vānādānaṃ vā vadāmy api tu maitreya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato
K03psp_6-8u:4372: upādāyāhaṃ parinirvṛtāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṃsārasyāparityāgaṃ vadāmi,
K03psp_6-8u:4377: yac ca maitreya rūpaṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca saṃskārā yac ca vijñānaṃ yāvad
K03psp_6-8u:4378: ye ca buddhadharmā yā ca rūpasya śūnyatā yā ca vedanāyā yā ca saṃjñāyā yā ca saṃskārāṇāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4379: yā ca vijñānasya yā ca yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā,
