K03psp_6-8u:4380: teṣāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ tasyāś ca śūnyatāyā yā bhāvābhāvādvayatā yā cāprapañcanā idaṃ maitreya avikalpanāyāḥ samastalakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam.
K03psp_6-8u:4382: kiṃ nu bhagavan sarveṣāṃ śrāvakāṇām ekāṃśenaikāṃśikī nirvāṇapratiṣṭhā bhavati?
K03psp_6-8u:4386: hi nānādhātuko 'yaṃ maitreya loko 'nekadhātukas tasmiṃś ca nānādhātukeṣu bhūtāḥ sattvagotraprabhṛtaya upalabhyante,
K03psp_6-8u:4388: yādita eva praṇītaṃ viśesaṃ prārthayate praṇītam eva viśeṣam adhigacchati,
K03psp_6-8u:4389: asti sā gotrajātir yādita evaṃ hīṇaṃ viśeṣaṃ prārthayate hīnam eva viśeṣam adhigacchati tenaiva ca saṃtuṣṭo bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:4390: asti sā gotrajātir yādita eva hīnaviśeṣaṃ prārthayate hīnam eva viśeṣam adhigacchati na ca tāvatā saṃtuṣṭo bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:4391: tata uttari praṇītaṃ viśeṣaṃ prārthayate praṇītam eva viśeṣam adhigacchati.
K03psp_6-8u:4394: so 'rhattvaṃ prāpyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhiprārthayamāno 'nupapadyamānaś ca kathaṃ prāpnoty upapattiś cāsya bhagavatā pratipattau ca na
K03psp_6-8u:4397: api tv acintyān nirvāṇapāragāminīm arhato 'py upapattiṃ prajñāpayāmi.
K03psp_6-8u:4399: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad udārāśayā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā māhātmyādhyāśayāś ca,
K03psp_6-8u:4400: yatredānīm ādita eva praṇītaṃ viśeṣaṃ prārthayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:4405: yan maitreya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakratvalokapālatvacakravartitvasarvākāralokasaṃpattibhir anarthino 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kuśalamūlaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4406: tāsu ca niḥsaṃgatā niravagrahatā ceyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām udārāśayatā.
K03psp_6-8u:4407: tat punar bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tad asaktisukham anavagrahasukhaṃ nirvṛttisukhaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4408: ca sarvasattvasādhāraṇam icchanto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:4409: yad uta saṃsārāparityāgatayā iyam eṣāṃ māhātmyādhyāśayatā draṣṭavyā.
K03psp_6-8u:4410: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:4413: āścaryān adbhutān bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvadharmān anuprāptukāmenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayitavyam.
K03psp_6-8u:4414: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:4415: yadi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās te na buddhaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhair
K03psp_6-8u:4416: nārhadbhir nānāgāmibhir na sakṛdāgāmibhir na srotaāpannair nāpi tair bodhisattvair
K03psp_6-8u:4417: mahāsattvaiḥ kṛtās tat kuta eṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ vā vyavasthānaṃ vā prajñāyate?
K03psp_6-8u:4418: ime nairayikā ime tairyagyonikā ime yāmalaukikā ime devā ime mānuṣyāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:4419: anena karmaṇā nairayikā anena karmaṇā tiryagyonikā anena karmaṇā yāmalaukikā anena karmaṇā manuṣyāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:4425: anena karmaṇā aspṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:4426: anena karmaṇā ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattayo vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattaya ākiñcanyāyatanasamāpattayo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattayaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:4427: anena karmaṇā srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddho,
K03psp_6-8u:4429: 'nena karmaṇā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'bhāvasya hi bhagavan na kācit kriyā yayā narakaṃ vā gacchacchet,
K03psp_6-8u:4430: tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā devaṃ vā manuṣyaṃ vā kāmadhātuṃ vā rūpadhātuṃ vā ārūpyadhātuṃ vā gacchet,
K03psp_6-8u:4431: srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhiṃ vā prāpsyati,
K03psp_6-8u:4435: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:4436: evam etat subhūte evam etad yathā vadasi,
K03psp_6-8u:4437: abhāvasya hi subhūte na karma na kriyā na phalaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4438: bālapṛthagjanā hi subhūte yāvad āryadharmeṣv akovidās te abhāvasvabhāvān dharmān na jānanti,
K03psp_6-8u:4439: te viparyāsasamutthitair vikalpair vividhāni karmāṇy upasthāpayanti,
K03psp_6-8u:4441: yadi vā nairayikā yadi vā tairyagyonikā yadi vā yāmalaukikā yadi vā manuṣyeṣu yadi vā kāmadhātuṣu deveṣu yadi vā rūpadhātukeṣu (PSP_6-8:159)
K03psp_6-8u:4442: deveṣu yadi vā ārūpyadhātukeṣu deveṣu yāvad abhāvasya na karma na kriyā na phalaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4443: yaḥ punar abhāvo 'bhāva eva saḥ. yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha:
K03psp_6-8u:4444: yaḥ srotāapannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddho bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mārgajñatāyāṃ carati tathāgato vā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_6-8u:4445: subhūte nābhāvo mārgo nābhāvaḥ srotaāpattiphalan nābhāvaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalan nābhāvo 'nāgāmiphalan nābhāvo 'rhattvan nābhāvaḥ pratyekabodhir nābhāvo yāvat sarvākārajñatā.
K03psp_6-8u:4447: abhāvo bhagavan mārgo 'bhāvaḥ srotaāpattiphalam abhāvaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalam abhāvo nāgāmiphalam abhāvo 'rhattvam abhāvaḥ pratyekabodhir abhāvo yāvat sarvākārajñatā.
K03psp_6-8u:4449: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte 'bhāvo dharmo 'bhāvaṃ dharmam anuprāpnoti?
K03psp_6-8u:4453: iti hi subhūte yaś cābhāvo yaś ca mārgaḥ sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā
K03psp_6-8u:4454: arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇās tat subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K03psp_6-8u:4455: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena ye sattvāś caturbhir viparyāsair abhiniviṣṭāḥ
K03psp_6-8u:4456: pañcasu skandheṣv anitye nityasaṃjñino 'nātmany ātmasaṃjñino duḥkhe sukhasaṃjñino
K03psp_6-8u:4457: 'śubhe śubhasaṃjñmo bhāveṣv abhiniviṣṭās tāṃs tān bhāvebhyo vivecayati.
K03psp_6-8u:4459: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:4460: asti bhagavan avastu bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ tathatāvitathatā yatra sthitvā bālapṛthagjanā
K03psp_6-8u:4461: idaṃ vastv ity abhiniveśenābhiniviśya bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ tathatāvitathatā karmābhisaṃkurvanti
K03psp_6-8u:4462: yena karmaṇā pañcagatikān saṃsārān na parimucyante.
K03psp_6-8u:4464: nāsti subhūte 'ntaśo vālāgrakoṭīnikṣepamātram api vastu yatra sthitvā bālapṛthagjanāḥ karmābhisaṃskurvanti,
K03psp_6-8u:4469: tena hi subhūte upamān te kariṣyāmi,
K03psp_6-8u:4470: asyaivārthasya bhūyasyā mātrayā prasiddhaye yathā paṇḍitā jānīyus,
K03psp_6-8u:4472: subhūte kiñcit svapne darśinas tad vastv asti yatra sthitvā svapnadarśī pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ paricaret.
K03psp_6-8u:4474: svapna eva tāvad bhagavan nāsti kutaḥ punas tatra sthitvā svapnadarśī pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ paricariṣyati.
K03psp_6-8u:4477: subhūte 'sti sa kaścid dharmo laukiko vā lokottaro vā sāsravo vānāsravo vā saṃskṛto vāsaṃskṛto vā yo na svapnopamaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:4479: nāsti bhagavan sa kaścid dharmaḥ saṃskṛto vāsaṃskṛto vā sāsravo vānāsravo vā laukiko vā lokottaro vā yo na svapnopamaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:4482: subhūte kaścit svapne pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāro vidyate?
K03psp_6-8u:4488: yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta vā na vyavadāyeta vā.
K03psp_6-8u:4490: no hīdaṃ bhagavan na vastukaḥ sa bhagavan svapno 'prajñaptiko 'prajñapanīyaḥ sarvapadavyañjanaiḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:4493: subhūte yadādarśamaṇḍale pratibimbo dṛśyate kiñcit tasya vastv asti yat karmābhisaṃskuryād yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet?
K03psp_6-8u:4495: no hīdaṃ bhagavan na vastukaḥ sa bhagavan pratibimbo 'nyatra bālapṛthagjanānām ullāpanāt tat kutas tasya karma bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:4496: yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet.
K03psp_6-8u:4499: subhūte kācit tasya mārgabhāvanā bhavati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
K03psp_6-8u:4501: no bhagavan na vastukaḥ sa bhagavan pratibimbakas (PSP_6-8:161)
K03psp_6-8u:4502: tat kutas tasya mārgabhāvanā bhaviṣyati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
K03psp_6-8u:4506: niścarati kin tasyāḥ pratiśrutkāyāḥ karmāsti yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet
K03psp_6-8u:4508: manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv ārūpyāvacareṣu vā deveṣu gacchet?
K03psp_6-8u:4510: no bhagavan na vastukā sā pratiśrutkā kutas tasyāḥ karma bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_6-8u:4511: yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet,
K03psp_6-8u:4512: manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv ārūpyāvacareṣu vā deveṣu gacchet.
K03psp_6-8u:4515: subhūte kin tasyāḥ pratiśrutkā yā mārgabhāvanā bhavati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāpayeta.
K03psp_6-8u:4517: no bhagavann atyantatayā sā bhagavan pratiśrutkā nāsti kutas tasyā mārgabhāvanā bhaviṣyati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyet,
K03psp_6-8u:4521: subhūte yā sā marīcyām anudake udakasaṃjñā anadīṣu vā nadīsaṃjñā anagareṣu nagarasaṃjñā
K03psp_6-8u:4522: anudyāneṣv udyānasaṃjñā kiṃ tasyā marīcisaṃjñāyāḥ karmāsti yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya
K03psp_6-8u:4523: narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet,
K03psp_6-8u:4524: manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv ārūpyāvacareṣu vā deveṣu gacchet?
K03psp_6-8u:4526: no bhagavann atyantatayā bhagavaṃs tasyāṃ marīcyām udakaṃ nāsti naiva nadī naiva
K03psp_6-8u:4527: nagaran naivodyānam anyatra saṃjñāviparyāsaś cakṣurmohanatāyās tat kuto 'syāḥ karma
K03psp_6-8u:4528: bhaviṣyati yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet,
K03psp_6-8u:4529: manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv ārūpyāvacareṣu vā deveṣu gacchet.
K03psp_6-8u:4532: subhūte kiṃ tasyāṃ viparyastāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ mārgabhāvanā bhavati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na (PSP_6-8:162)
K03psp_6-8u:4535: no bhagavan na hi viparyastāyāṃ bhagavan saṃjñāyām asti mārgabhāvanā yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
K03psp_6-8u:4539: yadi vā hastikāyo yadi vāśvakāyo yadi vā balīvardakāyo yadi vā pattikāyo yadi vā
K03psp_6-8u:4540: janapadakāyo yadi vā strīrūpaṃ yadi vā puruṣarūpam api nu tasyā māyāyāḥ karmāsti
K03psp_6-8u:4541: yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet,
K03psp_6-8u:4542: manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv ārūpyāvacareṣu vā deveṣūpapadyeta.
K03psp_6-8u:4544: no bhagavan na hi māyāyā bhagavan vastv asty antaśo vālāgrakoṭīnikṣepamātram api
K03psp_6-8u:4545: yatra sthitvā karmābhisaṃkuryād yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4546: vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv
K03psp_6-8u:4550: subhūte kācit tasya mārgabhāvanā bhavati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
K03psp_6-8u:4552: no bhagavan na vastu kasya bhagavan dharmasya kuto mārgabhāvanā bhaviṣyati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
K03psp_6-8u:4555: subhūte yat punas tathāgatanirmito 'bhinirmiṇoty anyan nirmitaṃ kiṃ tasya nirmitasya karmāsti yena karmaṇā narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet,
K03psp_6-8u:4556: manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv ārūpyāvacareṣu vā deveṣūpapadyeta.
K03psp_6-8u:4558: no bhagavan na vastukaḥ sa bhagavan nirmitaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:4561: subhūte kācit tasya nirmitasya mārgabhāvanā bhavati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vayavadāyeta.
K03psp_6-8u:4566: subhūte kaścid atra saṃkliśyeta vā vyavadāyeta vā.
K03psp_6-8u:4568: na kaścid bhagavan saṃkliśyeta vā vyavadāyeta vā.
K03psp_6-8u:4570: yathaiva subhūte na saṃkliśyeta vā na vyavadāyeta vā tathāiva nāsti saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:4571: ahaṃkāramamakāre hi subhūte sthitāḥ sattvāḥ saṃkliśyante vā vyavadāyante vā,
K03psp_6-8u:4572: yathaiva bhūtadarśī na saṃkliśyate vā na vyavadāyate vā tathāiva subhūte nāsti saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā.
K03psp_6-8u:4574: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:4575: bhūtaṃ veti bhagavan na saṃkliśyate na vayavadāyate,
K03psp_6-8u:4576: abhūtaṃ veti bhagavan na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate,
K03psp_6-8u:4578: abhāvasvabhāvasyāpi bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4579: bhāvasyāpi bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam,
K03psp_6-8u:4580: abhāvasyāpi bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4581: bhāvābhāvasyāpi bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ tatra yad etad bhagavatā vyavadānan nirdiṣṭan tat katham idaṃ bhagavan bhavati?
K03psp_6-8u:4583: yā eṣā subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatā tan mayoktaṃ vyavadānam.
K03psp_6-8u:4587: tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā,
K03psp_6-8u:4588: yā utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā dharmadhātum idam ucyate
K03psp_6-8u:4589: tat punar lokavyavahāreṇa vyavahriyate na punaḥ paramārthenānirabhilapyo hi so 'pravyāhāraḥ sarvākāraghoṣavākyathātītaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:4591: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:4592: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamāḥ pratibimbopamā
K03psp_6-8u:4593: marīcyupamā māyopamā gandharvanagaropamā nirmitakopamās tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K03psp_6-8u:4595: sarvadharmaiḥ pratiśrutkopamaiḥ pratibhāsopamaiḥ pratibimbopamair marīcyupamair māyopamair
K03psp_6-8u:4596: gandharvanagaropamair nirmitakopamair dharmair avastukeṣv adravyeṣv anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayati,
K03psp_6-8u:4630: aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrayati dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni paripūrayaty aśītyanuvyañjanāni paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:4631: yāvat trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātāv ābhāsakarīm ābhāṃ pariniṣpādayati,
K03psp_6-8u:4633: tatraikena svareṇa daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu yathādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ cetasaiva cittam ājñāya dharmaṃ deśayati.
K03psp_6-8u:4636: subhūte naite dharmāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamāḥ pratibimbopamā marīcyupamā māyopamā gandharvanagaropamā nirmitakopamāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:4639: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamāḥ pratibimbopamā marīcyupamā māyopamā gandharvanagaropamā nirmitakopamāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:4641: sarvadharmeṣu yāvan nirmitakopameṣu bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñapāramitāyāṃ carati?
K03psp_6-8u:4642: na ca bhagavan svapno bhūto na pratiśrutkā bhūtā na pratibhāso bhūto na pratibimbaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4643: bhūtaṃ na marīcir bhūtā na māyā bhūtā na gandharvanagaraṃ bhūtaṃ na nirmitako bhūto
K03psp_6-8u:4644: na ca bhagavan śakyam abhūtena dānapāramitāyāṃ carituṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carituṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4645: carituṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ carituṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carituṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carituṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4651: śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_6-8u:4655: sarve te subhūte dharmā anabhisaṃskṛtā anabhinirvṛttā na śakyā anabhisaṃskṛtair dharmaiḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāptum.
K03psp_6-8u:4656: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sarva ete dharmā mārgasyāvāhanāya saṃvartante,
K03psp_6-8u:4658: ya eteṣāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādo 'prādurbhāvo 'lakṣaṇam api tat,
K03psp_6-8u:4659: ato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yān kuśalān dharmān nopalabhate,
K03psp_6-8u:4660: yadi vā dānapāramitāṃ yadi vā śīlapāramitāṃ yadi vā kṣāntipāramitāṃ yadi vā vīryapāramitāṃ yadi vā dhyānapāramitāṃ yadi vā prajñāpāramitāṃ yadi vā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān,
K03psp_6-8u:4661: yadi vā adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yadi vā bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yadi vādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4665: na cemān dharmān aparipūrya dānapāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4670: sarvākāravaropetaṃ jñānam aparipūrya sattvān aparipācya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4671: caran sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyād iti naitat sthānaṃ vidyate,
K03psp_6-8u:4672: yān yān eva kuśalān dharmān ārabhate tāṃs tān kuśalān dharmān svapnopamān pratiśrutkopamān
K03psp_6-8u:4673: pratibhāsopamān pratibimbopamān marīcyupamān māyopamān gandharvanagaropamān nirmitakopamān jānāti.
K03psp_6-8u:4674: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4675: caran śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran dānapāramitāyāṃ carann adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4681: pañcasv abhijñāsu caran sarvasamādhiṣu caran sarvadhāraṇīmukhesu caran daśabodhisattvabhūmiṣu
K03psp_6-8u:4682: caran daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caran caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu caran catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu
K03psp_6-8u:4685: pratiśrutkopamān pratibhāsopamān pratibiṃbopamān marīcyupamān māyopamān gandharvanagaropamān nirmitakopamān jānāti,
K03psp_6-8u:4686: tāṃś ca sarvasattvān svapne carataḥ sa jānāti pratiśrutkāyāṃ pratibhāse pratibimbe marīcyāṃ māyāyāṃ gandharvanagare nirmitake carato jānāti.
K03psp_6-8u:4687: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ na bhāvato nābhāvato (PSP_6-8:167)
K03psp_6-8u:4689: svapnopamān pratiśrutkopamān pratibhāsopamān pratibimbopamān marīcyupamān māyopamān
K03psp_6-8u:4690: gandharvanagaropamān nirmitakopamān sarvadharmān jñātvā na bhāvato gṛhṇāti nābhāvato
K03psp_6-8u:4706: agrāhyāḥ sarvadharmās tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'grāhyān sarvadharmān viditvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:4707: tathā hy agrāhyāḥ sarvadharmā avastukāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamāḥ
K03psp_6-8u:4708: pratibimbopamā marīcyupamā māyopamā gandharvanagaropamā nimitakopamāḥ. na cāgrāhyāṇāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4710: anyatra sattvā imān dharmān na jānanti na paśyanti,
K03psp_6-8u:4711: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sarvasattvānām arthāyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhate.
K03psp_6-8u:4712: sa ca prathamacittotpādam upādāya yad dānaṃ dadāti tat sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:4718: tat sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśo na punar ātmārtham.
K03psp_6-8u:4719: na ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyasya kṛtaśo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhate
K03psp_6-8u:4720: 'nyatra sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvo na sattve sattvasaṃjñāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4736: yatra pratiṣṭhitānām ete samudācāro na pravartante,
K03psp_6-8u:4737: ātmasaṃjñā sattvasaṃjñā jīvasaṃjñā jantusaṃjñā poṣasaṃjñā puruṣasaṃjñā pudgalasaṃjñā manujasaṃjñā mānavasaṃjñā kārakasaṃjñā vedakasaṃjñā jānakasaṃjñā
K03psp_6-8u:4738: sa sarvān imān nimiñjitasaṃmiñjitavispanditaprapañcitān vivecyānyatamānyatamena cetasā bahulam upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_6-8u:4739: anena subhūte upāyena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carann ātmanā na
K03psp_6-8u:4740: keṣucid dharmeṣv abhiniviśate sarvasattvāṃś cānabhiniveśe pratiṣṭhāpayati lokavyavahāreṇa
K03psp_6-8u:4743: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:4744: yo bhagavaṃs tathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ kiṃ punaḥ sa dharmo lokavyavahāreṇābhisaṃbuddho 'rthaparamārthena?
K03psp_6-8u:4746: lokavyavahāreṇa subhūte vyavahriyate 'yaṃ tathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddho 'nena dharmeṇāyaṃ dharmo 'saṃbuddho 'yaṃ tathāgatena dharmo deśita
K03psp_6-8u:4749: upalaṃbho hy eṣo 'nena dharmeṇāyaṃ dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddha iti,
K03psp_6-8u:4750: na ca dvayena kācit prāptir nābhisamayaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:4751: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:4752: yadi bhagavan na dvayenābhisamayaḥ kiṃ punar advayenābhisamayaḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:4755: eṣa evātrābhisamayo yatra na dvayaṃ nādvayaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4757: prapañca eṣa yo 'yam eṣām abhisamayo na ca dharmasamatāyāṃ prapañco 'sti (PSP_6-8:169)
K03psp_6-8u:4762: eṣaivātra samatā yatra na bhāvo 'bhāvo vā kīrtito,
K03psp_6-8u:4763: na ca dharmasamatā parikīrtya tena cānyo 'pi dharma upalabhyate dharmasamatāyāṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4765: agatir aviṣayo dharmasamatā yasya kasyacid bālapṛthagjanasya vāryasya vā.
K03psp_6-8u:4767: kiṃ punar bhagavan dharmasamatā tathāgatasyāpy aviṣayaḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:4769: aviṣayaḥ subhūte sarvāryāṇāṃ śraddhānusāriṇāṃ vā dharmānusāriṇāṃ vāṣṭamakānāṃ vā
K03psp_6-8u:4770: srotaāpannānāṃ vā sakṛdāgāmināṃ vānāgāmināṃ vārhatāṃ vā śrāvakāṇāṃ vā pratyekabuddhānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4771: vā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vā tathāgatasyāpy aviṣayaḥ sarvadharmasamatā.
K03psp_6-8u:4773: na punar bhagavan sarvadharmaviṣayavaśavartī tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:4776: yady anyā dharmasamatā syād anyas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho,
K03psp_6-8u:4777: yā ca subhūte pṛthagjanānāṃ dharmasamatā yā ca śraddhānusāriṇo dharmānusāriṇo 'ṣṭamakāṇāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4778: srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4779: yā ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya samatā samataiva samatā,
K03psp_6-8u:4784: ayaṃ bālapṛthagjano 'yaṃ śraddhānusāry ayaṃ dharmānusāry ayam aṣṭamako 'yaṃ srotaāpanno
K03psp_6-8u:4785: 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K03psp_6-8u:4787: sarva ete subhūte dharmāḥ samatāyāṃ nopalabhyante,
K03psp_6-8u:4791: ayam aṣṭamako 'yaṃ srotāapanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan
K03psp_6-8u:4793: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmasamatāyāṃ sarva ete dharmā nopalabhyante,
K03psp_6-8u:4796: ayam aṣṭamako 'yaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan
K03psp_6-8u:4797: aviśeṣo vā bhagavan bhaviṣyati bālapṛthagjanānāñ ca śraddhānusāriṇāṃ ca dharmānusāriṇāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4798: cāṣṭamakānāñ ca srotaāpannānāṃ ca sakṛdāgāmināñ cānāgāmināñ cārhatāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāñ
K03psp_6-8u:4799: ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāñ ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya ca.
K03psp_6-8u:4802: aviśeṣo dharmasamatāyāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ śraddhānusāriṇāṃ dharmānusāriṇām aṣṭamakānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4803: srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4806: yadi bhagavann aviśeṣo bālapṛthagjanānāṃ śraddhānusāriṇāṃ dharmānusāriṇām aṣṭamakānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4807: srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4809: kuta eṣāṃ bhagavaṃs trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
K03psp_6-8u:4813: subhūte 'nyad buddharatnam anyad dharmaratnam anyat saṃgharatnam anyā dharmāṇāṃ dharmasamatā.
K03psp_6-8u:4816: nānyad buddharatnaṃ nānyad dharmaratnaṃ nānyat saṃgharatnaṃ nānyā dharmāṇāṃ dharmasamatā,
K03psp_6-8u:4817: saced bhagavan buddharatnaṃ dharmaratnaṃ saṃgharatnaṃ yā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmasamatā,
K03psp_6-8u:4818: sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā agrāhyā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇās tat kathaṃ bhagavann eṣām alakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ phalavyavasthānaṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:4819: ayaṃ bālapṛthagjano 'yaṃ śraddhānusāry ayaṃ dharmānusāry ayam aṣṭamako 'yaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy (PSP_6-8:171)
K03psp_6-8u:4820: ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti?
K03psp_6-8u:4822: yadi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate tadābhisaṃbudhya dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ nākariṣyad api narako vā na prajñāyate,
K03psp_6-8u:4823: tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā devo vā manuṣyo vā cāturmahārājikā vā devās trayastriṃśā
K03psp_6-8u:4824: vā yāmā vā tuṣitā vā nirmāṇaratayo vā paranirmitavaśavartino vā brahmapārṣadyo vā
K03psp_6-8u:4825: brahmapurohitā vā mahābrahmāṇo vā parīttābhā vā apramāṇābhā vā ābhāsvarā vā parīttaśubhā
K03psp_6-8u:4826: vā apramāṇaśubhā vā śubhakṛtsnā vā anabhrakā vā puṇyaprasavā vā bṛhatphalā vā asaṃjñisattvā
K03psp_6-8u:4827: vā aspṛhā vā atapā vā sudṛśā vā sudarśanā vā akaniṣṭhā vā devāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:4828: ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattayo vā vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattayo vā ākiñcanyāyatanasamāpattayo vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattayo vā,
K03psp_6-8u:4830: adhyātmaśūnyatā vā bahirdhāśūnyatā vā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā vā,
K03psp_6-8u:4831: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā vā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni vā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vā,
K03psp_6-8u:4832: abhijñā vā daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvido vāveṇikabuddhadharmā vā mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni vāśītyanuvyañjanāni vā,
K03psp_6-8u:4834: dānapāramitā vā śīlapāramitā vā kṣāntipāramitā vā vīryapāramitā vā dhyānapāramitā vā prajñāpāramitā vā,
K03psp_6-8u:4835: upāyapāramitā vā praṇidhānapāramitā vā balapāramitā vā jñānapāramitā vā,
K03psp_6-8u:4840: 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ
K03psp_6-8u:4845: tasmāt tarhi subhūte tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām (PSP_6-8:172)
K03psp_6-8u:4846: ayaṃ puruṣakāro yad dharmasamatāyāś ca na calanti,
K03psp_6-8u:4849: kiṃ bhagavan yathā caiva tathāgato dharmatāyāś ca na calati,
K03psp_6-8u:4850: tathāiva bālapṛthagjanāpi na calati śraddhānusārī dharmānusārī aṣṭamakaḥ srotaāpannaḥ
K03psp_6-8u:4851: sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddho bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāiva sarvadharmā na calanti.
K03psp_6-8u:4854: sarvadharmāḥ subhūte dharmatāyā na calanti na vivartante,
K03psp_6-8u:4855: yaiva subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā tathatāvitathatānanyatathatā,
K03psp_6-8u:4856: saiva bālapṛthagjanānāṃ dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā tathatāvitathatānanyatathatā,
K03psp_6-8u:4857: saiva śraddhānusāriṇāṃ dharmānausāriṇām aṣṭamakānāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām
K03psp_6-8u:4858: anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmatā dharmadhātur
K03psp_6-8u:4860: sarva ete dharmā dharmatāṃ na vyativartante,
K03psp_6-8u:4862: tathā hy eṣaiva dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā tathatāvitathatānanyatathatā nānyā kācid anudharmatā.
K03psp_6-8u:4864: yadi bhagavan yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā saiva dharmatā bālapṛthagjanānāṃ saiva śraddhānusāriṇāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4865: saiva dharmānusāriṇāṃ saivāṣṭamakānāṃ saiva srotaāpannānāṃ saiva sakṛdāgāmināṃ saivānāgāmināṃ
K03psp_6-8u:4866: saivārhatāṃ saiva pratyekabuddhānāṃ saiva bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saiva tathāgatānām
K03psp_6-8u:4868: ya ime bhagavan vilakṣaṇā dharmās te katham ekalakṣaṇās?
K03psp_6-8u:4869: tadyathā rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4872: anyā vedanāyāḥ anyā saṃjñāyā anyā saṃskārāṇām anyā vijñānasya dharmatā,
K03psp_6-8u:4944: dharmatā, anyā yāvad daśabhūmyā bodhisattvabhūmer dharmatā,
K03psp_6-8u:4951: anyā dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānāṃ dharmatā anyā aśītyanuvyañjanānāṃ dharmatā,
K03psp_6-8u:4953: anyā asaṃskṛtasya dhātor dharmatā. tat kathaṃ bhagavan naivaṃ vilakṣaṇānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatāyāṃ vyavasthānaṃ nopalabhyate?
K03psp_6-8u:4954: yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dharmāṇāñ ca nānātvaṃ karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:4955: na cākṛtvā dharmanānātvaṃ śakyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carituṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:4956: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ bhūmer bhūmiṃ saṃkrāmati bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati,
K03psp_6-8u:4957: yayā niyāmāvakrāntyā śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vātikramya 'bhijñāḥ paripūrayati,
K03psp_6-8u:4968: vikrīḍamāno buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlāny avaropayati,
K03psp_6-8u:4969: yaiḥ kuśalair mūlaiḥ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetrañ ca parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_6-8u:4974: saiva śraddhānusāriṇāṃ dharmānusāriṇām aṣṭamakānāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ dharmatā,
K03psp_6-8u:4976: ya ime bhagavan vilakṣaṇā dharmās te katham ekalakṣaṇā vilakṣaṇānāñ ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā katham ekalakṣaṇā yukteti.
K03psp_6-8u:4980: na śūnyā sā, ya vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya dharmatā,
K03psp_6-8u:5006: śūnyā sā bhagavan śūnyā sā sugata.
K03psp_6-8u:5010: rūpalakṣaṇaṃ vā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānalakṣaṇaṃ vā,
K03psp_6-8u:5014: laukikalokottarāṇāṃ vā dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ vā dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:5016: bālapṛthagjanānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ śraddhānusāriṇāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:5017: dharmānusāriṇāṃ vā lakṣaṇam aṣṭamakānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ,
K03psp_6-8u:5018: srotaāpannānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ sakṛdāgāmināṃ vā lakṣaṇam anāgāmināṃ vā lakṣaṇam arhatāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:5019: vā lakṣaṇaṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ
K03psp_6-8u:5025: yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na tatra pṛthagjanā nānyatra pṛthagjanebhyaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:5038: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:5039: kiṃ punar bhagavan dharmatā saṃskṛtā utāho 'saṃskṛtā?
K03psp_6-8u:5040: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:5043: na cāsaṃskṛtavyatirekeṇa saṃskṛta upalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:5044: tathā hi subhūte yaś ca saṃskṛto dhātur yaś cāsaṃskṛto dhātur dvāv apy etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktāv arūpiṇāv anidarśanāv apratighāv ekalakṣaṇau yad utālakṣaṇau,
K03psp_6-8u:5045: tat punas tathāgato lokavyavahāreṇa vyavaharati na punaḥ paramārthena,
K03psp_6-8u:5046: na ca paramārthe kaścit kāyasaṃskāre na vāksaṃskāre na manaḥsaṃskāre nānyatra kāyasaṃskārān nānyatra vāksaṃskārān nānyatra manaḥsaṃskārāt paramārtha
K03psp_6-8u:5047: yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ samatā sa paramārthas tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran paramārthataś ca na calati,
K03psp_6-8u:5050: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ śūnyās tan na kasyacid dharmasya kaścid dharmaḥ kiṃcit karoti,
K03psp_6-8u:5051: akiṃcitkareṣv akiṃcaneṣu niṣkiṃcaneṣu cādharmeṣu kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_6-8u:5052: caran paramārthataś ca na calati sattvānāṃ ca kṛtyaṃ karoti dānena vā priyavadyatayā
K03psp_6-8u:5057: yac chūnyatā akiṃcanā niṣkiṃcanā na kasyacit kiṃcit karoti kṛtyaṃ vā akṛtyaṃ vā,
K03psp_6-8u:5058: yadi subhūte ete sattvāḥ svayam eva śūnyatāṃ jānīyur neyaṃ tathāgatasya vṛṣabhitā bhavet,
K03psp_6-8u:5062: evaṃ sattvasaṃjñāyā vivecayati jīvasaṃjñāyā jantusaṃjñāyāḥ poṣasaṃjñāyāḥ puruṣasaṃjñāyāḥ
K03psp_6-8u:5063: pudgalasaṃjñāyā manujasaṃjñāyā mānavasaṃjñāyāḥ kārakasaṃjñāyā vedakasaṃjñāyā jānakasaṃjñāyāḥ
K03psp_6-8u:5083: śabdasaṃjñāyā gandhasaṃjñāyā rasasaṃjñāyāḥ sparśasaṃjñāyā dharmasaṃjñāyā vivecayati,
K03psp_6-8u:5098: vedanāsaṃjñāyās tṛṣṇāsaṃjñāyā upādānasaṃjñāyā bhavasaṃjñāyā jātisaṃjñāyā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyopāyāsasaṃjñāyā vivecayati,
K03psp_6-8u:5104: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:5105: kena bhagavan na saṃskṛto dhātuḥ śūnyaḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:5106: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:5108: api tu khalu subhūte yan nirmito 'nyan nirmitaṃ nirmiṇoti,
K03psp_6-8u:5109: kaccit tasya tad vastv asti yan na śūnyatā?
K03psp_6-8u:5111: no bhagavan nirmitasya hi bhagavan na kaccid vastv (PSP_6-8:178)
K03psp_6-8u:5113: ya ca śūnyatā yaś ca nirmitaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:5115: na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktau dvāv etau śūnyatayā śūnyau,
K03psp_6-8u:5116: tat kiṃ vinigūhitam iyaṃ śūnyatāyaṃ nirmitaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:5117: tathā hi tāv ubhāv api śūnyatāyān nopalabhyate,
K03psp_6-8u:5120: nāsti subhūte rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā yaś ca nirmito yā ca śūnyatā ubhayam etac chūnyatā.
K03psp_6-8u:5122: yadi bhagavann ime laukikā dharmā nirmitā api nu ime lokottarā dharmā nirmitāḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:5123: yad uta catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi,
K03psp_6-8u:5124: pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni,
K03psp_6-8u:5129: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā mahākaruṇā,
K03psp_6-8u:5130: yac ca teṣāṃ phalaṃ yena te pudgalāḥ prajñāpyante,
K03psp_6-8u:5131: śraddhānusārī dharmānusāry aṣṭamakaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddho
K03psp_6-8u:5132: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'pi nu bhagavann ime dharmā nirmitāḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:5134: yatra punaḥ sarvadharmā nirmitās tatra kaścic chrāvakanirmitaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:5138: kaścit karmanirmito 'nena subhūte paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā nirmitakopamā anānākaraṇāḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:5140: yat punar idaṃ bhagavan prahāṇaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā nirmitā sarvavāsanānusaṃdhiprahāṇam api nirmitam?
K03psp_6-8u:5142: ye kecit subhūte dharmā utpāditā vā nirodhitā vā sarva ete nirmitāḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:5144: katamo bhagavan dharmo yo na nirmitakaḥ?
K03psp_6-8u:5146: yasya notpādo na nirodhaḥ sa dharmo na nimitaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:5152: yat punar bhagavatoktaṃ śūnyatāyāś ca na calati,
K03psp_6-8u:5154: na ca kaścid dharmo yo na śūnyas tasmād bhagavan saṃmoṣadharmo nirmitako bhavet.
K03psp_6-8u:5157: sarvadharmāḥ subhūte svabhāvena śūnyās te na śrāvakaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhaiḥ kṛtā na bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ kṛtā na tathāgataiḥ kṛtā,
K03psp_6-8u:5159: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:5162: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_6-8u:5163: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte pūrvaṃ bhāvo 'bhaviṣyat paścād abhāvo bhaviṣyati?
K03psp_6-8u:5164: nātra subhūte bhāvo nābhāvo na svabhāvo na parabhāvaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:5168: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanaso maitreyapramukhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:5169: āyuṣmāṃś ca subhūtir āyuṣmāṃś ca śāriputra āyuṣmāṃś cānandaḥ,
K03psp_6-8u:5170: śakraś ca devānām indraḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti.
K03psp_6-8u:5171: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāni prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyāṃ dharmakāyādhikāraḥ śikṣāparivarto nāmāṣṭamaḥ samāpta iti
K03psp_6-8u:5172: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat,
K03psp_6-8u:5173: teṣāñ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ.
K03psp_6-8u:5174: oṃ gate 2 pāragate pārasaṃgate bodhi svāhā.
